src: masisebenzisane silwe ukuba ungafiki umhl’omkhulu wokuphela kwamanzi more matshediso isebe lezamanzi nogu tyulo (idws) lisebe nzisana nesixeko sasekapa ukulwa imbalela entshona kolo ni, eyiyona yakha yambi emva kweminyaka emininzi.
tgt: siza ukulwisana nosuku lokuntuleka kwamanzi more matshediso umnyango wezamanzi nokuthuthwa kwendle (idws) usebenzisana nedolobha lasekapa ukulwisana nesomiso entshonalanga kapa, okuyisomiso esibi kwesezike zahlasela eminyakeni eyishumi.

src: ngokutsho kwedws iimvula khange zine ngokwaneleyo fu thi amanzi ayashokoxeka emadamini.
tgt: ngokwedws kube nokuntuleka kwezimvula futhi kwehla nezinga lamanzi emadamini.

src: oku kubangele ukuba urhulumente abeke imigqaliselo engqingqwa enkinkisha ukusetyenziswa kwamanzi ngelinge lokuba umhl’omkhulu wokutsha kwamadama nokuphela kwamanzi ungafiki.
tgt: lokhu sekwenze iziphathi mandla zibeke izinyathelo eziqi nile ukunweba isikhathi sokufika kosuku lokuntuleka kwamanzi, lapho amathangi azobe omile.

src: isixeko sasekapa ngoku sisebenzisa imigqaliselo ekwinqa naba 6b.
tgt: idolobha lasekapa liqala imikhawulo yezinga u6b.

src: oku kuthetha ukuba umntu omnye, nokuba usemsebenzini, ekhaya, esikolweni okanye nakweyiphi indawo uvumeleke ukuba asebenzise amanzi azilitha ezingama50 okanye ngaphantsi ngosuku.
tgt: lokhu kuchaza ukuthi kuzoba nomkhawulo wansuku zonke wamalitha amanzi angama50 noma angaphansi kumuntu ngamunye, osekhaya, emsebenzini, esikoleni noma kwenye indawo.

src: nangona isixeko sisenza konke okusemandleni ukulwa ukuba ungafiki omhla omkhulu wokuphela kwamanzi kodwa sithi silungiselela ukufika kwimeko apho sikwaziyo ukonga amanzi aqhube kude kufike iimvula zobusika.
tgt: njengoba idolobha ligxile emizamweni yokulwisana nosuku lokuntuleka kwamanzi, lithe lidinga ukulungiselela isimo lapho lizokwazi ukulawula uhlelo lwedolobha lokuthunyelwa kwamanzi ukuze kuze kufike ubusika.

src: "siza kuzivala iimpompo xa umthamo wamadama ethu ufikelela kwi13.5%.
tgt: "sizokuvala ukuthunyelwa kwamanzi kompompi uma amadamu ethu efika ezingeni elingu13.5%.

src: wakuba umthamo wamadama ufikelele ku13.5%, isixeko siza kuyivala imibhobho emikhulu yokuhambisa amanzi, ivulwe kuphela kwiindawo zoshishino nakumanye amaziko abalulekileyo afana nezibhedlela," sitshilo isixeko kwingxelo ebesiyikhuphile.
tgt: uma izinga lamadamu lifika ku13.5%, bazoqala ukuvala amapayipi athumela amanzi, ngaphandle kwezindawo zezamabhizinisi ezisemqoka kanye nezikhungo, ezifana nezibhedlela," ngokulandisa kwedolobha esitatimendeni salo.

src: xa sifikilele kwesi sigaba, abahlali amanzi baza kuwafumana kwiindawo ezithile eziza kuwankinkisha eziza kuba kuso sonke isixeko.
tgt: uma sekufika lesi sikhathi, izakhamuzi zizokwazi ukuthola amanzi ezizindeni eziphakela ngamanzi edolobheni lonkana.

src: umhlali ngamnye uza kufumana amanzi azilitha ezingama25 ngosuku.
tgt: isakhamuzi ngasinye sizokwabelwa amalitha amanzi anga ma25 ngosuku.

src: isixeko sizivulile iingcango zeziko lemisebenzi yeentlekele (idoc) ukuze ibe lilo elijongene nesicwangciso sentlekele yamanzi.
tgt: idolobha selivule isikhungo esisebenza ngezinhlekelele (idoc) ukusebenzisa uhlelo lwamanzi lwenhlekelele, oluzoqala uma sekufike usuku lokuntuleka kwamanzi.

src: esi sisicwangciso siza kuqala ukusebenza xa amadama esitsha neempompo zamanzi zivalwa.
tgt: amapitsiidolobha selikugxekile ukusetshenziswa kwamapitsi futhi lathi ukusetshenziswa kwawo ukuze kuniselwe kuzoba ihora elilodwa kuphela ngolwesibili kanye nangomgqibelo, ngaphambi kwehora lesi9 ekuseni futhi ngemuva kwehora lesi6 ntambama.

src: izitsalamanziisixeko siyabacela abantu uku ba bangazisebenzisi kakhulu izitsalamanzi ezingaphandle ezindlini.
tgt: "ukusetshenziswa kwamapitsi okanye imithombo yamanzi kufanele kukalwe ngamamitha futhi bonke abakusebenzisayo bagcine amarekhodi azotholakala uma kufanele ahlolwe," kusho idolobha.

src: isixeko sithi ukunkcenkceshela kufuneka kwenziwe isithuba esiyiyure enye futhi oku kwenziwe ngoolwezibini nangemigqibelo kuphela, phambi kwentsimbi yesithoba kusasa nasemva kweyesithandathu emva kwemini.
tgt: lengeze ngokuthi izakhamuzi kufanele zithole imvume kudws uma zifuna ukudayisa noma ukuthenga amanzi asemapitsini/nasemithonjeni yamanzi.

src: amanzi asetyenziswa sisitsa lamanzi neempompo yesitsa lamanzi kufuneka ankinkishwe alinganiswe uze umyinge osetyenzisiweyo ubhalwe phantsi futhi kufuneka babe nazo ezi nkcukacha xa kufike amagosa kamasipala ezokuhlola," sitshilo isixeko.
tgt: njengomzamo kahulumeni wokulawula ukusetshenziswa kwamanzi, idws ithe iziphathimandla zibeke izinyathelo eziqinille ukuqikelela ukuthi ukuphakelwa kwamanzi ngendlela ebekelwe imikhawulo kuyalandelwa.

src: songeze sathi abahlali kufu neka bafumane imvume kwidws ukuba bafuna ukuthenga okanye ukuthengisa amanzi aphuma kwizitsalamanzi.
tgt: idolobha futhi lisebenzisana nethimba eliqinisekisa uku landelwa komthetho kanye nophiko oluphenyayo olukhethekile ukuqikelela ukulandelwa komthetho.

src: njengenxalenye yamalinge karhulumente okulawula indlela asetyenziswa ngayo amanzi, idws ibeke imiqathango engqingqwa ukwenzela ukuba imigqaliselo ebekiweyo yokusetyenziswa kwamanzi ithotyelwe.
tgt: ukuthathela izinyathelo abaphula umthetho umnyango ngokuhlanganyela nedolobha usanda kugasela emfuleni, ugxile ezenzweni zokusetshenziswa kwamanzi ngokungekho semthethweni.

src: isixeko sikwasebenzisana neearhente zogcinomthetho kunye necandelo lophando elikhethekileyo ukuze kunyanziliswe uluntu ukuba lithobele le miqathango.
tgt: lo mkhankaso kuhloswe ngawo ukudingida ukuphulwa kwemithetho kwamanje kanye nokulandela imikhawulo yamanzi, futhi uqondiswe ikakhulukazi ezikhungweni eziwasha izimoto ngokungekho emthethweni.

src: ukuthatha amanyathelo okulwa abarhanelwa kutsha nje isebe liqhube ugqogqo oluqubulisileyo libambisene nesixeko.
tgt: "ngokwamazinga emikhawulo 6b yedolobha, amanzi kama sipala angaphuzwa ngeke asetshenziswe ukuwasha izimoto.

src: olu gqogqo belijoliswe kwiziganeko zolwaphulomthetho olunxulumene namanzi emfuleni.
tgt: izindawo zokuwasha izimoto ezingekho emthethweni zisebenzisa amanzi amaningi.

src: eli phulo lilungiselelwe ukulwa nabo bangathobeli le mithetho ikhoyo yezamanzi nokuba kulandelwe le migqaliselo ikhoyo yezamanzi, kwaye liza kugxininisa kakhulu kwiindawo zokuhlamba iimoto ezingabhaliswanga ngokusesikweni.
tgt: abanikazi bezindawo zokuwasha izimoto abaningi basebenzisa ompompi abafakelwe umphakathi emabhizinisini abo, abanye basebenzisa amanzi ompompi babo," kuchaza umnyango.

src: "ngokwemimiselo yemiqathango yenqanaba 6b, amanzi atyiwayo kamasipala awafenalanga kusetyenziselwa ukuhlamba iimoto.
tgt: nakuba emaningi amanxusa amanzi azimisele asebenzayo ukusiza ukunqanda usuku lokuntuleka kwamanzi, idolobha licele izakhamuzi ukuba zidlale indima yazo ekongeni amanzi.

src: iindawo ezingabhaliswanga zokuhlamba iimoto zisebenzisa amanzi amaninzi.
tgt: "sifuna bonke abasebenzisa amanzi bajoyine imizamo yedolobha lasekapa," ngokusho kwephini likasodolobha wasekapa uian neilson.

src: abanikazi bamashishini okuhlamba iimoto basebenzisa amathumbu amanzi, bona abanye basebenzisa amanzi eempompo zabo," isebe litshilo.
tgt: amasu okonga amanzi vala umpompi uma uxubha, ushefa noma ugcoba insipho ezandleni ngena eshaweni isikhashana futhi usebenzise amanzi amancane uma ugeza gwema ukusebenzisa amanzi athengwayo.

src: nangona ekhona amagosa amaninzi ezamanzi ancedisa kwidabi lokuba singade sifikelele kumhl’omkhulu wokoma kweempompo, isixeko sihlaba ikhwelo nakubahlali ukuba nabo badlale eyabo indima bonge amanzi.
tgt: imoto washa imoto yakho ngebhakede nesiphontshi kuphela.

src: amacetyana okonga amanzi yivale impompo xa uxukuxa, utsheva okanye uhlamba izandla.
tgt: amagumbi okugeza ngena eshaweni esikhundleni sikabhavu sebenzisa amanzi amancane kubhavu geza izingane ezincane ndawonye fulasha indlu yangasese kuphela uma kunephunga beka isitini endishini yamanzi okufulasha ukunciphisa ukusetshenziswa kwamanzi.

src: ungathathi ixesha kwishawa futhi usebenzise amanzi amancinci xa uhlamba ebhafini.
tgt: ekhishini sebenzisa usinki ovalwayo uma ugeza izitsha, esikhundleni sikampompi sebenzisa insipho yokugeza izitsha encane, ukugwema isidingo sokuhlambulula sebenzisa usinki ovaliwe uma uhlambulula imifino, esikhundleni sikampompi sebenzisa amanzi owasebenzise ukuhlambulula izithelo nemifino uma unisela izitshalo.

src: imoto xa uhlamba imoto yakho sebenzisa ibhakhethi nesiphontshi kuphela.
tgt: izimbali nesivande nisela izimbali uma sekupholile nisela izimbali ngamanzi owasebenzise ekhishini ukuhlambulula izithelo nemifino sebenzisa umanyolo wemvelo nongenamakhemikhali esivandeni.

src: kwindlu yangasese hlamba ngeshawa endaweni yokuhlambela ebhafini abantwana bahlambe ngaxeshanye, kunye.
tgt: amalungu omphakathi ayacelwa ukuba asebenzise amamitha amanzi ukuhlola ukuconsa kwamanzi okungabikiwe.

src: gungxula kuphela xa kukho imfuneko faka isitena kwitankana lamanzi lendlu yangasese ukuze unciphise indlela eliwasebenzisa ngayo amanzi.
tgt: funda imitha yamanzi ngaphambi futhi ngemuva kwesikhathi esingamahora amabili, uma engekho amanzi aseke asetshenziswa.

src: ekhitshini yivale isinki xa uhlamba izitya, ungazihlambi impompo ivuliwe ungayifaki kakhulu isepha, ukulungisela ukuba kungabiko mfuneko yokupula yivale isinki xa uhlamba imifuno, ungayihlambi impompo ivulilwe amanzi ebaleka.
tgt: uma imitha yamanzi ingasafani, kuchaza ukuthi kukhona lapho econsa khona.

src: nkcenkceshela iintyatyambo ngamanzi obuhlamba ngawo iziqhamo nemifuno.
tgt: izakhamuzi ziyacelwa ukuba zilungise ompompi abaconsayo.

src: vuka uzilwele, xela kwabasemagunyeni izenzo zokudlwengulwa adele schormann ukuba lixhoba lokuxhatshazwa ngokwe sondo okanye lokudlwengulwa yenye yezinto ezi yintlungu nezingcu ngcuthekisa umphefumlo.
tgt: buyisa amandla akho, bika ngokunukubezwa adele schormann ukuba isisulu soku nukubezwa ngoko cansi noma ukudlwengulwa kuyinto ebu hlungu nethusayo umuntu angabhekana nayo.

src: yiyo loo nto amapolisa omzantsi afrika (isaps) ivule amacandelo neeofisi zokwenza ukuba kube lula ukuba abantu bawazise ngaphambili la matyala.
tgt: ingakho umbutho wamaphoyisa waseningizimu afrika (isaps) usubeke izinhlelo zokwenza kube lula futhi kuphephe kubantu ukubika lobu bugebengu.

src: isithethi samapolisa sephondo lasempumalanga ucolonel mtsholi bhembe uthi kubalulekile ukuba uluntu lusebenzisane namapolisa luzizise ngaphambili ezi zenzo zolwaphulomthetho.
tgt: okhulumela amaphoyisa ase mpumalanga ucolonel mtsholi bhembe uthe kubalulekile ukuba umphakathi usebenzisane namaphoyisa futhi ubike lobu bugebengu.

src: "njengemapolisa, ngumse benzi wethu ukuqinisekisa ukuba abenzi bobubi baziswa ngaphambili nokuba amaxhoba afumana unakelelo olunenkathalo.
tgt: "njengamaphoyisa, kuwum sebenzi wethu ukudlala indi ma enkulu ukuqinisekisa uku thi ababhebhezeli bayabanjwa futhi izisulu zobugebengu zi sezandleni eziphephile.

src: siyabacela abantu ukuba bawaxele kwizikhululo zamapolisa ezikufutshane nabo amatyala okudlwengulwa," utshilo ubhembe.
tgt: sicela ukuba umphakathi uze ubike amacala okudlwengulwa eziteshini zamaphoyisa eziseduzane," kuqhuba ubhembe.

src: amaxhoba kufuneka awax ele kwabasemagunyeni amatyala anxulumene nokuxhatshazwa ngokwesondo singaphelanga isithuba esiziyure ezingama72 emva kokuba ehlaselwe.
tgt: izisulu zokunukubezwa kufanele zibike ubugebengu bezocansi emaphoyiseni engakapheli amahora angama72 kwenzeke ubugebengu.

src: ubhembe ucebisa amaxhoba okudlwengulwa ukuba afune uncedo lweengcali zokuthuthuzela nokucebisa umntu owenzakele emphefumlweni xa bethe bangamaxhoba eli nyala.
tgt: ubhembe uyalele izisu lu zokudlwengulwa ukuba zifune usizo lokululekwa ngemuva kwezigameko ezithusayo ezibuhlungu.

src: "ungaziva uzonyanya ufune ukuzihlamba uphindaphinda futhi ude woyike nokuphuma ngaphandle ubonwe ngabantu.
tgt: "ungazizwa ungcolile futhi ugeze uphindelela futhi usabe ukuphuma.

src: zonke ezi zinto ziqhelekile.
tgt: akukho okungajwayelekile kulokhu futhi nokungaqhelekile.

src: kodwa kufuneka ukhumbule ukuba zikhona iinkonzo ezilungiselelwe ukunceda wena," utshilo.
tgt: kufanele ukhumbule ukuthi kunosizo olutholakalayo ukukusiza," esaqhuba.

src: igreater rape intervention project (grip) yeminyeyemibutho enceda amaxho ba odlwengulo ukuba aye kuhlolela intsholongwane kagawulayo nogawulayo (ihiv/aids) nezinye izifo.
tgt: igreater rape intervention project (igrip) enye yezinhlangano ezisiza izisulu zokudlwengulwa ukuba zihlole igciwane lesandulelangculazi (ihiv) nengculazi (iaids) nezinye izifo.

src: unontlalontle osebenzela igrip uthandiwe maseko uthi lo mbutho unceda amaxhoba okudlwengulwa.
tgt: usonhlalakahle wegrip uthandiwe maseko uthe le nhlangano inakekela izisulu zokudlwengulwa.

src: "amaxhoba siwanceda ngeenkonzo zonakekelo futhi siwanike nendawo yokuhlala efanelekileyo ade akulungele ukuthetha.
tgt: "sihlinzekela ngokunakekela futhi sivumele izisulu zihlale endlini lapho ziqashwe khona zize zikulungele ukukhuluma.

src: sineengcali ezinenkathalo neziwaziyo umse benzi wazo ezinceda amaxho ba," utshilo.
tgt: sinabaluleki abaphambili futhi abanakekelayo kakhulu abalindele ukukusiza," ngokusho kwakhe.

src: e indlela yokuvula ityala lokudlwengulwa emapoliseni: ■ qala ngokuya eklinikhi uyoxilongwa.
tgt: libikwa kanjani emaphoyiseni icala lokudlwengulwa: ■ okokuqala, hamba uye emtholampilo ukuze uhlolwe.

src: ingxelo yoxilongo iza kuba yinxalenye yeli tyala uza kulivula futhi iza kunceda amapolisa akwazi ukubamba umenzi wobubi.
tgt: umbiko uzoba ingxenye yefayele lecala futhi uzosiza amaphoyisa ukubamba umsolwa.

src: ■ emva koko ungaya kwisikhululo samapolisa esikufutshane nawe uvule ityala.
tgt: ■ bese uya esiteshini samaphoyisa esiseduze uvule icala.

src: ipolisa liza kufuna ulinike iinkcukacha zakho futhi uchaze nokuba kwenzeke ntoni.
tgt: iphoyisa lizobuza imininingwane eqondene nawe futhi nokukwehlele.

src: phendula ngokunyanisekileyo futhi uqinisekise ukuba akukho nto uyishiyelelayo.
tgt: phendula ngokuthembeka futhi uzame ukukhumbula imininingwane eminingi.

src: ukuvula ityala nokubalisa kwakhona le ntlungu kungabuhlungu, kodwa kufuneka wazi ukuba ezi nkcukacha ziza kunceda kuphando lwabecuphi.
tgt: kungaba uhlelo olubuhlungu, kodwa imininingwane izosiza uma sekwenziwa uphenyo.

src: ukubhalisela uvoto kuza kuba ngeyokwi ndla yowama2018 more matshediso iiec yomzantsi afrika yazise umjikelo woku qala wempelaveki yoku bhalisela uvoto kunyulo lwama2019, kwaye ibo ngoze abavoti abafanele kileyo kweli liphela ukuba batyelele izikhululo zabo zovoto bahlaziye iinkcukacha zabo kumqulu woluhlu lwabavoti okanye babhalisele uvoto.
tgt: ukubhalisela ukuvota kuzoba ngondasa wezi2018 more matshedisoi iec yaseningizimu afri ka seyimemezele impe lasonto yokuqala yokub halisela kwabavoti ukhetho lowezi2019 futhi seyinxenxe abafanele ukuvota ezweni lonke ukuthi bavakashele izikhungo zabo zokuvota ukuze balungise imininingwane yabo ohlwini lwabavoti noma ukuze babhalisele ukuvota.

src: igosa eliyintloko lonyulo lekomishoni, usy mama bolo, uthe zonke izikhu lulo zovoto ezingama22 612 ziza kuvula ngempela veki yomhla we10 nowe11 kweyokwindla yowama2018 ukususela ngentsimbi ye8 kusasa ukuya kweye5 emva kwemini.
tgt: isikhulu sokhetho esiyinhloko sekhomishana usy mamabolo uthe zonke izikhungo zokuvota eziyizi22 612 zizovula ngempelasonto yangomhla ziyi10 kanye namhla ziyi11 kundasa wezi2018, kusukela ngele8 ekuseni kuze kube ngele5 ntambama, ukuze kwenziwe kube lula futhi kusize abavoti ukuthi bafake imininingwane yabo yakamuva yokubhalisa noma ukuthi ba bhalise.

src: oku kwenzelwa okokuba kube lula kwaye kuncede abavoti bahlaziye iinkcukacha zabo zovoto okanye ba bhalise.
tgt: uma uthuthele endaweni entsha kusukela mhla ugcina ukubha lisela ukuvota, kumele ubhalise esifundeni sakho sokuvota esisha.

src: okokuba ufudukele kwenye indawo engeyiyo le wawuhlala kuyo ukugqibela kwakho ukuvota, kufune ka uphinde ubhalise kwesi sithili sakho sitsha sovoto.
tgt: izakhamuzi zaseningizimu afrika ezineminyaka yobudala eyi16 kanye nangaphezulu ezinomazisi noma ikhadi elisemthethweni zingabhalisela ukuvota.

src: okokuba akubhalisanga, aku sayi kuvunyelwa okokuba uvote ngowama2019.
tgt: uma ungabhalisanga, angeke uze uvunyelwe ukuthi uvote ngowezi2019.

src: abavoti ababhalisileyo abaneenkcukacha zeedilesi zabo ezingekhoyo kumqulu woluhlu lwabavoti, iinkcu kacha ezifunekayo bangazi nikezela kwizikhululo zabo zovoto xa kubhaliswa.
tgt: abavoti ababhalisiwe, abanemininingwane yabo yekheli engekho ohlwini lwabavoti, bangahlinzeka imininingwane edingekayo esikhungweni sabo sokuvota ngesikhathi sokubhalisa.

src: "sifuna abavoti beze baze basebenzise eli thuba," utshilo umamabolo.
tgt: "sidinga ukuthi abavoti bafike futhi basebenzise ithuba," kusho umamabolo.

src: "ikomi shoni yonyulo kungoku nje ayikabinazo nangoku iidilesi zabavoti abamalunga nezigidi ezi2.8.
tgt: "ikhomishani yokhetho ezimele ayikabi namakheli abavoti cishe abayizigidi eziyi2.8.

src: ngaphezu koko kukho iidilesi ezizigidi ezi3.5 ezihlelwe "njengezi ngagqibekanga" okanye "ezi ngacacanga."
tgt: ngaphezu kwalokho sinamakheli ayizigidi eziyi3.5 abekwe kuhlu ‘lwa ngaphelele’ noma ‘angacacile’.

src: olu didi lufuna ukuphinda luhlahlelwe ukuqinisekisa okokuba ngaba zikho na ezinye iinkcukacha ezikhoyo," wongeze ngeli tshoyo.
tgt: lo mkhakha usadinga ukuhlaziywa futhi ukuze kutholakale ukuthi ngabe kukhona yini eminye imininingwane etholakalayo," kwengeza yena.

src: ikomishoni ifumene iidile si ngokusebenzisa amali nge awohlukeneyo aquka ukuhlaziya iingxelo, iifayi li neendawo zokulondolo za izibhalo ezibalulekileyo.
tgt: ikhomishani ithola amakheli ngokusebenzisa izinhlelo ezahlukene, ezihlanganisa ukubukeza amarekhodi, amafayela kanye nezinqolobane zemibhalo ukuze ibheke bese ifaka amakheli ahlinzekwe abavoti eminyakeni engama20 edlule, ngokuqoqa amakheli ngokhetho lomasipala lowezi2016, kanye nokwenza umsebenzi wokufuna bukhoma kungekafiki impelasonto yoku bhalisela ukhetho lokuchibiyela.

src: oku ikwenzela ukukhangela nokufumana iidilesi ezinikezelwe ngabavoti kwimi nyaka engama20 edluleyo; ngexesha iqokelela iidilesi ngexesha lonyulo loomasipala lowama2016; nangokwe nza uphando lwangapha ndle ngaphambi kweempe laveki zokubhalisela unyulo lovalosikhewu.
tgt: lapho kwakunesidingo khona, abavoti abatholakale bebhaliswe ezifundeni zokuvota ezingafanele basuswa, njengalokho kuhlinzekwe kusigaba 12 (1)(d) somthetho wokhetho.

src: apho kuyimfuneko khona, abavoti ekufumaniseke okokuba babhaliswe kwizithi li zovoto ezingachanekanga, basuswa apho ngokweca ndelo 12 (1)(d) lomthetho wonyulo.
tgt: "sesithole futhi sasebenzisa, lapho bekwenzeka khona, imininingwane yamakheli kweminye imithombo yombuso efana nestatistics south africa, isouth african social security agency, utelkom, isouth african post office kanye nomnyango wezasekhaya," kusho yena.

src: "siye safumana saze sasebenzisa, imithombo yeedi lesi ekwamanye amacande lo ombuso afana neziko lee nkcukachamanani lomza ntsi afrika (istatistics south africa), iarhente yezibonelelo zezentlalo nomhla laphantsi yomzantsi afrika (isassa), utelkom, iposi yomzantsi afrika nesebe lemicimbi yasekhaya, apho sikwaziyo khona, " utshilo.
tgt: bhalisa ngaphambi kukandasa wezi2018 ngomfumfu wezi2017 ikhomishani yokhetho ezimele yethula isizindalwazi (www.

src: elections.

tgt: org.

src: za isenzela abavoti ababhalisiweyo abaneintanethi ukuze bahlaziye baze banikezele ngeedilesi zabo, okanye, banikezele ngeedilesi zabo.
tgt: za) kubavoti ababhalisiwe abakwazi ukufinyelela kuinthanethi ukuze babukeze bese/noma bahlinzeke ngamakheli abo.

src: kanti ke abavoti banako nokutsalela umnxeba iziko lonxibelelwano kule nombolo: 0800 11 8000 ukususela ngomvulo ukuya kulwesihlanu ngamaxesha omsebenzi.
tgt: abavoti bangashayela isikhungo sokuxhumana ucingo (0800 11 8000), kusukela ngomsombuluko ukuya ngolwesihlanu ngezikhathi zomsebenzi, ukuze bathole ukulekelelwa ngezindawo okutholakala kuzo izikhungo zabo zokuvota kanye nanganoma yini enye abafisa ukuyibuza.

src: oku bangakwenza xa befuna uncedo malunga nalapho sikhoyo isikhululo sabo sovoto nezinye izinto abafuna ukuziqonda.
tgt: abavoti ababhalisiwe bangathumela futhi ngesms inombolo yabo kamazisi ku32810 ukuze bathole isms enekheli lesikhungo sabo sokuvota (isms ibiza ur1).

src: sindisa imikhombe yeli more matshediso umphathiswa wesebe lezendalo uedna molewa, ukhuphe ingxelo yokuqala yenkqube la yowama2018 malunga nendlela karhulumente edibeneyo yecebo lolawulo ukuze kuliwe ukuzingelwa kwemikhombe ngokungekho mthethweni.
tgt: sindisani obhejane bakithi more matshediso ungqongqoshe wezendawo, ued na molewa, usekhi phe umbiko wokuqala wezi2018 wenqubekela phambili eseyibe khona ngokuphathelene nesu likahulumeni lokwengamela elididiyela izinhlaka eziningi lokuqeda ukuzingelwa kobhejane.

src: le ngxelo, equka ikota yokugqibela yowama2017, ibonisa inkqubela ekuba njweni kwabantu abaliqela, uphando nempumelelo eku gwetyweni kwabo bazinge la imikhombe ngokungekho mthethweni, nabathengisa iimpondo zayo ngokungekho mthethweni nokuhla kanci nci kwenani lemikhombe ezingelwa ngokungekho mthethweni esizweni jikelele kowama2017 (1028), xa kuthelekiswa nowama2016 (1054).
tgt: umbiko, ohlanganisa nekota yokugcina yowezi2017, ukhombisa inqubekela phambili ngokuphathelene nenani lababoshiwe, uphenyo kanye nabazingela bese beshushu mbisa izimpondo zobhejane asebegwetshiwe kanye nokwehla kancane kwesibalo sobhejane abazingelwa kuzwelonke ngowezi2017 (1028), uma kuqhathaniswa nowezi2016 (1054).

src: ngowama2017 kubanjwe iimpondo zemikhombe izihla ndlo ezisibhozo kwisikhu lulo senqwelomoya sezi zwengezizwe ior tambo international airport kwaza kwabanjwa abatyholwa abangama502 ngokuzingela imikhombe ngokungekho mthethweni nabatyholwa ngokurhweba ngokungekho mthethweni abali16.
tgt: ngowezi2017 kwaba khona ukwemukwa kwezimpondo zobhejane okuyisishiyagalo mbili esikhumulweni sezindiza ior tambo international futhi kwaboshwa abangama502 abasolwa ngokuzingela obhe jane nabayi16 abasolwa ngo kushushumbisa izimpondo zobhejane, nokwaholela ekutheni isibalo sibe ngama518, sehla sisuka kuma680 ngowezi2016.

src: lilonke inani lababanjwayo ngama518, nani elo elihle livela kuma680 kowama2016.
tgt: "kuyadumaza ukuthi, abasebenzi bethu abangama21 baboshelwa ukuzibandaka nya nokuzingelwa kobhejane ngowezi2017," kusho ungqongqoshe umolewa.

src: "ngelishwa, amagosa ethu angama21 nawo abanjwa malunga nemicimbi enxulu mene nokuzingela imikho mbe ngokungekho mthethwe ni kowama2017," utshilo umphathiswa molewa.
tgt: ukunqanda ukuzingelwa kobhejaneuhulumeni kanye nabambi sene nabo sebesebenzise izi ndlela ezahlukene nokunqanda ukuzingelwa kobhejane, ezi hlanganisa izinhlelo zokuqapha eziqiwini zikazwelonke kanye nokusebenzisa ubuchwe pheshe obuguqula isimo.

src: phakathi kwenyanga yomqungu neyomnga yowama2017 kuzingelwe imikhombe engama504 ngokungekho mthethweni ekruger national park (knp).
tgt: phakathi kukamasingana kanye nozibandlela wezi2017, kwazingelwa obhejane abangama504 ekruger national park (knp), nokungamaphesenti ehle ngama24 kunama662 angowezi2016.

src: loo nto yenze ukuba inani lihle ngeepesenti ezingama24 xa kuthelekiswa nama662 kowama2016.
tgt: "ngenxa yendlela yokunqanda ukuzingelwa kobhejane eknp sibona yehla imizamo yokuzingelwa kobhejane esiqiwini, kuqoshwe izi2662 ngowezi2017 uma kuqhathaniswa nezi2883 ngowezi2016.

src: "ngenxa yecebo lethu lokulwa ukuzingelwa kwemikhombe ngokungekho mthethweni eknp sibona lisihla inani lokuzingelwa kwemikhombe ngokungekho mthethweni.
tgt: lokhu kukhombisa ukwehla kwamaphesenti ngo7.6," kuqinisa ungqongqoshe.

src: yimikhombe engama2662 eyaziwayo ezingelwe ngokungekho mthethweni kowama2017 xa kuthelekiswa nengama2883 kowama2016.
tgt: noma kunjalo, sekwenyuke isibalo sobhejane abazingelwe kwazulunatali, enyakatho kapa, empumalanga, efreyi stata kanye nasesifundazweni sasenyakathontshonalanga.

src: loo nto ithi oku kuzingelwa kuhle nge7.6 yeepesenti," uqinisekisile umphathiswa.
tgt: umthelela kwezomnothoukuzingelwa kobhejane kanye nokushushumbiswa kwezi lwane kunomthelela omubi ekuthuthukisweni komnotho wezwe kanye nasekudalweni kwamathuba omsebenzi, okuhlanganisa ukuthuthukiswa komnotho onhlobonhlobo wezemvelo ohlanganisa no mkhakha wezokuvakasha.

src: kambe, inani lemikhombe ezingelwe ngokungekho mthethweni linyukile kwazulunatal, emntla koloni, empumalanga, efreyistata nasemntla ntshona.
tgt: "ukulahleka kohlobo lwezi lwane oluyingqalabutho kakhulu lwaseningizimu afrika olufana nobhejane, nongesinye ‘sezilwane ezinkulu ezinhlanu’ kungaba nomthelela omubi ngokuphathelene nenani lezivakashi eningizimu afrika.

src: ifuthe kuqoqoshoukuzingelwa kwemikhombe ngokungekho mthethweni nokurhweba ngezilwanyana zasendle okungekho mthe thweni kunefuthe elibi ekuphuhliseni uqoqosho lwelizwe nokudala imi sebenzi, kuquka noku phuhliswa koqoqosho lwezilwanyana nezityalo ezahlukeneyo okubandaka nya necandelo lezokhe nketho.
tgt: izivakashi eziningi eziza eningizimu afrika zizela ukuzobona izilwane ezinhlanu ezinkulu, nokuwubhejane, ibhubesi, inyathi, ingwe kanye nendlovu," kusho isitatimende somnyango wezendawo.

src: "ukuphela kwezinye zeentlo bo zezilwanyana zasendle eziyimbalasane emzantsi afrika ezifana nomkhombe, oyinxalenye ‘yezona zilwa nyana zikhulu zihlanu’ ezibizwa "ibig five," kunga nefuthe elibi kwinani laba khenkethi abatyelela umza ntsi afrika.
tgt: ukuzingelwa kobhejane sekwaziswe njengengozi yezokuphepha ezweni, enga ba nomthelela kuamanani ezivakashi ezivakashela izwe, futhi uhulumeni usememezele ukuthi kuwubugebengu obuse qhulwini kuzwelonke.

src: uninzi lwabakhe nkethi lutyelela umzantsi afrika kuba lufuna ukubona le big five ukutsho ke umkho mbe, ingonyama, inyathi, ihlosi nendlovu," isebe lezendalo litshilo kwingxelo eliyikhuphileyo.
tgt: izenzo ezingekho semthe thweni ezihlanganiswa nokuzingelwa kobhejane kanye nokushushumbiswa kwezi mpondo zobhejane kuhlo mulisa amaqembu amancane emigulukudu.

src: ukuzingelwa kwemikhombe ngokungekho mthethweni kubonwa njengento eyingozi kukhuseleko lwelizwe, nto leyo enganefuthe kwinani labakhenkethi abatyelela eli lizwe, kwaye urhulumente ukubhengeze njengolwaphulomthetho oluphambili esizweni.
tgt: "la maqembu emigulukudu ahlomula ngenxa yokuba yinkimbinkimbi kwalolu hlobo lobugebengu.

src: imisa yanceda ingcali yezokwakhiwa kweedolophi more matshediso ukukhulela kwikhaya elihlelelekileyo ne likhokelwa ngu mama ongatshatanga onga phangeliyo kungakwenza uzidele futhi uzoyikisele kwezinye izinto kodwa oku zange kumthintele uvele mukhodiwa ekuleqeni iphupha lakhe lokuba yingca li yokwakhiwa kweedolo phu.
tgt: imisa iwuhlelo elasiza umhleli womumo wedolobha more matshediso ukukhula ekhaya eli dla imbuya ngothi eliphethwe umama ngayedwana ebe engase benzi kungawavimba ama thuba empumelelo, kodwa akuzange kumvimbe uvele mukhodiwa ekulandeleni i phupho lakhe lokuba umhleli womumo wedolobha.

src: umukhodiwa, ovela kwi lali yaseluheni kumasi pala wengingqi yasethulamela elimpo po, wafumana imfu ndo yesidanga kwi urban and regional planni ng kwiyunivesithi yasevenda ngowama2016.
tgt: umukhodiwa, odabuka esigodini saseluheni kumasipala wasekhaya ithulame la elimpopo, uthole iziqu zeurban and regional pla nning enyuvesi yasevenda ngowezi2016.

src: ungomnye wabantu aba xhamla kwiarhente yenkxa so kamasipala yeziseko zezi bonelelo (imisa) yenkqubo yezithwalazidanga ezitsha.
tgt: ungomunye wabahlomule ohlelweni lokweseka ingqa lasizinga kamasipala lwa bantu abasha abathweswe iziqu (imisa), oluhlose ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abathweswe iziqu ezingeni lemfudo ephakeme bakwazi ukungena emsebenzini babone okwenziwayo futhi bacathuliswe emsebenzini emikhakheni yezobuchwe pheshe ukuze bakwazi uku bhaliswa njengochwepheshe.

src: imisa yinkqubo ezamela izi thwalazidanga amathu ba emisebenzi nawokufu mana uqeqesho ngomse benzi usemsebenzi ni kwiinkalo ezifunekayo zobugcisa ukuze zibhaliswe njengeengcali.
tgt: imisa iwuhlaka lukahu lumeni kazwelonke olu ngaphansi komnyango wo kwengamela ngokubambi sana.

src: yasekwa ngekaca nzibe ngowama2012.
tgt: yasungulwa kunhlaba 2012.

src: "emva kokuphumelela iba nga le12 ngowama2008, nda nyanzeleka ukuba ndibe nonyaka endingabhali swanga ndawo kuwo ukuze ndicebe indlela endiza kuyi hlawula ngayo iimali zase yunivesithi," watsho umu khodiwa.
tgt: "emuva kokuqeda umatikuletsheni ngowezi2008, kwaba nesidingo sokuthi ngithathe ikhefu lonyaka ukuze ngithole indlela yokukhokha izindleko zasenyuvesi," ku sho umukhodiwa.

src: ngowama2010, wabhalisa kwiyunivesithi yaserhawu tini kodwa ingxaki yema li zange imvumele ukuba awugqibe unyaka wokuqala wakhe waze wanyanzeleka ukuba asiyeke isikolo.
tgt: ngowezi2010, wabhalisa enyuvesi yasegoli kodwa akabanga nemali eyanele ukuthi aqede unyaka wakhe wokuqala, kwase kuphoqele ka ukuthi ashiye phansi.

src: kunyaka olandelayo, wabhalisela izifu ndo zen3 kwielectrical engineering kwikholeji ya lapha kodwa wakhawuleza waqonda ukuba ezo zifundo azilobizo lwakhe.
tgt: ngonyaka olandelayo, wa bhalisela izifundo zobunjini yela, ielectrical engineering n3 ekolishi langakubo kepha washesha ukubona ukuthi bengadalelwanga lezo zifu ndo.

src: waphinda waqalisa ukuthumela izicelo kwiiyunivesithi ngethemba lokufumana inkxasomali yokufunda.
tgt: waphinda futhi wathu mela izicelo zokufunda emanyuvesi ethemba ukuthi uzothola uxhaso.

src: ngethamsanqa, iyunivesithi yasevenda yasamkela isicelo sakhe waze waqalisa ngesidanga kwiurban and regional planning ngowama2012.
tgt: ngenhlanhla, inyuvesi yasevenda yasamukela isicelo sakhe, waqala ukufundela iziqu zeurban and regional planning ngowezi2012.

src: "isikimu sikazwelonke so ncedo lwabafundi nge mali yokufunda (insfas) sandihlawulela izifundo zam zonyaka wokuqala yaza imisa yandinika ibhasari xa bendisenza u nyaka wam wesibini ya ndixhasa ngolo hlobo ndade ndazigqiba izifundo zam ngowama2016," watsho.
tgt: "uhlelo lokuxhasa abafu ndi ngezimali kuzwelonke (insfas) lwakhokhela izifundo zami zonyaka wokuqala, imisa yangipha umfundaze sengisonyanke ni wesibili futhi yangeseka ngaze ngaqeda izifundo zami ngowezi2016," kusho yena.

src: ibhasari yahlawula zonke iindleko zakhe zemfundo, kuquka ukuhlohlwa, iincwadi, indawo yokuhlala noku tya.
tgt: umfundaze wahlangabezana nazo zonke izidingo zakhe zemfundo, okubandakanya imali yezifundo, izincwadi, indawo yokuhlala kanye nokudla.

src: ngo2017 umukhodi wa waqalisa ngengqesho yoqhelaniso nomsebe nzi kumasipala wengingqi waseprince albert kwisebe leenkonzo zemisebe nzi yesebe nezoluntu.
tgt: ngowezi2017 umukhodiwa waqala uhlelo lokuqashwa okwesikhashana ngenhloso yokufundiswa umsebe nzi kumasipala wasekhaya iprince albert emnyangweni wezemisebenzi yokwesekwa komnyango kanye nompha kathi.

src: "akunakuze ushiywe lixe sha ekufikeni apho ufuna ukuba khona ebomini.
tgt: "ungafinyelela lapho ofu na ukuya khona noma ku nini.

src: kufuneka wenze konke okuse mandleni akho ukuguqula iimeko okuzo ngokunjalo uphucule iimeko ophila kuzo," utshilo umukho diwa.
tgt: kumele wenze konke okusemandleni ukushintsha izimo zakho futhi uthuthu kise izimo ophila ngaphansi kwazo," kusho umukhodiwa.

src: inkqubo yezithwalazida nga ezitsha imi sa ngoku inezithwa lazidanga ezingama70, kuquka iingcali zokucwa ngcisa nokwakhiwa kweedo lophu neengingqi ezinga ma31, iinjineli zombane ezi ngama24, iinjineli zezokwa kha ezili12 kunye nee ngcali zezokwakha na baphathi beeprojekthi abathathu.
tgt: uhlelo lwabantu abasha abathweswe iziqu imisa lunabathweswe iziqu abangama70, okubandaka nya abahleli bomumo wama dolobha nezifunda abanga ma31, onjiniyela obuqodene nogesi abangama24, onjiniyela abaqondene nezokudwe ba, ukwakha nokulungisa okwakhiwe abayi12 kanye nabaphathi bamaphrojekthi nezinkontileka abathathu.

src: bonke bakoo masipala kuwo onke amapho ndo alithoba njengenxenye yenkqubo.
tgt: bonke basingethwe omasipala kuzo zonke izifundazwe eziyisishiyagalolunye nje ngengxenye yohlelo.

src: intloko yesigqeba esila wulayo (iceo) elibambela yemisa untandazo vimba uthe iofisi yakhe iyakuqonda ukuba kukho ingxaki enkulu yokunqongophala kweengcali ezinezakhono zobunjineli nezokwakha emzantsi afrika.
tgt: isikhulu esiphezulu (iceo) esiyibamba semisa unta ndazo vimba uthe ihhovisi lakhe liyaqonda ukuthi ini ngizimu afrika idinga kakhu lu abantu abanamakhono obunjiniyela nezokwakha.

src: "asifuni kuphela abantu abatsha abaneziqiniseki so zemfundo kwezi zifundo, kodwa sifuna ukuqinisekisa ukuba bafumana uqeqesho oluku mgangatho wehlabathi ji kelele kwaye bazingcali ezi bhalisiweyo," watsho uvi mba.
tgt: "asifuni abantu abasha abaneziqu kule mikhakha kuphela, kodwa kumele siqinisekise ukuthi baqeqe shwe ngendlela esezingeni lomhlaba futhi bangochwe pheshe ababhalisiwe," kusho uvimba.

src: "oomasipala banengxa ki enkulu yokunqo ngaphala kweengca li ezinezakhono eziku mgangatho ophezulu.
tgt: "omasipala bethu baba dinga kakhulu ochwepheshe.

src: sinoxanduva olukhu lu lokuqinisekisa ukuba oomasipala banabasebe nzi abazingcali ezineza khono ezikumgangatho ophezulu, ngokusebenzi sa amalinge ethu oku xhobisa abasebenzi ngeza khono," uqokele watsho.
tgt: sinomthwalo omkhulu wo kwenza uhulumeni wase khaya ube nochwepheshe, ngokusebenzisa izinhlelo zethu zokuvukuza ama khono," esho engezela.

src: abazali baza kuzibalula kunyulo lweesgb abazali banethuba lokudlala indima ephambili kulawulo lwezikolo zikarhulumente ngenjongo yokuphucula umgangatho wokusebenza nokwenza isikolo sibe yindawo ephucukileyo yabantwana babo.
tgt: abazali bazobamba iqhaza okhethweni lwesgb abazali banethuba lokubamba iqhaza lobuholi ekulawulweni kokuphathwa kwezikole zikahulumeni ngenhloso yokuthuthukisa isimo kanye nokwenza isikole sabantwana babo sibe indawo engcono.

src: unyulo lwamaqu mrhu olawula lwesikolo (isgb) luza kubanjwa ngeyo kwindla kwaye abaza li bayathundezwa ukuba bathathe inxaxheba ukuze babandakanyeke kwimfu ndo yabantwana babo.
tgt: ukhetho lwesigungu esilawulwa uku phathwa kwesikole (isgb) lubanjwa kundasa futhi abazali banxuswa ukuthi bazibandakanye ukuze ba bambe iqhaza elibonakalayo emfundweni yezingane zabo.

src: unyulo luza kwenziwa kuzo zonke izikolo zika rhulumente kulo lonke eli lizwe.
tgt: ukhetho luzobanjwa kuzo zonke izikole zikahulumeni ezweni lonkana.

src: umphathiswa wemfu ndo esisiseko uangie motshekga uthe olu lelona nyulo lukhulu kweli lizwe, ngaphandle konyulo luka rhulumente weengingqi (oo masipala) nolukazwelonke.
tgt: ungqongqoshe weze mfundo eyisisekelo uangie motshekga uthe le yinqubo yokhetho enkulukazi ezweni, engaphandle kokhetho lohulumeni basekhaya kanye no hulumeni kazwelonke.

src: "unyulo lweesgb lwe nza ukuba uluntu nabahla li bazive beyinxalenye fu thi benesabelo kwimfundo yabantwana.
tgt: "ukhetho lwesgb lunegale lo ekutheni umphakathi uzi zwele ingumnikazi wendawo yawo.

src: umgangatho wokusebenza wezikolo ukholisa ukuphucuka xa abazali bezibandakanya ngenkuthalo nangomdla kwimicimbi yesikolo.
tgt: imiphumela yesikole ivame ukuba ngcono lapho abazali bezibandakanya ngokugcwele futhi benentshi sekelo ezindabeni zesikole.

src: "uthe iisgb zinendima enkulu ezifanele ukuyi dlala ukuqinisekisa uku ba zonke izinto ezibalule kileyo neziphambili kubo bonke abachaphazelekayo zithathelwa ingqalelo ukuze kulwelwe ukuzalisekisa imibono yabo yeziphumo ezincumisayo zemfundo ezihambelana ngqo nee mfuno zoluntu nophuhliso loqoqosho.
tgt: "amasgb anendima enku lu okumele ayidlale eku qinisekiseni ukuthi izidingo zabo bonke ababambiqhaza ziyahambelana, ngenhloso yokufezekisa injongo efanayo yokuzuza imiphumela yezemfundo emihle, ezo kwazi ukubhekelela izidi ngo zomphakathi kanye ne ntuthuko yezomnotho.

src: iisgb zimele bonke aba ntu abachaphazelekayo na badlala indima.
tgt: isgb imele zonke izinhla ka zomphakathi wesikole, okubandakanya abazali, othisha, abasebenzi aba ngafundisi kanye nabafu ndi.

src: ixesha elihlalwa ngamalu ngu esgb yiminyaka emi thathu.
tgt: isikhathi sokusebenza kwamalungu esgb siyimi nyaka emithathu.

src: amagunya okulawula izikoloumthetho wezikolo zase mzantsi afrika unika iisgb amagunya abalulekileyo okulawula izikolo njengenxa lenye yamaziko abalulekileyo olawulo ngentando yoninzi.
tgt: amandla okulawula ukuphathwa kwezikole umthetho wezikole zaseningi zimu afrika unika isgb amandla alingene okulawula ukuphathwa kwezikole nje ngengxenye yezinhlaka zenta ndo yeningi labantu ezibalule kile.

src: ngokuzibandakanya kwinkqubo yonyulo, abazali baqinisekisa ukuba isikolo sisibenzela futhi sinceda abantwana babo.
tgt: ngokubamba iqhaza enqu bweni yokhetho, abazali ba qinisekisa ukuthi isikole senza lokhu okuphumelelisa intshisekelo yezingane zabo ngendlela ephuma phambili.

src: nangona kungeyomfuneko ukuba amalungu esgb abe neziqinisekiso zemfundo yasesikolweni, abazali abaneza khono zobuchule bokugcina iincwadi, ezocwangcisomali kunye nezomthetho ngoku njalo abo banomdla nabano thando olushushu emfu ndweni, bayakhuthazwa uku ba bazigqatse kunyulo.
tgt: yize amalungu esgb kungadingeki ukuthi abe neziqu ze mfundo, abazali abanamakhono okugcina amabhuku, ukuba la imali kanye nemisebenzi yezomthetho kanye nalabo abanentshisekelo, nabanotha ndo lwezemfundo banxuswa ukuthi bacabange ngokungenela ukhetho.

src: aba bathathinxaxheba balandelayo banokunyulwa kwisgb: abazali babantwana abakweso sikolo.

src: umhobe, iflegi, iimbasa, imbasa yesizwe kunye neempawu zibhiyozela iyantlukwano vukuzenzele unnamed ngexesha lale nya nga usuku lubekelwe bucala ukubhiyozela ukuqala kwenkululeko kunye nolawulo lwentando yesininzi kunye nemisebenzi eyimpumelelo yabo bonke abemi base mzantsi afrika ekushenxeni kwinzondo, ekwahlukaneni nakwimbali ebuhlungu ukuze kwakhiwe ikamva elifanayo kunye.
tgt: ihubo lesizwe, iflegi, izindodo zesizwe, isiphandla sesizwe kanye nezimpawu zezwe kugubha ukwehlukahlukana vukuzenzele unnamed ngale nyanga kunosuku olubekelwe ukugubha ukufika kwenkululeko kanye nentando yeningi la bantu kanye nokuzuzwe yibo bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika ngokuphathelene noku suka enzondweni, ukwehluka na kanye nomlando obuhlungu ukuze sakhe ikusasa lethu sonke ndawonye.

src: ivuk’uzenzele ijonga ukuba luleka kolu suku kwanokuba li thetha ntoni ngathi njengabantu basemzantsi afrika.
tgt: ivuk’uzenzele ibheka ukubaluleka kwalolu suku nokuthi luchaza ukuthini kithina bantu baseningizimu afrika.

src: ngomhla wama27 kutsha zimpunzi kowe1994 umzantsi afrika wabamba unyulo lwalo lokuqala lolawulo lwentando yesininzi olungacaluli ngokobuhlanga.
tgt: mhla zingama27 kumbasa ngowe1994 iningizimu afrika yaba nokhetho lokuqa la lwentando yeningi laba ntu olungacwasi ngokwebala.

src: urhulumente omtsha wanyulwa phantsi kobunko kheli bukamongameli unelson mandela ongasekhoyo.
tgt: kwakhethwa uhulumeni omusha owawuholwa umongameli ongasekho unelson mandela.

src: mninzi umsebenzi owenziweyo kule kule minyaka idlulileyo, ko dwa kusekuninzi okusadinge ka ukuba kwenziwe ukwenzela ukuphucula ilizwe lethu kunye nokuguqula ubomi babo bonke abemi basemzantsi afrika.
tgt: kuningi osekuzuziwe eminya keni edlule, kodwa kuningi oku sadinga ukuthi kwenziwe ukuze kwenziwe ngcono izwe lethu futhi kuguqulwe nezimpilo zabo bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika.

src: le nyanga ayiyiyo nje eyokubonisa ngomgama osele siwuhambile ukuza kuthi ga ngo njengelizwe, kodwa ikwalixesha lokuba umzantsi afrika ubhiyozele amaqhawe kunye namaqhawekazi alo ngeembasa zesizwe.
tgt: le nyanga kambasa akuyona kuphela eyokuthi sibheke ukuthi sesizuzeni njengezwe, ko dwa yisikhathi futhi lapho ini ngizimu afrika igubha khona amaqhawe kanye namaqhawekazi ayo ngokuwanikeza izi ndondo zezwe.

src: ezi zezona mbasa ziphezulu kakhulu apho ilizwe, lisebenzisa umongameli walo, lizinikezela kubemi balo kunye nabemi bamazwe angapha ndle abadumileyo nabahloni tshwayo.
tgt: lokhu ukuklo nyeliswa ngezindondo okusez ingeni eliphezulu kakhulu izwe, ngomongameli walo, elikwazi ukuziklomelisa izakhamuzi zalo kanye nabahlonishwa abavela emazweni angaphandle.

src: umgaqosiseko womzantsi afrika umgaqosiseko waqulu nqwa ngokwesahluko sesi5 somgaqosiseko wexeshana (umthetho unombolo 200 wowe1993) kwaye wamkelwa kuqala yindlu yoqulunqo lomgaqosi seko ngomhla wesi8 kucanzibe kowe1996.
tgt: umthethosisekelo waseningizimu afrika umthethosisekelo wabhalwa ngokuphathelene nesigaba 5 somthethosisekelo wesikhashana (umthetho 200 we1993) futhi wemukelwa okokuqala yisigu ngu somthethosisekelo mhla ziyi8 kunhlaba 1996. wasayinwa waba ngumthetho mhla ziyi10 kuzi bandlela 1996. izimpawu zethu zezwe iningizimu afrika ihlukile ngenxa yokuthi siyakwazi ukugubha ukwehlukahluka kwethu ngezi mpawu zezwe kanye neflegi lesi zwe, ihubo lesizwe laseningizimu afrika kanye nesiphandla sesizwe.

src: iflegi yomzantsi afrika yohlukile.
tgt: iflegi laseningizimu afrika lihlukile.

src: yayilwa ngufred brownell, owayesakuba kwisouth african state herald, kwaye yasetyenzi swa okokuqala ngomhla wama27 kutshazimpunzi kowe1994.
tgt: ladizayinwa istate he rald saseningizimu afrika, ufred brownell, futhi laqalwa ukuse tshenziswa ngomhla zingama27 kumbasa we1994.

src: imibala yeflegi ayinayo intsingiselo ethile ngoko ke ayikho into eyimeleyo evunywa jikelele ekufuneka idityaniswe nemibala yale flegi.
tgt: imibala yeflegi ayinancazelo ethile ngakhoke akukho ngqikithi jikelele okumele iyamaniswe nemibala yeflegi.

src: u‘v’ kwiflegi ubonisa ukuhla ngabezana kwezinto ezahlukeneyo zomzantsi afrika kwanokuhamba kunye indlela eya phambili ngo kusingisele kwimanyano.
tgt: u‘v’ eflegini ukhombisa uku hlangana kwabantu abahlukene baseningizimu afrika kanye nokuthatha indlela ephambi kwethu ndawonye ngobunye.

src: ukuxhoma iflegi xa iflegi ixhonywe eludongeni ngobude, umgca obomvu kufuneka ube ngasekhohlo kulo mntu ujiyongileyo uze umphetho ongqi ndilili okanye eli cala lingena intambo libe phezulu.
tgt: ukundizisa iflegi uma iflegi limiswa liqondane nodonga, indawo ebomvu kumele ibe kwesokunxele solibukayo bese umphetho wentambo ube ngaphezulu.

src: xa imiswe ngokuxwesileyo, umphetho ongqi ndilili okanye eli cala lingena inta mbo kufuneka libe ngasekhohlo kulo uyijongileyo uze umgca obomvu ube ngaphezulu.
tgt: uma limiswe lavundla, umphetho wentambo kumele ube kwesokunxele solibukayo bese u mbala obomvu uba phezulu.

src: xa i xhonywe ecaleni okanye ngase mva kwesithethi entlanganisweni, kufuneka ibekwe ngasekunene kwesithethi.
tgt: uma iflegi libekwe eduze noma ngemva kwesikhulumi emhla nganweni, kumele libe kwesokudla sesikhulumi.

src: xa ibekwe kwenye indawo kwindawo yentlanganiso, kufuneka ibe ngasekunene kwabaphulaphuli.
tgt: uma libekwe kwenye indawo endaweni okuhlanganye lwe kuyo kumele libekwe kwe sokudla sezethameli.

src: imbasa yesizwe imbasa yesizwe, ikwaziwa nje ngomqondiso wesizwe, lelona phawu lesizwe libonakalayo ne lihlonitshwayo.
tgt: isiphandla sezwe isiphandlwa sezwe, siphinde sazi we ngokuthi uphawu lombuso, si wuphawu lombuso olubonakalayo olusezingeni eliphezulu kakhulu.

src: imbasa yesizwe iluphawu olu bonakalayo lestampu sesizwe.
tgt: isiphandla sezwe siyingxe nye esemqoka yophawu le zwe olukhulu.

src: uxwebhu olunophawu lwesta mpu sesizwe kuthetha ukuba elo xwebhu lisuka kwabasemagunyeni abaphezulu kwaye aluna kutshintshwa kuba ligunyaziswe laze lavunywa ngumongameli wasemzantsi afrika.
tgt: incwadi eno mnyatheliso wophawu olukhulu inegunya eliphelele ngoba igu nyazwe umongameli waseni ngizimu afrika.

src: imbasa yesizwe yasemzantsi afrika yaphehlelelwa ngosuku lwenkululeko ngowama2000.
tgt: isiphandla sezwe sethulwa ngosuku lwenkululeko ngowe zi2000.

src: izinto ezikuyo zilungiselelwe ngendlela ebonisa ukuzinza kunye nondiliseko.
tgt: izinto ezikuso zihlelwe ngendlela ekhombisa ukuzinza kanye nenhlonipho.

src: umngqele okwimbasa yesizwe, "!
tgt: isiqubulo sesiphandla sezwe, "!

src: ke e: /xarra //ke" ubhalwe ngo lwimi lwesikhoisan, futhi uthetha ukuba abantu abohlukeneyo ba yamanyana.
tgt: ke e: /xarra //ke " esibhalwe ngolimi lwamakhoisan, sichaza ukuthi abantu abehlukene ababumbane.

src: ukulwa imbalela enkulu vukuzenzele unnamed xa kulapha imbalela ifikelele kwawona maqondo aphezulu eyona ngxaki emntla nase mpuma koloni apho amanzi emadamini kumasipala omba xa wenelson mandela bay (ebhayi) akwiqondo leepe senti ezi25 kuphela, lixesha ngoku lokuba abemi base mzantsi afrika bamanyane ba londoloze lo mthombo unqa bileyo noxabiseke kangaka.
tgt: ukulwisana nesomiso esikhulu vukuzenzele unnamed njengoba isomiso se sifinyelele emazi ngeni amabi kakhulu enyakatho kapa kanye nase mpumalanga kapa, lapho amazinga amadamu kumkha ndludolobha inelson man dela bay metropolitan mu nicipality engamaphesenti angama25, sekuyisikhathi sokuba izakhamuzi zase ningizimu afrika zibumbane ukuze zonge leli gugu eliyive la kancane.

src: imbalela lixesha elide apho imvula ina kancinci ngendlela engaqhelekanga khona, nto leyo ekhokelela ekunqongophaleni kwamanzi.
tgt: isomiso siyisikhathi eside lapho izimvula ziyivela kancane, okwenza kuntuleke amanzi.

src: ngokutsho kukagqirha umathieu roualt, injingalwa zi yaseyunivesithi yasekapa kwisebe lezenzululwazi ngo lwandle, izinto eziphambili ezi bangela imbalela lifuthe lenka nyamba uel niño nokutshi ntsha kwemozulu.
tgt: ngokusho kukadkt mathieu roualt, ongusolwazi enyuvesi yasekapa emnyangweni wezi fundo eziphathelene nolwandle ioceanography, uthi okuyiyona mbangela yesomiso wumthelela weel niño nokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu.

src: "inkanyamba uel niño sisehlo esindaliweyo nesimana sibuya qho emva kweminyaka emithathu ukuya kwemihlanu.
tgt: "iel niño yisikhathi esizifike la ngokwemvelo njalo emva kweminyaka emithathu kuya kwemihlanu, futhi singaqhube ka kuze kuphele iminyaka emi bili.

src: unyusa amaqondo obushushu kumalwandle epasifiki nawe indiya, nto leyo kwelayo icala enokubangela iimeko zembale la," utsho.
tgt: sinyusa amazinga okushisa nokubanda olwandle ipacific neindian, okuyinto engadala isomiso," ngokusho kwakhe.

src: ukutshintsha kwemozulu yimo echazwa njengoku tshintsha kwiindlela zenkqubo zemozulu ehlabathini liphela okanye kummandla.
tgt: ukuguquguquka kwesimo se zulu kuchazwa njengoshintsho esimweni sezulu somhlaba jike lele noma ezifundeni, okwaqala maphakathi nenyakakhulu lama20 kuya ngasekupheleni kwalo futhi lokhu kungumphu mela wokuphakama kwamazi nga esikhutha emkhathini okubangelwa wukusetshenzi swa kwezibaseli.

src: yinto leyo eyaqala phakathi ukuya ekupheleni kwenkulungwane yama20, yaye ibangwa ikakhulu ngamaqondo aphezulu omoya omdaka olapha esibhakabhakeni nozalwa zizibaso zezinto ezaziphila mandulo zaza zaba ngamatye.
tgt: "kuleli nyakakhulu eledlule isifunda esiseningizimu ne afrika sikhahlanyezwe wukuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu unyaka nonyaka, okuholele eso misweni esinamandla esesiphazamise impilo yezinto eziphila emhla beni nasolwandle kanye nempilo yabantu.

src: "kule nkulungwane id luleyo, amazantsi eafri ka abe nokubaxeka ko kutshintsha kwemozulu unyaka nonyaka, nto leyo ekhokelele kwi mbalela enkulu noku phazamiseka kwezitya lo nezinto eziphilayo elwandle nasehlabathi ni.
tgt: lolu guquko lunomthelela ongemuhle kwezolimo, imithombo yamanzi nakwezokudoba futhi kanjalo nasemnothweni wonkana.

src: oku kutshintsha kwemozulu kunefuthe kushishino lwezolimo, oovimba bamanzi nezokuloba kuze kugqi bele ngoqoqosho ngokubanzi.
tgt: kuphinde kube nomthelela ongemuhle ekugelezeni kwemifudlana nezakhimpilo ezingena olwa ndle," kuchaza udkt roualt.

src: oku kutshintsha kukwacha phazela nokuhamba kwamanzi emachibini, izityalo nokungena kwezondlo elwandle," uchaze watsho ugqirha roualt.
tgt: lo mthelela uzwela kakhulu eningizimu afrika ngoba izwe lethu libhekene nokuntuleka kwezimvula, esezehle nga mamililitha (ml) angama450 ngonyaka, uma kuqhathaniswa nesilinganiso somhlaba esinga ma860 ml.

src: liyintoni ifuthe lembalela?
tgt: uyini umthelela wesomiso?

src: ngenyanga yomdumba, isebe lolawulo lwentsebenziswano nemicimbi yemveli layihlela ngokutsha imbalela layisusa kwimo eyintlekele yephondo yayintlekele yesizwe.
tgt: ngonhlolanja, umnyango we zokusebenzisana kohulumeni kanye nezindaba zendabuko (icogta) ukhuphule izinga lenhlekelele yesomiso lisuka kwelenhlekelele yesifundazwe walibeka ezingeni lenhlekelele kazwelonke.

src: "emva kokuhlola ngokutsha ubungakanani nobukhali be mbalela egqubayo ubuncinane kumaphondo amathathu, ab alawuli bentlekele baphinda bayihlela ngokutsha imbalela njengentlekele yesizwe," itshilo intloko yeziko lolawulo lwentlekele lesizwe, ugqirha mmaphaka tau.
tgt: "ngemuva kokucubungula kabusha izinga nobukhulu balesi somiso esiqhubekayo esesihlasele okungenani izifu ndazwe ezintathu, abenga mele izinhlekelele babeke lesi somiso esigabeni senhlekelele kazwelonke," ngokusho kwenhloko yesikhungo esengamele izinhlekelele zikazwelonke, udkt mmaphaka tau.

src: noxa ifuthe lembalela kwe zoqoqosho kunzima ukulili nganisa, libe likhulu kakhulu kwicandelo lezolimo.
tgt: nakuba kusenzima uku wukala umthelela wesomiso kwezomnotho, sekube nomkhu lu umthelela emkhakheni wezolimo.

src: entsho na koloni, eliliphondo lesibini elikhulu kweli lizwe elinegalelo kwisambuku semveliso yesizwe (igdp), yimisebenzi engama 21 000 eyeyaphela kwikota ye sithathu kulo nyaka uphelileyo.
tgt: entshonalanga kapa, okuyisifundazwe sesibili ngobukhulu esifaka isandla emkhiqizweni ophelele wezwe ohlangothini lwezolimo, ilinga niselwa ezi21 000 imisebenzi elahlekile ngekota yesithathu yonyaka odlule.

src: iapp ebizwa igauteng on the move vukuzenzele unnamed isebe lezendlela no thutho lasegauteng liqalise i– app yeselula (unxibelelwano olulodwa ngeselula) ebizwa igaut eng on the move, lilungisele la inkqubo yalo yezothutho lukawonkewonke ukwenza kube lula kubakhweli uku nxibelelana neendidi ezahlukeneyo zezothutho ngapha ndle kwamagingxigingxi.
tgt: iapp yezokuthutha egauteng vukuzenzele unnamed umnyango wezemi gwaqo nezoku thutha egauteng usuqale uhlelokusebenza lwezokuthutha, olubizwa ngegauteng on the move, ohlelweni lwawo lokuthutha umphakathi olusiza umpha kathi ukuxhumana nezinhlobo zokuthutha ezihlukahlukene, ngaphandle kwezihibe.

src: igauteng on the move iza kuphelisa ukungaqiniseki okuhamba nokusebenzisa izithuthi zikawonkewonke, kuba ibonelela abakhweli ngolona lwazi luchanekileyo lwexesha, amaxesha ezothutho namaxa biso egautrain‚ imetrobus‚ a re yeng‚ rea vaya‚ imetrorail‚ iinkonzo zebhasi zegautrain‚ ibhasi yokhenketho lwesixeko saserhawutini‚ iinkonzo ze bhasi zasetshwane neenkonzo zeteksi.
tgt: igauteng on the move wu hlelo oluqeda ungabazane nokudideka okuhambisana nokusetshenziswa kwezithuthi zomphakathi, njengoba luni keza umphakathi imininingwa ne eqondile futhi esheshayo mayelana nezikhathi zokuha mba kwezithuthi zomphakathi kanye nezindleko zegautrain, metrobus, a re yeng, rea vaya, metrorail, amabhasi egautrain, amabhasi ejohannesburg city sightseeing, amabhasi kama sipala wasetshwane kanye namatekisi.

src: ethetha ekwaziseni le app (unxibelelwano olulodwa nge selula) kwiofisi yomseki wayo emidrand kutsha nje, umpha thiswa wezothutho kwiphondo lasegauteng (umec) , uismail vadi, uthe isebe lakhe liyayivuma imfuneko yobuch wepheshe balamaxesha neen kqubo zezothutho ezibhadlileyo njengezibe negalelo kuphuhliso lwenkqubo yezothutho.
tgt: ekhuluma ngesikhathi kwe thulwa lolu hlelokusebenza emahhovisi abasunguli balo emidrand, umec wezoku thutha egauteng uismail vadi uthe umnyango uyasibona isidingo sezobuchwepheshe no hlelo oluphusile kwezokuthutha oluzobamba iqhaza ekuthuthu kisweni kohlelo lwezokuthutha.

src: "urhulumente wephondo lasegauteng usebenzise ixesha, amalinge nezixhobo ezifanele kileyo ekuphuhliseni isicwang ciso solu hambo esenza kube lula kubakhweli ukunxibele lana neendidi ezahlukenenyo zezothutho ngaphakathi kweli phondo.
tgt: "uhulumeni wesifunda zwe sasegauteng unikele ngesikhathi, imizamo nezi nsiza ukuthuthukisa lolu hlelo lwezokuthutha olusiza umpha kathi ukwazi ukuxhumana kalula nezinhlobo zokuthu thwa komphakathi ezahlukene esifundazweni.

src: "sesiwabona amandla obuchwepheshe bokungeni sa izinto ezintsha eziguqula imo yeenkonzo zezothutho lukawonkewonke.
tgt: ""sesiqalile ukubona amandla ezobuchwepheshe eguqula isimo sezinsizakalo zokuthu thwa komphakathi.

src: ayithanda buzeki into yokuba iinguqu zobuchwepheshe ehlabathi ni liphela zivuselele inguqu kwicandelo lezothutho, kwaye kufuneka ezi nguqu sizamkele, siziqhelanise nazo," utshilo.
tgt: akukho ukungabaza ukuthi ushintsho lwezobuchwepheshe emhlabe ni jikelele seluqalise uguquko olukhulukazi emkhakheni we zokuthutha, futhi nathi kumele siguquke ukuze sihambisane nalezi zinguquko," kusho yena.

src: uvadi uqinisekise into yokuba eli phondo liza kuthi gqolo lise benzise ukungena kobuchule obutsha, uphando nophuhliso ukuze kukhuthazwe iphondo elisemgangathweni kuphucul we ukusebenza kakuhle noku fikelela kwiinkonzo zezothutho.
tgt: uvadi uqinisekisile ukuthi isifundazwe sizoqhubeka noku sebenzisa ezobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje, ucwaningo nentuthuko ukuthuthukisa isifundazwe esisebenzisa ezobu chwepheshe esizophucula futhi senze kube lula ukufinyelela kwezokuthutha.

src: yakuba ikhutshelwe, le app yenza kube lula kwabo bayise benzisayo ukuba bacwangcise uhambo lwabo ngokukhetha iindlela zezothutho abazi nqwenelayo, amaxesha oku hamba nezinye izinto abazikhe thayo, ezinjengeyona hambo imfutshane nengabizi kakhulu.
tgt: uma ‘seludawunilodiwe’ lolu hlelokusebenza, luzobasiza abalusebenzisayo ukuhlela uhambo lwabo ngokuthi bakhethe uhlobo lwezoku thutha abaludingayo, izikhathi zokuhamba nokunye, njengo kuqoka uhambo olufushane nolusheshayo futhi olungambi eqolo.

src: umfundi waserhawutini nongumkhweli, uglen dlamini, uthe le app iza kwenza ama wakawaka abakhweli azive onelisekile.
tgt: umfundi wasegoli uglen dlamini uthe lolu hlelokuse benza luzoletha isisombululo kubagibeli abayizinkulungwane ngezinkulungwane.

src: "ngenene yiapp ema ngalisayo le.
tgt: "lolu wuhlelokusebe nza olumangazayo impela.

src: ulutsha luyalixhasa iphulo leyes vukuzenzele unnamed umasego temane uvuya kakhulu ngokuba eza ku fumana amava omsebenzi, ahambelana nezifundo za khe zediploma kwihu man resources management , njengoko eza kuthatha i nxaxheba kwinkqubo yee nkonzo zokuqeshwa ko lutsha (iyes).
tgt: intsha iyalisekela uhlelo lweyes vukuzenzele unnamed umasego temane une ntokozo enkulu yo kuthola isipiliyoni somsebenzi, esihambela na neziqu zakhe zediplo ma yehuman resource ma nagement, njengombambi qhaza ohlelweni lokuqa shwa kwentsha (iyes).

src: iyes, ebisanda kuphehle lwe kwezi veki ziphelileyo ngumongameli cyril rama phosa, yenzelwe ukuxho bisa ulutsha ngezakhono zomsebenzi nezobugcisa ezifunekayo ukuze ubani akwazi ukuthatha inxaxhe ba kumaphulo okuguqula uqoqosho lweli lube lwale mihla.
tgt: iyes, esanda kwethulwa ngumongameli cyril rama phosa, ihlose ukulungiselela abantu abasha umsebenzi kanye nokubahlinzeka nga makhono emicikilisho edinge kayo ukuze kwakhiwe umno tho othuthukisa izimboni.

src: utemane uyacacisa uku ba emva kokuba ethweswe isidanga ngowama2016 zange akwazi ukufaka izice lo zemisebenzi kuba wa yengenawo amava afu nwayo kwizithuba zemise benzi.
tgt: utemane uyachaza ukuthi emva kokuphothula iziqu zakhe ngowezi2016 akakwa zanga ukufaka izicelo zomse benzi ngoba wayengenaso isi piliyoni somsebenzi esifanele.

src: "kwakunzima kakhulu ukufuna umsebenzi ube u ngenawo amava omsebe nzi.
tgt: "kwakulukhuni kakhulu ukufuna umsebenzi ngapha ndle kwesipiliyoni.

src: ngentlahla ndaye ndadi bana nelulaway recrui tment agency yona esebe nzisana neyes, yandinika isithuba sokuqeqeshelwa umsebenzi ndiphangela.
tgt: nge nhlanhla ngenkathi ngi hlangana nabakwalulaway recruitment agency abase benzisana nohlelo lweyes, banginikeza ithuba lokuthola isipiliyoni emsebenzini.

src: iyes lilinge eliqhutywa ngokubambisana ngurhu lumente, imibutho yabase benzi kunye namashishini lokunika abantu abatsha bomzantsi afrika abasisi gidi izithuba zomsebenzi ohlawulayo kule minyaka mithathu izayo.
tgt: "uhlelo lweyes umzamo ohlanganyelwe kahulumeni, abasebenzi kanye nabama bhizinisi ukuze bahlinze ke ngamathuba esipiliyoni somsebenzi akhokhelwayo entsheni yaseningizimu afrika eyisigidi kulesi sikha thi seminyaka emithathu ezayo.

src: uphando olwenziwe nga mahlakani ethu lubonisa ukuba isithuba esingunyaka omnye ubani esebenza kwicv ehamba neleta yengcaci so nengqina izakhono zom fakisicelo, siwaphucula ngokuphindwe kathathu amathuba okufumana u msebenzi.
tgt: ucwaningo oluqhutshiwe ngababambiqhaza luveza ukuthi unyaka nje owodwa wesipiliyoni somsebenzi kucv , nencwadi ewubufakazi ngamakhono nolwazi lomu ntu (ireference letter), kwenyu sa amathuba okuthola komu ntu umsebenzi ngokuphindwe kathathu.

src: umasego wongeze ngelithi uyawuthanda umsebenzi wakhe, kuba ubandakanya ukunceda abantu abatsha ukuba bafumane umsebenzi njengoko yena ekwicandelo lokuqeshwa kwabantu aba qeqeshwa besemsebenzini.
tgt: utemane wengeze ngoku thi uyawuthanda umsebenzi wakhe, ikakhulukazi ngoba uphinde athole ithuba loku siza abantu abasha ukuze bathole imisebenzi njengo ba phela enza umsebenzi njengemfundamakhwela eqa sha abantu.

src: ngethuba kuphehlelelwa iyes umongameli rama phosa waboniswa abantu abatsha abali100 abanga bokuqala ukuqeshwa ngale nkqubo, abasebenza kwaabsa, einvestec, ene tcare, esasol naseunilever.
tgt: ekwethulweni kohlelo lweyes umongameli ramapho sa waboniswa abantu abasha bokuqala abayi100 abazoqa shwa ngalolu hlelo ngaba kwaabsa, investec, netcare, sasol nabakwaunilever.

src: "eli phulo silibona nje ngenye yeenkqubo zesizwe ezingungundoqo nezibanzi eziza kuncedisa ekudaleleni abantu abatsha amathuba.
tgt: "sibona leli cebo njenge nsika eyodwa ewumzamo ka zwelonke obanzi nodidiyelwe ukuze kudalwe amathuba kubantu abasha.

src: enye yeenjongo eziphambi li zeli phulo kukuphuhlisa izakhono nobuchule baba ntu abatsha," utshilo umo ngameli ramaphosa.
tgt: enye insi ka ukuthuthukiswa kwama khono nolwazi lwabantu abasha," kusho umongameli ramaphosa.

src: uye wahlaba ikhwelo ku mashishini asakhasayo uku ba nawo adlale eyawo indi ma njengoko wona ekwazi ukuqesha abantu abaninzi futhi waze waphinda wathi amashishini amakhulu awanakukwazi ukuqesha bonke abantu abatsha ewo dwa.
tgt: ucele abamabhizinisi ase mancane ukuba nabo badlale eyabo indima njengoba bena bantu abaningi ababaqashayo waphinde wathi amabhizinisi amakhulu akakwazi ukumu matha intsha eyanele wodwa.

src: ngokokutsho kwego sa eliphezulu lesigqeba (iceo) leyes utashmia ismailsaville, emzantsi afrika kubantu abazizigi di ezili15.5 abaneminyaka yobudala ephakathi kwe li18 nengama34, abazizigi di eziyi5.8 abaphangeli.
tgt: ngokusho kwesikhulu esi phethe (iceo) iyes uta shmia ismailsaville, phaka thi kwabantu abayizigidi ezi li15.5 eningizimu afrika abaneminyaka ephakathi kwe yi18 nengama34, abayizigidi eziyi5.8 abasebenzi.

src: "iyes ineenjongo zokuni ka abantu abatsha beli, abangaxhamliyo kwezi ndlela zokuqesha zise tyenziswayo ngoku kweli lizwe, ela thuba lokuqala libalulekileyo lokufuma na umsebenzi osemganga thweni nohlawulayo," u tshilo uismailsaville.
tgt: "uhlelo lweyes luhlose ukunikeza leyo ngxenye ya bantu abasha baleli, abanga nakwa kakhulu yimigomo yamanje yokuqasha ezweni, ithuba lokuqala elibalulekile lokuzuza isipiliyoni somse benzi weqophelo eliphezulu, okhokhelwayo," kusho ui smailsaville.

src: njengesibonelelo soku bulela amashishini asa khasayo, lawo aqeshe aba ntu abantsundu abatsha, abaneminyaka yobudala ephakathi kweli18 nenga ma29, aza kuba nelungelo lofumana isaphulela se rhafu yokuqesha esilinga na nemali eli1 000 leerandi ngenyanga.
tgt: umhuhiso owengeziwe kwabamabhizinisi asemanca ne, labo abaqasha abantu abasha abaneminyaka yobu dala ephakathi kweyi18 kuya kwengama29, bazofaneleka izaphulelo zentela zokuqa sha ezilingana ner1 000 nge nyanga.

src: abantu abatsha abayinxa lenye yeyes kufuneka ba be: neminyaka yobuda la ephakathi kweli18 nengama34.
tgt: abantu abasha bohlelo lweyes kufanele babe: neminyaka yobudala ephakathi kweyi18nengama34.

src: ngabantu abasebe nexesha elingaphezu lu kweenyanga ezinta ndathu bengasebenzi.
tgt: ukuthi bebangasebe nzi isikhathi sezinyanga eziyisithupha.

src: ngabantu abantsu ndu (umntu omnya ma, owebala okanye olindiya).
tgt: abantu abamnyama (owomdabu, oyikhala di noma oyindiya).

src: ukuba iinkampani zi funa ukufaka isicelo sokufumana isaphule lo serhafu yokuqesha, abo bantu abatsha ku funeka babe neminya ka yobudala ephakathi kweli18 nengama29.
tgt: uma kwenzeka izi nkampani zifuna uku faka isicelo sesaphule lo sentela sokuqasha, intsha kufanele kube ineminyaka yobuda la ephakathi kweyi18 nengama29.

src: ingaba baza kwamkela malini?
tgt: ingabe izohola malini le ntsha?

src: kukho ulwimi olusemthethweni olutsha olu zayo emzantsi afrika neo semono ikhelobedu ingalulwimi olusemthethweni lwe12 emzantsi afrika ngoku hambelana nokubuyiselwa kwesidima seenkokeli zo mthonyama.
tgt: iningizimu afrika kungenzeka ibe nolimi olusemthethweni olusha neo semono ikhelobedu ingaphe nduka ulimi lwe12 olusemthethweni eni ngizimu afrika ngokuha mbisana nohlelo lokubuyise la isithunzi sabaholi benda buko.

src: umongameli cyril rama phosa ubhengeze oku nge thuba kubanjwe umsitho wokubeka ngokusesikweni ikumkanikazi yesizwe saba lobedu emokwakwaila stadi um ebolobedu, egamodjadji elimpopo.
tgt: umongameli cyril rama phosa wenze lesi simemezelo ngesikhathi sokugcotshwa kwendlovukazi yesizwe sabalobedu enkundleni yezemidlalo imokwakwai la ebolobedu, egamodjadji elimpopo.

src: ikhelobedu lulwimi olu thethwa sisizwe sabalobedu apho ukumkanikazi we mvula wesizwe sabalobedu ongekabekwa, eza kuthatha esi sikhundla xa eneminyaka eli18, emva kokuba ebekwe ngokusesikweni njengoku mkanikazi modjadji wevii.
tgt: ikhelobedu ulimi olukhu lunywa uhlanga lwaba lobedu indlovukazi yemvula yabalobedu ene minyaka eyi13, umasalana bo modjadji, ezobabusa lapho isineminyaka eyi18, emva kokubekwa njengendlo vukazi modjadji wesivii.

src: uza kufikelela ebuntwini obudala ngokwamasiko nezi thethe zesizwe sabalobedu.
tgt: uzothweswa iziqu nje ngokwezinqubo namasiko abalobedu.

src: "ukubekwa kwale ku mkanikazi kuyimbali kwaye umama winnie madikize lamandela ebeza kuvuyela kakhulu.
tgt: "le yinqubekelapha mbili eyingqophamlando wangempela umama wi nnie madikizelamandela obengaziqhenya ngawo.

src: esi sisizwe sokuqa la futhi nekukuphela kwaso esiphethwe yikumkanikazi kweli lizwe nakweli lizwe kazi liphela," utshilo umo ngameli ramaphosa.
tgt: lesi yisihlalo sendlovuka zi sokuqala nokuwukuphela kwaso ezweni nasezwenika zi lonkana," kusho umonga meli ramaphosa.

src: umongameli ramaphosa uphinde wambophelela urhu lumente kwiphulo lokubu yisela isidima newonga lee nkokeli zomthonyama.
tgt: umongameli ramaphosa uphinde waqinisekisa uku zibophezela kukahulumeni ekubuyiselweni kwesithu nzi nenhlonipho kubaholi bendabuko.

src: ikumkanikazi yesizwe sa balobedu yavunywa ngoku sesikweni ngenyanga yo kwindla ngowama2016 emva kokuba ikomishini engeembambano namaba ngo eenkokeli zomthonyama (ictldc) iqhube uphando ngendawo esibekwa kuyo isi zwe sabalobedu, ngokwezice lo ezangeniswa kwictldc.
tgt: isihlalo sendlovukazi ya balobedu saqala ukwaziwa ngokusemthethweni ngonda sa wezi2016 emva kokuba ikhomishani yezicelo nezi ngxabano zobuholi benda buko (ictldc) iqhube ucwaningo odabeni lwaba lobedu, njengokwezicelo ezalethwa phambi kwect ldc.

src: "urhulumente uzimisele ukuqinisekisa ukuba ayafeze kiswa amasolotya esahluko 12 somgaqosiseko, ingaku mbi elokubuyiselwa kwesidi ma seenkokeli zomthonyama kweli lizwe lilawulwa ngo kwentando yesininzi pha ntsi komgaqosiseko," utshi lo umongameli ramaphosa.
tgt: "uhulumeni uzibophezele ekuphumeleliseni imibande la yesahluko 12 somthetho sisekelo, ikakhulukazi ukubuyiselwa kwesithu nzi sobuholi bendabu ko bonkana entandweni yeningi labantu ehambisana nomthethosisekelo," kusho umongameli ramaphosa.

src: uthe ukuvunyelwa uku ba abantu basetyhini babe kwe njengeekumkanikazi emzantsi afrika kubonisa ukuzibophelela kumthetho ohlonipha ukubaluleka ko lingwano phakathi kwabase tyhini namadoda, ngeli thuba ihlonitshwayo indima yoku khokela edlalwa ngooma ma kuwo onke amabakala obomi.
tgt: uthe ukwaziswa kwesi hlalo sezindlovukazi eni ngizimu afrika kukho mbisa ukuzibopheze la emgomweni nokwa ziswa kokuphathwa ngokulingana kobulili bonke, ngale nkathi kube kwaziswa nendima yobu holi edlalwa ngabesifazane kuzo zonke izingxenye ze mpilo.

src: "iinkokeli zomthonyama zinendima ebalulekileyo ekufuneka ziyidlale ekwa kheni isizwe esingahlu tshwa yindlala, esingena ngxaki yentswelongqesho kunye neyokungalingani.
tgt: "abaholi bendabuko banendima ebalulekile okufanele bayidlale uku ze kwakhiwe izwe eli ngenabubha, ukuntuleka kwemisebenzi nokuphathwa kwabantu ngokulinganayo.

src: iinkokeli zethu zomthonyama kufuneka zibe phambili kwi dabi lokulwela ukubuyise lwa kamalungelo kunye nesi dima sabantu bakuthi.
tgt: abaholi bethu bendabuko badinga ukuba phambili kulo mzabalazo wokubu yisela amalungelo nesithu nzi kubantu bethu.

src: "uphinde wayibethelela i ndima ebalulekileyo edlalwa zinkokeli zomthonyama ekubuyiseleni umhlaba kubanikazi bawo abafanele kileyo.
tgt: "uqhubeke wagcizelela ukubaluleka kwendima e dlalwa ngabaholi bendabu ko ekubuyiseleni umhlaba kubanikazi abafanele.

src: "kufuneka baqinisekise ukuba umhlaba ubuyiselwa ebantwini abawusebenzayo futhi abo babuyiselwe u mhlaba kufuneka babe nazo izixhobo zokuwusebenza," utshilo umongameli rama phosa.
tgt: "badinga ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umhlaba ubuyise lwa kulabo abawuse benzayo kanye nokuthi labo umhlaba obuyise lwe kubona banezindlela zokuwusebenza," kusho umongameli ramaphosa.

src: abantu abaqikelelwa kwizigidi ezingama25 aba hlala emaphandleni bapha ntsi kweenkokeli zomtho nyama.
tgt: balinganiselwa ezigidini ezingama25 abantu abahla la ezindaweni zasemakhaya ababuswa ngabaholi benda buko.

src: uxanduva lomzantsi afrika lokufundisa ulutsha more matshediso umphathiswa wemfu ndo ephakami leyo noqeqesho una ledi pandor uthi umzantsi afrika unako ukubonele la ngeebhasari abantwana beentsapho ezihlupheki leyo nabaphuma kumakhaya amkela imivuzo ephantsi abafunda kwiiyunivesithi nakwiikholeji zemfundo noqeqesho lobuchule no bugcisa (itvet) ngowama 2018. umphathiswa upandor uthe luxanduva lwelizwe ukuxhasa abantu abangamahlwempu kunye nabo bangathathi ntweni.
tgt: isibophezelo seningizimu afrika sokufundisa intsha more matshediso ungqongqoshe we mfundo ephakeme nokuqeqesha una ledi pandor uthi iningizimu afrika izokwazi ukuba nemi fundaze yezingane eziphuma emakhaya ampofu kanye nalawo anabondli abenza imisebenzi eholela amaholo aphansi ezingena enyuvesi kanye nakumakolishi oku funda indlela yokwenza nokuqeqeshelwa ukusebe nza (amatvet) ngowe zi2018.

src: ebethetha ngethuba lendi bano noonondaba apho athe wathi thaca indlela eza kuqa liswa ngayo inkqubo yemfu ndo ephakamileyo yasimahla emzantsi afrika.
tgt: ungqongqoshe upandor uthe kuyisibophezelo sezwe ukweseka imindeni empofu kanye nesengcupheni kakhulu.

src: umphathiswa upandor ubhe ngeze ukuba urhulumente ugalele enye imali ezibhiliyoni eziyi7.166 zeerandi ukuze iye kwiibhasari zabantwana aba phuma kumakhaya ahlupheki leyo namkela imivuzo ephantsi abafunda kwiiyunivesithi nakwiikholeji zoqeqesho lobugcisa kunye nemfundo yezoqeqesho (itvet) kulo nyaka.
tgt: wayekhuluma ngesikhathi sesithangami sabezindaba lapho aveza khona inqubo yo kwethula imfundo ephakeme yamahhala eningizimu afrika.

src: umphathiswa upandor uqinisekisile ukuba imali ezi bhiliyoni eziyi4.581 zeerandi ibekelwe bucala ukulungise lela abafundi abayifaneleyo abafunda eyunivesithi yaze imali ezibhiliyoni eziyi2.585 zeerandi yabekelwa abafundi abafunda kwiikholeji zetvet.
tgt: ungqongqoshe upandor ume mezela ukuthi uhulumeni usetshale izigidi zezigidi zamara ndi eziyi7.

src: ngowama2017 urhulumente wamemezela ukuba imfu ndo ephakamileyo iza kuba simahla kubafundi abahlu phekileyo kunye nabo bavela kumakhaya amkela umvuzo wonyaka ohlangeneyo oya kutsho kuma350 000 eerandi.
tgt: 166 ukuze ukho khele imifundaze yezingane ezivela emindenini empofu kanye nezasemindenini ena bondli abenza imisebenzi eholela amaholo aphansi ezi ngena emanyuvesi kanye naku makolishi etvet kulo nyaka.

src: abafundi baxhaswa ngenkqubo yebhasari eyandisi weyo, ethatha indawo yema limboleko yangaphambili kunye nenkqubo enesixa esiyi bhasari ebinikezelwa sisikimu sesizwe soncedo lwezemali sabafundi (insfas).
tgt: ungqongqoshe upandor uqinisekisile ukuthi sekubekwe eceleni izigidi zezigidi zamara ndi ezingama4.581 kwenzelwa izitshudeni ezikwaze ukungena emanyuvesi kanye nezigidi zezigidi zamarandi eziyi2.585 zezitshudeni zakumakolishi etvet.

src: "ulwabiwo olusisiseko oluya kwinsfas lokuxhasa abafu ndi abahluphekayo nabo ba phuma kumakhaya amkela imi vuzo ephantsi abafunda kwii yunivesithi kunye netvet luza kwanda ukusuka kwimali ezibhiliyoni eziyi9.849 zee randi ngowama2017/18 ukuya kwiibhiliyoni ezinga ma35.321 zeerandi ngowa ma2020/21.
tgt: ngowezi2017 uhulumeni wamemezela ukuthi imfundo ephakeme izoba mahhala kuzi tshudeni ezimpofu kanye na lezo ezivela emindenini ethola umholo wonyaka ohlangene ngaphambi kwezimali eziba njwayo engaze ifinyelele kwi zi350 000 zamarandi.

src: "oku kuthetha ukuba kufune ka ziphucuke iinkqubo zens fas kunye nendlela asebenza ngayo.
tgt: izitshudeni zesekwa ngesi kimu semifundaze esibanzi, esingena esikhundleni sesi kimu esedlule esasinengxenye eyimalimboleko kanye nengu mfundaze esasihlinzekwa isi khwama sikwazwelonke sokusiza abafundi ngezimali (insfas).

src: ngoko ke siye sabekela bucala enye imali ezizigidi ezili105 zeerandi kwe si sithuba senkqubosikho kelo yenkcitho yesigaba esiphakathi ukunceda insfas ukuba yandise kwaye iqinise amandla ayo okulawula," utshilo umphathiswa.
tgt: "ukuhlinzekwa okusisekelo kwensfas kokuxhasa izitshudeni ezivela emindenini empofu kanye naleyo ihola amaholo aphansi ezingena emanyuvesi kanye nakumako lishi etvet kuzokhuphuka ku suka ezigidini zezigidi zamara ndi eziyi9.849 ngowe zi2017/18 ukuya ezigidini zezigidi zamarandi ezinga ma35.321 ngowezi2020/21.

src: abafundi abafanelekileyo, nokuba benza owuphi unyaka, abafunda kwiikholeji zetvet zikarhulumente baza kufuma na ibhasari eyanele imali yabo yokufunda kunye nezinto zokufunda.
tgt: "lokhu kuchaza isidingo zokwenza ngcono ukwenziwa komsebenzi kanye noku thuthukisa izinhlelo zensfas.

src: isebe lemicimbi yezekhaya lizimisele ukulwa imigca emide more matshediso isebe lemicimbi yeze khaya liphumeza isicwangciso senkqubo sokuqinisekisa ukuba abemi abachithi ixesha elide emigceni.
tgt: umnyango wezasekhaya umemezela ukulwisana nemigqa emide more matshediso umnyango wezase khaya ulungiselela uhlelo lokuqinisekisa ukuthi izakhamuzi azichithi isikhathi eside emigqeni.

src: ngokutsho komphathiswa wemicimbi yezekhaya umalusi gigaba imigca emide ibibange lwa bubuninzi obugquthisileyo babantu, indawo enganelanga yabantu abanceda uluntu, imiba yobunkokeli kunye nokuvalwa kweeofisi ngemigqibelo.
tgt: ngokukangqongqoshe wo mnyango wezasekhaya umalusi gigaba imigqa emide ibibangelwa inani eliphezulu labantu abadinga usizo, isikhala esinganele ema hhovisi omnyango, izinkinga eziphathelene nobuholi kanye nokuvalwa kwamahhovisi awo ngemigqibelo.

src: ukulungisa le ngxaki, isebe libala inani leeofisi zalo kulo lonke eli lize lijonge ukuba zeziphi na ezifuna ukuba iphu culwe indlela ezisebenza ngayo.
tgt: ukuze kulungiswe inkinga, umnyango ubukeza umthelela ngokwezendawo ukuze kuhlonzwe izindawo lapho udinga khona ukwenza ngcono izinsiza zawo.

src: "siza kuqhuba uvavanyo lokuphanda ngokwaneliseka kwabantu, senze iziko loqhaga mshelwano nemibuzo lisebenze ngokunemagingxigingxi, sifu mane isisombululo kwiingxaki yabantu abasuka beze kwiiofi si zethu bengenzanga dinga kunye nobukhulu bamaziko ethu anceda uluntu, siqwalasele ukuba asinakuqalisa ngenkqubo yamaxesha ahlukahlukeneyo okuphangela, silungise nobu xhakaxhaka bethu obu ngazinzanga, sandise izihlandlo ezingabhengezwanga abaphathi abaphezulu abatyelela ngazo kwiiofisi zethu, siphucule ukuhamba komsebenzi kwaye siqinise ukuqhagamshelana na bantu," umphathiswa uqinise kisile.
tgt: "sizogunyaza inhlolovo yokwe neliseka kwezakhamuzi, senze ukuthi isikhungo sokuxhu mana nezakhamuzi sisebenze ngokwezinga eliphezulu, sizothola isisombululo ngokuphathelene nabantu abeza esikhungweni abayinani elingaqageleki kanye nesikhala emahhovisi omnya ngo, ukubheka okungenzeka ngokuphathelene nohlelo olusha lwamashifu, ukulungisa uhle loxhumano lwamakhompyutha olungahlale lusebenza, ukwenyu swa kokuvakasha kwabaphathi abasezikhundleni eziphezulu emahhovisi ethu, ukuthuthu kiswa kokwenziwa komsebenzi kanye nokwenziwa ngcono kokuxoxisana nezakhamuzi," kuqinisekisa ungqongqoshe.

src: ezi zicwangciso ziza kuqalisa ukusebenza njengamanyathelo okungenelela exesha elifutshane, eliphakathi kunye nexesha elide.
tgt: lezi zinhlelo zokuzokwenziwa zizokwethulwa njengezindlela zokungenelela zesikhashana, zesikhathi esiphakathi nendawo kanye nezesikhathi eside.

src: umphathiswa uchazile ukuba le micelimngeni ayizuku sonjululwa ngamanyathelo okungenelela akhawulezileyo kwaye ucele uluntu ukuba lube nomonde ngelixa isebe liqalisa ngala manyathelo.
tgt: ungqongqoshe uchaze lezi zi ngqinamba ezingeke zisonjululwe ngokungenelela okusheshayo futhi wacela umphakathi ukuthi ube nesineke ngesikhathi umnya ngo wethula lokhu.

src: "sizimisele ukwenza konke okusemandleni ethu ukuze si wuphumelele ngandlela zonke lo mlo wemigca emide, nangona kukho imiqobo neminye imice limngeni kweli sebe," umpha thiswa ugigaba utshilo.
tgt: "simile sizibophezela ekwenzeni okusemandleni ethu ukuze si nqobe ukulwisana nemigqa, nangaphandle kwezingqina mba kanye nezinye izi nselele," kusho ungqongqoshe ugigaba.

src: ngaphambi kwesibhengezo sezicwangciso zenkqubo isebe lenze ingxelo yokuhlola uku fumanisa indlela efanelekileyo yokulawula kakuhle imigca kunye nokuphucula iinkonzo zayo.
tgt: ngaphambi kokuthi umemezele izinhlelo zozokwenza umnyango wenza umbiko wokuhlola ukuze uthole ukuthi ungakwazi kanjani ukulwisana nemigqa futhi wenze ngcono izinsiza zawo.

src: le ngxelo ikhankanye iinkqubo ezingazinzanga, inkqubo yoku ngahambi kakuhle komsebenzikunye nezicwangciso zokuqha gamshelana ezingahambelaniyo, into leyo ibangela ukuba abantu bangoneliseki nemigca emide.
tgt: umbiko wabeka uhleloxhumano lwamakhompyutha olungahlale lusebenza njengalo kho kulindelekile, uhlelo lokwe nziwa komsebenzi olungasebenzi ngendlela efanele kanye nezindlela zokuxhumana ezingahlanga nisiwe ngendlela efanele eziholela kwizakhamuzi ezingenelisekile kanye nemigqa emide.

src: ngokutsho komphathiswa, ezi zinto zilandelayo zenza ibe mbi nangakumbi le ngxaki: ■ ulawulo olukumgangatho ophantsi kwezinye iiofisi ■ ukungasetyenziswa kwabasebenzi ngokweza khono zabo ■ ukungabikho kwenkqubo yokwenza idinga phambi kokuba umntu eze kwiiofisi zesebe ■ ulawulo lwemigca olunge nampumelelo ■ ukusebenzisa inkqubo esebe nza ngezandla kunye nezi zisebenzela ngokwazo ngaxeshanye ukunqongophala kweeofisi zesebe ingakumbi kwiindawo ezinabantu abaninzi ingcaciso engeyonyaniso ngokuyekiswa kwencwa dizazisi eluhlaza izalathisi ezingacacisi kaku hle kwiiofisi zesebekukho iiofisi zemicimbi yeze khaya ezili184 ezikwaziyo ukuthatha iifoto kunye nezinga ma411 ezikwaziyo ukunikezela ezinye iinkonzo.
tgt: ngokukangqongqoshe, lezi zinto ezilandelayo zenza inkinga ibe yimbi kakhulu: ■ ukungengameli ngendlela efanele kwamanye amahhovisi ■ ukungasetshenziswa ngendlela efanele kwabasebenzi.

src: umfama obhinqileyo ulime wada wanempumelelo nonkululeko mathebula ukususela ekuthwaxweni yindlala nasek wenziweni intlekisa kuba esebenza efa ma umahlatse matlakane (oneminyaka yobudala enga ma20) ngoku ungumfama ogqamileyo wepepile eluhla za.
tgt: umlimi wesifazane ophokophele empumelelweni nonkululeko mathebula okhule entula futhi ehlekwa ngokusebenza epulazini, manje usezakhele igama ngoku ba umlimi ovelele wophepha abaluhlaza, umahlatse matlakane (oneminyaka yobu dala engama20).

src: umahlatse waqala ukuvo lontiya kwifama yepepile eluhlaza ekufutshane nekhaya lakhe ngeempelaveki nangee holide zesikolo eminyaka ili15 ukuncedisa umama wakhe owayengaphangeli ukugxotha ikati eziko.
tgt: umahlatse waqala ukuvo lontiya epulazini lasendaweni elikhiqiza ophepha abaluhlaza njalo ngezimpelasonto noma kuvalwe izikole eneminyaka eyi15, futhi ezama ukusiza umama wakhe owayengase benzi ukuthi abe nokuya ngasethunjini.

src: umatlakane uzinze egamoisimane ebuchum nje ngaphandle kwepolokwane elimpopo.
tgt: umatlakane uzinze egamoisimane ebuchum eduzane nasepolokwane elimpopo.

src: uthi nangona ezonwabele nje iziphumo zokusebenza kwakhe nzima kodwa bekungekho lula nga lo lonke ixesha.
tgt: nakuba edla izithelo zomsebenzi wakhe, uthi akukaze kube lula nenze.

src: "ukukhula bekunzima kum nabantwana basekhaya.
tgt: "ngesikhathi ngikhula no dadewethu nabafowethu bekungelula neze.

src: iintanga zam zazidla ngokundihleka uku qala kwam ukusebenza efama zide zithi ubulimi ngumsebenzi wabantu abangafundanga.
tgt: ontanga bami bebengenza inhlekisa ngesikhathi ngiqala ukuse benza epulazini bethi ipulazi elabantu abangafundile.

src: "kwakundivisa kabuhlungu oko kodwa ndandifuna uku fumana ulwazi ukuze nam ndibe ngumlimi," utshilo.
tgt: "lokhu kwakungizwisa ubuhlungu kakhulu kodwa ngangifisa ukuqokelela ulwa zi ngezolimo ukuze ngolunye usuku ngigxile kulo mkha kha," elandisa.

src: uthe akufumana amava athile umatlakane waya kujohan nel, umnini wefama awayevolontiya kuyo wathe tha naye malunga nokutyala eyakhe imbewu yokukhulisa iipepile.
tgt: kwathi lapho umatlakane eseqokelele ulwazi, waqonda kumnikazi wepulazi ujohan nel, walapho ayevolontiya khona wacela ukutshala imbe wu alime ophepha abaluhlaza.

src: unel wamnika umhlaba ozihektare ezimbini kwifama yakhe.
tgt: unel wamabela emhlabeni wakhe umhlaba ongamahekthara amabili.

src: "ndamangaliswa yindlela imbewu nje encinane ekwazi ukujika ngayo ibe zizityalo ezivelisa iipepile eziluhlaza ezinkulu.
tgt: "kwangimangaza ukuthi imbewu encane ingashintshaikhiqize ophepha abaluhlaza abakhulu.

src: ukubona indlela ezikhathalelwa ngayo izityalo ngokusebenzisa izichumiso ukuthintela izinambuzane kwandenza ndakuthanda nangakumbi ukuba ngumlimi.
tgt: ukubona ukuthi izitshalo zinakekelwa kanja ni ngomanyolo ukulwisana nezimbungulu kwangenza ngaba nothando lwezolimo kakhudlwana.

src: ndaziqonda kwangoko ukuba nantsi into endinqwenela uku yenza," utshilo umatlakane.
tgt: kusukela ngale so sikhathi kwangicacela ukuthi ilokhu engifisa ukukwenza," ngokusho kukamatlakane.

src: emva kokuphumelela kwakhe imatriki umatlakane ukhe waphumla unyaka wamnye nangona wayesele amkelwe kwiidyunivesithi yaserhawu tini (iuj) ukuba ayokwenza izifundo zobugqwetha.
tgt: ngemuva kokuphothula umatekuletsheni umatlakane wahlala ekhaya nakuba inyuvesi yasegoli (iuj) yabe imamukele ukuba afundele umthetho.

src: wabuyela kunel ukuya kucela olunye uncedo lobu limi waza wamcebisa ukuba athethe nenkosi yalapho malunga nokuba imnike umhlaba.
tgt: wabuyela kunel wamcela ukuba amqwashise kabanzi ngezolimo, unel owamtshela ukuba akakhulume nenkosi yendawo ukuze imabele umhlaba.

src: emva kokuba inkosi ibone inkqubela yakhe kwifama kanel yamnika umhlaba ozi hektare ezingama40 kwifama ibabirwa ba tau ya tswala apho aliqhuba khona ngoku ishishini lakhe.
tgt: emva kokubona inqubekela phambili yakhe esebenza epu lazini likanel, inkosi yendawo yamabela umhlaba ongama hekthara angama40 epulazini ibabirwa ba tau ya tswala okuyilapho esebenzela khona.

src: oonogada bemiyezo yendalo bakhusela imikhombe dale hes umhloli wezendalo uphakamani nyawo (oneminyaka yobu dala engama26), nozinze kumyezo wolondolozonda lo, umkhuze game reserve kwiphondo lakwazuluna tal, ungomnye wabahloli bendalo abali1 659 nabanikwe uxanduva liliko lemiyezo yesizwe yasemzantsi afrika (isanparks) lokujo nga indalo kumaziko olondolozondalo karhulumente nawabucala kumzantsi afrika jikelele.
tgt: abaqaphi beziqiwu bavikela obhejane dale hes oqaphe ezemvelo uphakamani nyawo (oneminyaka yobu dala engama26), ozinze esiqiwini umkhuze game re serve esifundazweni sakwakwazulunatal, ongomunye wabaqaphi abayi1 659 abathweswe isouth african na tional parks (isanparks) umsebenzi wokuqapha ezemvelo eziqiwini zikahulumeni nezizimele eningizimu afrika yonkana.
