src: unyawo, noyinxalenye ye projekthi yabahloli bezendalo eqhutywa yiepwp , ukholelwa ekubeni kubalulekile ukufundiswa koluntu malunga nokulondoloza indalo.
tgt: unyawo, oyingxenye ya basebenzi abaqaphe ezemvelo ngaphansi kweepwp , ukholelwa ukuthi kusemqo ka ukufundisa umphakathi ngokunakekela imvelo.

src: "kufanele siphume siye eluntwini ukuze silwazise ukuba kutheni kubalulekile ukuba siyilondoloze indalo.
tgt: "sifisa ukuphuma sifundise umphakathi ukuthi kungani kubalulekile ukunakekela imvelo.

src: kulapho kuphela uluntu luyakuyazi indima nokubalule ka kwezilwanyana zasendle," utshilo.
tgt: kulaphoke umphakathi uzoqonda indima yezilwane nezinyamazane zasendle," ngokusho kukanyawo.

src: le nkqubo, ixhobisa abemi basemzantsi afrika abase batsha ngezakhono aba zidingayo ukuze bakwazi ukusebenza kulondolozo lwendalo nenzululwazi engezilwanyana nezityalo, iqinisekisile ukuba unyawo uyakwazi ukukhathalela usapho lwakhe.
tgt: lolu hlelo, okuwuhlelo olufundisa intsha yaseningizimu afrika amakhono ewadingayo ukuze isebenze emkhakheni wokongiwa kwemvelo, izilwane zasendle nezitshalo, lolu hlelo lusize unyawo ukuba anakekele umndeni wakhe.

src: "ikhaya lam linophahla olo meleleyo ngoku, olungavuziyo.
tgt: "umndeni wami usuno phahla olungavuzi, ngoba ngiyasebenza.

src: konke oku kwenzeke ngenxa yomsebenzi wam.
tgt: kuyangithoko zisa ukuthi ngathola leli thu ba," kusho unyawo.

src: umphathiswa wezendalo ugq edna molewa aba bahloli ubabiza ngokuba ‘ngoo nogada abakhusela imiyezo yendalo kuba badlala indima ebaluleke kakhulu ekulweni ulwaphulomthetho lwezendalo, olufana nokuzingelwa kubulawe imikhombe ngokungekho mthethweni.
tgt: edna molewa uhloniphe abaqaphi bezemvelo wababiza ‘ngabaqaphi beziqiwu’ ngo ba ngegalelo elikhulu aba nalo ukulwisana nobuge bengu kwezemvelo, obufana nokubulala obhejane.

src: "kulo nyaka uphelileyo kutyalwe abahloli bezendalo abali1 659 kwiindawo apho ukuzingelwa kubalawe imikhombe ngokungekho mthethweni kugquba khona ukuba bayokuncedisa ngokukhusela indalo.
tgt: "onyakeni odlule balinganiselwa kwi1 659 abaqaphi bezemvelo abasatshalaliswe ezindaweni ezidume kakhulu ngokubulala obhejane ukuze basize ngokuvikela ezemvelo.

src: bazakuxhotyiswa ukuba babe ngabakhuseli bemikhombe kwezi ndawo," utshilo.
tgt: laba baqaphi bazokhuthazwa ukuba babe amanxusa obhejane kulezi zindawo," ngokusho kukangqongqoshe.

src: unyawo ube yinxalenye yeqela elabamba umzingeli ongekho mthethweni e–umkhuze game reserve, nokukhokelele ekufunyanisweni kwakhe enetyala.
tgt: unyawo wayeyingxenye yethimba elabamba ozinge la abulale obhejane esiqiwini umkhuze game reserve, okwa holela ekuboshweni kwabathile ngobugebengu.

src: "ndaziva ndizingca ngamalinge wam kwaye kweli tyala, ulwazi olunzulu ngokhuselo lwezilwanyana zasendle lwandinceda njengokuba lwakhokelela ekubanjweni kwalo mzingeli ungekho mthethweni," utshi lo.
tgt: "ngiyaziqhenya ngemizamo yami kuleli cala, ulwazi lwangisiza kakhulu ngoba ilona olwaholela ekubanjweni kwa lowo owayezingela abulale obhejane," kusho unyawo.

src: ukuthakazelele kakhulu ukudalwa kwemisebenzi adele schormann inkqubo yokucima imililo ebizwa iworking on fire (iwof) ilawula inkqubo edibeneyo yolawulo lwemili lo nethe yaqinisekisa ngokuba iqesha uninzi lolutsha oluvela kumakhaya ahlelelekileyo.
tgt: bami ngomumo basungula amathuba omsebenzi adele schormann iworking on fire (iwof) ilawula uhlelo oludidi yelwe olongamele um lilo oseluqashe intsha eningi emiphakathini encishwe amathuba.

src: ngenkxaso yemali evela kwisebe lezendalo, le nkqubo ingena phantsi kwenkqubo yemisebenzi yoluntu enatyisi weyo (iepwp).
tgt: ngokuxhaswa umnyango wezemvelo, lolu hlelo luwela ngaphansi kohlelo olunwetshiweyo lwemisebenzi yomphakathi (iepwp).

src: inika ithemba kuninzi lolutsha olungafumani imisebenzi kwaye idlale indima enkulu ekuthinteleni nasekulawuleni imililo yamadlelo, nokunciphisa umo nakalo owenziwa yile mililo.
tgt: lunikeza abantu abasha abangawutholi umsebenzi ithemba futhi seluphumelele kakhulu ekunqandeni naseku vikeleni umlilo emaqeleni, lwe hlisa nomthelela womlilo.

src: le nkqubo iqeshe abantu abangaphezulu kwabangama5 000 abasuka kwiindawo ezi hlelelekileyo kwaye ibaqeqeshe kwizakhono zokwazi ngemi lilo, ezemfundo, ukuthintela nokubamba umlilo unganwenwi kunye nezinye izakhono, ezifana noncedo lokuqala, ukuchwela, ukupheka, ezempilo nokhuseleko kunye nonxibelelwano.
tgt: ngalolu hlelo sekuqashwe abantu abangaphezulu kwezi5 000 abaphuma emiphakathi ni entulayo futhi baqeqeshwa baqwashiswa ngomlilo, ezemfundo, ukunqanda nokuvimba umlilo nakwamanye amakhono, afana nosizo lokuqa la, ukubaza, ukupheka, ezempilo, ukuphepha nezokuxhu mana.

src: igosa lonxibelelwano lewof uleboang maseko ucacisa uku ba le nkqubo igxile kulutsha ize iqeshe nabantu abakhubazeki leyo ukuba basebenze kumaziko abo amaphondo.
tgt: ulebogang maseko wezokuxhumana kwiwof uthi lolu hlelo luqondiswe kubantu abasha futhi luqasha abantu abaphila nokukhubazeka uku ze basebenze ezizindeni zalo ezisezifundazweni.

src: "sigxininisa kakhulu kuphuhliso lwezakhono size sibonelele ulutsha olusanda kuphuma kwizikolo zamabanga aphe zulu ngemisebenzi okanye olusanda kuthweswa izidanga kumaziko emfundo ephakami leyo.
tgt: "sigcizelela kakhulu eku thuthukiseni amakhono futhi siqasha abantu abasha abasa phuma esikoleni noma abasanda kuthola iziqu ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme.

src: kwabo baqeshwe kwiwof, abangama94% lulutsha, abangama31% ngabantu ba setyhini ize i3% ibe ngabantu abakhubazekileyo," ungqine watsho.
tgt: kula ba abaqashwe ngalolu hlelo, abangama94% abantu abasha, abangama31% abantu besi fazane kuthi abayi3% kube abantu abaphila nokukhubaze ka," egcizelela.

src: ulorraine mokoena (one minyaka yobudala engama31) wasempumalanga ngomnye wabo baxhamlileyo kule nkqubo.
tgt: ulorraine mokoena (one minyaka yobudala engama31) wasempumalanga ungomunye wabaqashiwe futhi osezuze kulolu hlelo.

src: yiminyaka eli11 esebenza kwiwof.
tgt: usesebenze iminyaka eyi11 esebenzela iwof.

src: emva kokuphumelela kwakhe imatriki usokolile ukufumana umsebenzi isithuba seminyaka emibini.
tgt: emva kokuphothula umateku letsheni, waba nenkinga engawutholi umsebenzi iminyaka emibili.

src: udade wabo wamxelela ngale nkqubo yewof.
tgt: udadewabo wamtshela ngohlelo lwewof.

src: ukuphila qete yeyona nto ibalulekileyo kwizinto ezifunwayo phambi kokuba uthathwe kulo msebenzi kwaye ab a qalayo bavocwavocwa imizimba, beqeqeshwa.
tgt: ukuba qa tha inqubo esemqoka kakhulu kulo msebenzi futhi abantu aba zoqashwa bavocavocwa kanzi ma.

src: xa uphume lele ukumelana nemithambo enzima yokuvocavocwa kufu neka uphu melele novavanyo lukagqirha uze emva koko uqalise uqeqesho lokuba ngumcimimlilo," utshilo.
tgt: uma uphumelela lokhu ku fanele uxilongwe ngodokotela kulaphoke uzoqala uqeqeshelwe ukuba isicishamlilo," esala ndisa.

src: umokoena uqale njengomci mimlilo osaqalayo waza wase benza wenyuka wade wafikelela kwisikhundla sokuba ngumci mimlilo ophezulu weenkokheli zeqela labasebenzi, ekhokela iqela labacimimlilo abali18.
tgt: umokoena waqala eyisi cishamlilo esisezingeni eliphansi wasebenza wanyuselwa esikhundleni lapho engomunye wabaholi abaqavile, uhola izicishamlilo eziyi18.

src: "lo msebenzi ubuguqulile ubomi bam.
tgt: "lo msebenzi uyishintshile impilo yami.

src: ndim kuphela osebenzayo kubantwana base khaya nabantwana bam ababini.
tgt: ekhaya imina ngedwa engisebenzayo ukusiza odadewethu nabafowethu kanye nezingane ezimbili.

src: ngoku ndiyakwazi ukondla usapho lwam ndize ndithumele nabantwana bam eskolweni," utshilo umokoena.
tgt: manje ngiyakwazi ukunakeke la umndeni wami ngikhokhele nezingane zami esikoleni," ngokusho kukamokoena.

src: uvumile ukuba icandelo locimomlilo ngokwesiqhelo lilicandelo elinabantu abangamadoda abaninzi kwaye ufunde ukuba omelele yena njengoko engumntu wasetyhini kulo msebenzi.
tgt: "uvumile khona ukuthi ukuba isicishamlilo ngokujwayelekile umsebenzi wabantu besilisa futhi usefunde ukuba isikhondlakhondla kulo msebenzi njengoba engumuntu wesifazane.

src: umokoena uzimisele ekubeni ngumlawuli womsebenzi kule minyaka mibini izayo.
tgt: umokoena ufisa ukuba umph athi olawula konke eminyakeni emibili ezayo.

src: oku kuza kumenza ibe nguye ojongene nawo onke amaqela ewof asempumalanga.
tgt: lokhu kuzomenza angamele wonke amaqem bu ewof azinze empumalanga.

src: njengoko sijongene nexesha lemililo yamadlelo, umokoena unikezela ngezi ngcebiso zi landelayo ukuthintela imililo yamadlelo: musa ukuntumeka imililo kwindawo evulekileyo xa ungazokwazi ukuyilawula.
tgt: njengoba isikhathi samaqubu la omlilo sisondele, umokoe na usinikeze izixwayiso ezi landelayo zokuvikela umlilo wequbula: ungashisi umlilo endaweni evulelekile uma uzohlulwa ukuwulawula.

src: ukuguqula imfundo ephakamileyo amukelani chauke imfundo ephakami leyo yomzantsi afri ka iyaguquka, yaye le mfundo iphakamileyo aya nelanga nje ukufikeleleka kakhulu, kodwa ikwalunge lelaniswa neemfuno zoqoqo sho.
tgt: ukuguqula imfundo ephakeme amukelani chauke isimo semfundo ephakeme eningizimu afrika siyashintsha, njengoba imfundo ephakeme seyingeve nje ifinyeleleka kodwa seyiqondene kangco no ukuze ihlangabezane nezidingo zomnotho.

src: iinguqu ezi ziyafuneka njengoko ilizwe lisebenzela ukulungiselela abantu abase batsha imisebenzi nokuba negalelo kuqoqosho.
tgt: izi nguquko ziyadingeka nje ngoba izwe lisebenzela uku lungiselela abantu abasha balungele umsebenzi kanye nokuba negalelo kwezo mnotho.

src: njengoko eli lizwe libhi yozela inyanga yolutsha, ivuk’uzenzele iqwalasela indlela ulutsha lwelizwe olubonele lwa ngayo ngamathuba oku phumelela lisebe lemfundo ephakamileyo noqeqesho.
tgt: njengoba izwe libungaza inyanga yentsha, ivuk’uze nzele ibukisisa ukuthi intsha yezwe ihlinzekwa kanjani ngamathuba ngumnyango wezemfundo ephakeme nezokuqeqesha ukuze i phumelele.

src: unyulwe ngenyanga yomdumba njengomphathi swa wemfundo ephakami leyo noqeqesho, unaledi pandor waza wanikwa u msebenzi wokuqalisa nge nkqubo yemfundo enga hlawulelwayo ukulungisele la abafundi abahluphekileyo nabo kuthiwa "bayalenga lenga".
tgt: njengoba aqokwa ngonhlo lanja njengongqongqoshe wezemfundo ephakeme no kuqeqesha, unaledi pandor unikezwe umsebenzi wo kuqalisa uhlelo lwemfu ndo yamahhala kwaba mpofu kanye nalabo abazi wa njengezitshudeni ezingo ndingasithebeni.

src: emva koqhankqalazo lu kazwelonke oluthathe ixe sha elide phantsi komxholo othi: #feesmustfall , kwa ziswe okokuba ngenyanga yomnga ulutsha oluvela ku makhaya afumana imivuzo engaphantsi kwama350 000 eerandi ngonyaka luza kufu mana imfundo ephakamileyo noqeqesho engahlawule lwayo.
tgt: kulandela izibhelu zika zwelonke ngaphansi kwe siqubulo esithi: #feesmu stfall , kwamenyezelwa ngozibandlela ukuthi intsha evela emindenini lapho u mholo wakhona ungapha nsi kwezi350 000 zamarandi ngonyaka izothola imfundo yamahhala ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme nokuqeqeshwa.

src: sele izalisekiswa le nto, kwaye kuza kutha tha iminyaka emihlanu ukungeniswa kwayo.
tgt: ukuqali swa kokusebenza kwalolu hlelo kuyaqhubeka futhi kuzoqhutshwa esikhathini seminyaka emihlanu.

src: inkxasomali yebhasariumphathiswa pandor uqiniseki sile okokuba uku qaliswa kwenkqubo yebhasari kuhamba kakuhle.
tgt: isikimu somfundazeungqongqoshe pandor ukuqinisekisile ukuthi ukuqaliswa koku sebenza kwesikimu somfundaze ku yaqhubeka nga phandle kwe zinkinga.

src: "le nkqubo yebhasari intsha ilinyathelo lokungenelela eliba luleke kakhulu likarhulumente womzantsi afrika nelabantu bomzantsi afrika kuba ziirha fu zabo ezi zihlawula le mali," utshilo.
tgt: "isikimu esisha somfundaze siwuhlelo lukahulumeni waseningizimu afrika lokungenelela oluba luleke kakhulu futhi, empele ni, olwabantu baseningizimu afrika ngoba yintela yabo ekhokhela lokhu," kusho yena.

src: le nkqubo yebhasari inikwa abafundi abalungeleyo abaqala ukungena eyunivesithi kwana bafundi beekholeji zemfundo noqeqesho kwezobugcisa (itvet), ngayo yonke iminya ka yokufunda.
tgt: isikimu somfundaze sini kezwa izitshudeni eziqalayo enyuvesi kanye nasemako lishi okufundela umsebenzi wezobuchwepheshe bezandla nokuqeqeshwa (amatvet), kuwona wonke amazinga e minyaka yemfundo.

src: kule bhasari urhulumente wongeze imali ezibhiliyoni zeerandi eziyi7.166 ngowa ma2018 – kuyo ezibhiliyoni eziyi4.581 yeyabafundi base yunivesithi abafanelekileyo ize yona ezibhiliyoni eziyi2.585 ibe yeyabafundi beekholeji zetvet.
tgt: ukuze kuxhaswe isikimu somfundaze, imali kahulu meni eyengeziwe eyizigidigidi zamarandi eziyi7.166 ibeke lwa eceleni ngowezi2018 – kule mali, eyizigidigidi zama randi eziyi4.581 ibekelwe izi tshudeni ezifanelekile ezifu nda emanyuvesi, ize ezigidigi di zamarandi eziyi2.585 yona ibe ngeyezitshudeni zamako lishi amatvet.

src: umphathiswa pandor uthe iikholeji ezizincutshe kwizifu ndo ezizodwa zingangamaziko abalaseleyo afana ngqo nazala ezona zona zakhono kwisigaba esithile semfundo.
tgt: ungqongqoshe pandor uthe amakolishi agxile emikhakheni ethile yezemfundo angase abe yizikhungo ezivelele ezaziwa ngokukhiqiza amakhono aphambili emikhakheni yazo.

src: umzekelo, enye ikholeji inga gxila kuphela kubunjineli bokulungisa oomatshini nezi thuthi ize enye igxile kubuchule bokuhamba ngenqwelomoya nezokuphapaha, uchaze ngeli tshoyo.
tgt: isibonelo, ikolishi elilodwa lingagxila kwezobunjiniyela bokukhenikha bese elinye ligxila kwezokushayelwa kwezindiza, kuchaza yena.

src: "ndikholelwa ekubeni ikamva leekholeji lisekubeni zibe ziincutshe kwizifundo ezithile," wongeze watsho.
tgt: "ngikholwa ukuthi ukugxila emkhakheni owodwa kukho na kulele ikusasa lamakolishi," kwengeza yena.

src: "sifuna kungafanwa.
tgt: "sifuna izinto ezahlukile.

src: asifuni okokuba zonke iikholeji zethu zenze into enye."
tgt: asi funi wonke amakolishi enze into eyodwa."

src: umqhubi kadokolwane ushukumisa umzi allison cooper njengomqhubi ka dokolwane wakwa transnet ulindi le mdletshe (ominyaka inga ma30 ubudala) uqhuba oo dokolwane abanamandla abasetyenziswa ekunce diseni iinqanawa ukuba zikwazi ukungena kwizibu ko lasedurban.
tgt: umshayeli wezikebhe ushisa izikhotha allison cooper njengomshayeli wezikebhe wakwa transnet ulindile mdletshe (oneminyaka yobudala engama30) uye na oshayela izikebhe ezina mandla ezisetshenzise lwa ukulekelela ukuhamba kwemikhumbi echwebe ni lasedurban.

src: noxa be bancinci, oodokolwane ba namandla ngolona hlobo kwaye ukuqhutywa kwabo kufuna ubunono nobuchule.
tgt: yize noma zizincanyana, izikebhe ezi donsa ezinye kodwa zina mandla kakhulu futhi uku zishayela kudinga ikhono kakhulu.

src: umdletshe wazalelwa wakhulela eport shepstone, wafunda est faiths.
tgt: umdletshe ongowokuda buka esayidi wase efunda est faiths.

src: "akukho nto sasinga dibani nayo ngethuba si sakhula eport shepstone.
tgt: "kwakumnandi kakhu lu lapho ngakhulela kho na.

src: kwakungekho loyiko, nje ngoko kunjalo kule mihla, kwaye ilali yonke yayifaka isandla kumba wokukhuli swa kwabantwana.
tgt: kwakungekho kwesa ba, kungafani nezinsuku zanamhlanje, futhi wonke umuntu wayekhuliswa u mphakathi.

src: "umdletshe uphumelele imatrikhi yakhe ngowa ma2006, phambi kokuba a singise kwidurban universi ty of technology ukuya ku fundela idiploma kwimar itime studies ngowama2007.
tgt: "umdletshe waphothu la umatikuletsheni wakhe ngowezi2006, ngaphambi kokulibangisa edurban university of technology wayofundela inational di ploma kumaritime studies ngowezi2007.

src: akugqiba isi yakhe ngowama2007 nes2 ya khe ngowama2008 waqa lisa uqeqesho lwakhe elwa ndle oluthatha iminyaka emithathu phantsi kwenka mpani yakwasafmarine shipping company.
tgt: emva kokuphothula izi nga lakhe les1 ngowe zi2007 kanye neles2 ngowezi2008 waqhube ka nokuqeqeshwa kwa khe olwandle iminyaka emithathu, kanye nesafma rine shipping company.

src: apha wafunda ukuqhuba inqa nawa ethwala impahla phakathi elwandle, kwaye emisa kumazibuko ngamazi buko eeurope, eafrika naseasia ukuze ajongane nemisebenzi yemithwalo yempahla nokufunda nge zokhuseleko.
tgt: lapha wafunda khona ukuthi ushayelwa kanja ni umkhumbi wempahla, maphakathi nolwandle fu thi bema nasemachwebeni ahlukahlukene eeurope, eafrika naseasia ngemi sebenzi ehlobene nemithwa lo kanye nezinhlolovo zezo kuphepha.

src: isifundo sakhe sokuqa la sesidanga usiphumelele eneminyaka engama25, kwangelo xesha linye egqi bezela izifundo zesidanga semaster’s kwiport ope rations .
tgt: wathola iziqu zakhe zo kuqala eneminyaka enga ma25, ngenkathi epho thula iziqu zakhe zema ster’s kuport operations ngesikhathi esifanayo.

src: esi sesibini isidanga siqinisekise okokuba uku lungele ukuba ngumqhu bi kadokolwane osemthe thweni.
tgt: iziqu zakhe zemaster’s zimenze wafaneleka ukuba umsha yeli wezikebhe oqeqeshi we.

src: "le nto yayingowo na mngeni mkhulu kuba ukuba ngumqhubi kadoko lwane akufuni mntu unamfu ndo yasidanga.
tgt: "lokhu kwakuyinsele le enkulu kakhulu kimina ngoba ukuba umshayeli wezikebhe akudingi ukuba umuntu abe neziqu zemfu ndo, kudinga is1, s2 no kuqeqeshwa olwandle.

src: kufuneka is1, is2 nokuqeqeshwa e lwandle kuphela.
tgt: kuba ngemva kwalokhu kuphela lapho abantu beye babhalisele ukuba umsha yeli wezikebhe.

src: ndizenze zombini ezi zinto ngexesha elinye.
tgt: ngenza kokubili ngesikhathi esi sodwa.

src: uku phuma kwam emsebenzini, ndandiye ndiye esikolweni ndileqe umsebenzi wesikolo waloo mini," utshilo.
tgt: emva komsebenzi, ngangiye ngihambe ngiye esikoleni, ngifunde konke okwakwenziwe ngalelo la nga," kusho yena.

src: umdletshe uyakuthanda ukuba semanzini.
tgt: umdletshe uyakuthanda ukuba semanzini.

src: "amanzi angakuxelela izinto ezini nzi ngento eza kwenzeka ebudeni bemini.
tgt: "ama nzi akutshela okuningi ngokuthi usuku oluzayo luzolethani.

src: ngezinye iimini kuyazola, ngezinye u lwandle luyalwa.
tgt: ngezinye izi nsuku kuzolile, kwezinye kuba kubi kanti kwezinye kuqubuka amagagasi ama khulu, ngakhoke kuni ngi nje okwenzekayo olwa ndle!

src: kwakhona iinqana wa azimilanga ngokufanayo kwaye zithwala imithwalo eyahlukeneyo, nto leyo ethe tha ukuba ziqhutywa ngee ndlela ezahlukeneyo," u tshilo umdletshe, umntu oyi vuyelayo into yokusebenza nabasebenzi beenqanawa abazintlanga ezahlukeneyo futhi bephuma kumazwe ngamazwe.
tgt: imikhumbi iphinde ibe nemimo eyahlukene fu thi ithwala imithwalo eya hlukene, okuchaza ukuthi kufanele iphathwe nge ndlela ehlukile," kusho u mdletshe, okuthokozelayo ukusebenza namathimba anabantu abahlukahlukene, nabavela emazweni ahlu kene.

src: umsebenzi onemingeniukuba ngumntu obhinqileyo kwicandelo laselwandle kunemingeni futhi akululanga kwaphela utshilo umdletshe, obalula imiba engqiyame ngesini njengomnye weyona mingeni mikhulu ngolona hlo bo kuba umsebenzi onjengalo usathathwa njengomsebenzi wamadoda.
tgt: umsebenzi onezinseleleukuba umuntu wesifazane emkhakheni wezokuthutha ngemikhumbi akulula neze kusho umdletshe, obeka izi nkinga ezigxile kwezobulili njengezinselele eziphambili njengoba kusewumkhakha obukwa njengowamadoda kakhulu.

src: "nanjengoko abantu aba bhinqileyo bezama ukungena kulo msebenzi kwaye bese benza nzima ukubonisa ukuba abantu bayaphazama kwezi ngcinga, umsebenzi lo wona unayo indawo yokubanzima.
tgt: "yize noma abesifazane bezama ukuzishutheka no kusebenza kanzima ukuze babonise ukuthi lokhu oku shiwoyo akulona iqiniso, kungumsebenzi onzima.

src: le nto ndiyoyise ngokuphola, ukucinga ngendlela eyakhayo nokusebenza nabantu nge ndlela eyenza ukuba bandi hloniphe.
tgt: nga kunqoba lokhu ngokuba ngi ngaphakamisi umoya, ngihla le ngicabanga ngokunethe mba futhi ngisebenze naba ntu ukuze bangihloniphe.

src: ngokuthi gqolo uzama kwaye ukhuthele, le miqobo ungayoyisa," utshilo.
tgt: ngokubelesela nokuzimise la, ungazinqoba lezi zithiyo," kusho yena.

src: impumelelo kamdletshe yokoyisa le miqobo ingqi nwa yimbasa awayifumanayo njengebambela lomphathi wezobugcisa kwezolwa ndle.
tgt: impumelelo kamdletshe yokunqoba lezi zithiyo iyabonakala ngendondo ayi hlomulile njengemenenja eyi bamba kwezobuchwepheshe bemikhumbi nolwandle.

src: "ndafumana le mba sa ngokuba ngoyena mntu ubalaseleyo kumsebenzi wam ngexeshana elifu tshane kuba iziphumo zophi cothozincwadi zomsebenzi wam zabuya zingenachaphaza iveki yokuqala ingaphelanga ndilibambela esikhundleni."
tgt: "ngahlomula ngendondo ngokuba ngovelele esikhathi ni esifushane ngenxa yokuthi umsebenzi wami wathola u mphumela wocwaningoma bhuku ongenagcobho evikini lokuqala ngibambe kulesi sikhundla."

src: waphinda wafumana imba sa "yokuba ligorhakazi" kweyedwarha ngowama2017 ngenxa yokusindisa iinqanawa kwesona siphango sakha sabo nwa nesakha sasibi edurban.
tgt: waphinde wahlo mula ngendondo ‘yokuba yiqhawe’ ngomfumfu wezi2017, ngokusiza imikhumbi esichothweni esasisibi kakhu lu esake sabonakala edurban.

src: "ukuba ngumqhubi kadoko lwane kuthetha ukuba kufu neka ube ngathi uyintombi endala kwaye ube nesibindi," utshilo.
tgt: "ukuba umshayeli wezike bhe kuchaza ukuthi kwesinye isikhathi kufanele uqunge ube nesibindi," kusho yena.

src: ukuphumelela kwakhe isi fundo sesidanga semaster’s kwenza umahluko omkhulu.
tgt: ukuphothula iziqu zakhe zemaster’s kwaletha umehlu ko omkhulu.

src: "ukuphumelela kwam imfu ndo yesidanga kwaqinise kisa okokuba ndihlonitshwa ngakumbi ngoogxa bam abangamadoda.
tgt: "ukuthola iziqu zami kwaqinisekisa ukuthi ngithola ukuhlonishwa okukhulu ngabalingani bami besilisa.

src: yonke imi hla bandibuza okokuba ndi xakeke yintoni kuba sibabini kuphela abahambe lo mgama kwaye ndaba ngowokuqala ukuphumelela imaritime di ploma kwizibuko lasedurban.
tgt: bangibuza zonke izinsuku ukuthi ngimatasa ngani ngoba sibabili kuphela esesihambe leli banga futhi ngaba owokuqala ukuthola imaritime diploma echwe beni lasedurban.

src: le nto iyodwa nje indenza ndibalasele," utshilo, echaza nokuba izifundo zolwandle azilulanga.
tgt: lokhu kuphela kungenza ngibe ngovelele," kusho yena, echa za ukuthi izifundo zokusebe nza emikhunjini nasolwandle akulula ukungena khona.

src: umsebenzi womqhubi kadokolwaneumdletshe uchaza athi u mqhubi kadokolwane nguye olawula noqhuba udokolwane nabantu abakhweleyo.
tgt: umsebenzi womshayeli wezikebheumdletshe uyachaza ukuthi umshayeli wezikebhe cishe u lawula isikebhe sonkana kanye nabantu abagibele kuso.

src: kufuneka aqinisekise uku ba ukhuseleko lukho kwaye izixhobo zokucima umlilo zikwimeko entle, ziqiniseki siwe.
tgt: kufanele aqikelele ukuthi izimpahla zokuphepha ne zokucisha umlilo zisesimweni esifanele futhi ziqinisekisiwe ukuba ziyasebenza, aqhube inhlolovo yezokuphepha yaminyaka yonke esikebheni, aqikelele ukuthi ithimba lithola ukuqeqeshwa futhi asayine i zincwadi zabo zokuqeqeshwa, aqhube izibukezo zo kunganyelwa kokwenziwa komsebenzi, nokusiza abase benzi bakhe bahlanganise uhle lo oluthuthukisiwe ngokuha mbisana nomkhakha wabo womsebenzi, ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izinqubomgomo zenkampani ziyathotshelwa kanye nokubhekelela izitolo nokufaka amaoda amathu luzi okusebenza.

src: abantu abayivali imilomo ngumhlaba abawubuyiselweyo siya miti abantu basempuma koloni baza kutha tha inxaxheba kwica ndelo lezilwanyana zasendle emva kokuba befumene imali kurhulumente yokuqalisa umyezo wezilwanyana zasendle oza kuba ngowoluntu.
tgt: umphakathi ugubha isivumelwano sokubuyiselwa umhlaba obize izigidi zamarandi ezingama21 siya miti umphakathi wase mpumalanga kapa uzozibandakanya kwezemvelo ngemva koku thola ukuxhaswa ngezimali uhulumeni ukuze kuhlele lwe uhlelo lokubamba iqhaza kwibhizinisi lezilwane zasendle.

src: indawo yasedouble drift cebu kuhle erhini inabantu aba li1 500 abaphuma kumakhaya angama264.
tgt: umphakathi wasedouble drift ngasegrahamstown uhlangani sa abantu abayi1 500 abaqha muka emindenini engama264.

src: basuswa kumhlaba wabo ngurhulumente wase ciskei ngowe1991, kusenzelwa umyezo wezilwanyana zasendle wabantu abamhlophe.
tgt: basuswa emhlabeni wabo uhu lumeni waseciskei ngowe1991, ukuze kwakhiwe isiqiwi esasi nabanikazi abamhlophe.

src: abantu balapha basanda kufumana iitayitile zalo mhlaba, obuyiselwe kubo ngenkqubo karhulumente yokubuyiswa komhlaba.
tgt: umphakathi usanda kuthola amatayitela omhlaba, owabu yiselwa kuwona ngokupha thelene nohlelo lokubuyiselwa komhlaba.

src: ngokokutsho kwenkulumbuso yasempuma koloni uphumu lo masualle, kubekelwe bucala imali ezizigidi ezingama21 zee randi ukulungisela ukuthenga lo mhlaba kwaye uza kunikezelwa ebantwini ngezigaba ezahlukeneyo.
tgt: ngokukandunankulu wasempumalanga kapa uphumulo masualle, izigidi zamarandi ezi ngama21 sezibekelwe ukubuyi selwa kwalo mhlaba futhi lokhu kuzokwenziwa ngezigaba.

src: "eli linyathelo elibalulekileyo kumalinge olondolozo nawokuzisa iinguqu.
tgt: "lokhu kuyisinyathelo esi balulekile ngokuphathelene nokulondoloza imvelo kanye nokwenza izinguquko.

src: lo myezo wezilwa nyana zasendle uyalungiswa ukuze ube kumgangatho apho uza kukwazi ukukhuphisana neminye imiyezo yezilwanyana kwaye norhulumente uluxhasa ngemali, izilwanyana zasendle kunye noqeqesho uluntu lwalapha," utshilo umasualle.
tgt: lesiqiwi sisathuthukiswa ukuze sikwazi ukuncintisana nezinye iziqiwi futhi uhulumeni weseka umphakathi ngokuwuxhasa ngezimali, ngokunikela izilwa ne zasendle kanye nokuqeqe sha," kusho umasualle.

src: abantu balapha, abawulawula kunye nearhente yezokhe nketho nemiyezo empuma kolo ni (iecpta) lo myezo phantsi kwelikhayalethu community property association (ilcpa), bafumene imali ezizigidi zee randi ezithandathu kwisebe lezendalo yokuba baqalise ishi shini ngezilwanyana zasendle kulo myezo, uzihekthare ezili 1 400 ubukhulu, bawuthengelwe isebe lezokuphuhliswa kwamaphandle nobuyekezo lwemihlaba.
tgt: umphakathi, ophethe isiqiwi ngokuhlanganyela nesikhu ngo sasempumalanga kapa esibhekelele iziqiwu kanye nezokuvakasha (iecpta) ngaphansi kwelikhayalethu communal property association (ilcpa), uthole izigidi zamarandi eziyisithupha kumnyango wezemvelo ukuze uthuthukise ibhizinisi lomnotho ovela kwezemvelo esiqiwini esingamahekthare ayi1 400 owasithengelwa umnyango wokuthuthukiswa kwezindawo zasemakhaya kanye nezi nguquko kwezomhlaba.

src: usihlalo welcpa, umxolisi ngesi, uthi abantu balapha bafaka isicelo sokubuyiselwa umhla ba ngowe1998.
tgt: usihlalo welcpa, umxolisi ngesi, uthe umphakathi wafaka isicelo sawo sokunxeshezelwa ngowe1998.

src: ngowe2012, baye banikwa umhlaba ozihe kthare ezingama23 500 ekungo ku nje othe waphinda wonge zwa ngomyezo wezilwanyana zasendle ozihekthare ezili1 400.
tgt: ngowezi2012, amalungu omphakathi anike zwa amahekthare angama 23 500 asephinde engezwa nga mahekthare ayi1 400 esiqiwi.

src: "sivuya kakhulu kuba siyifumene yonke into ebesiyifu na.
tgt: "sijabula kakhulu ngoba sigcine sikutholile lokho ebe sikufuna.

src: urhulumente usincedise nangemali yokwakha iziseko zophuhliso.
tgt: uhulumeni usixhase ngezimali ngokuphathelene nengqalasizinda.

src: sinazo izilwanyana zasendle, eziquka amaqwa rhashe ali10, amaxhama ali15 neempofu ezili10," utshilo ungesi, esongeza nokuba kuza kuthengwa iinyathi neeimpala kungekudala.
tgt: sinezilwane zasendle ezihlanganisa amadube asentabeni ayi10, izindlu zele eziyi15 kanye nezimpofu eziyi10," kusho ungesi, engeza nangokuthi kusazotholakala izinyathi kanye nezimpala maduze nje.

src: uphinde wongeza ngelokuba abantu balapha bafumana uqeqesho kwiecpta ngeendlela zokulawula nokuphatha umye zo wezilwanyana zasendle.
tgt: wengeza nangokuthi umpha kathi wawuthola ukuqeqeshwa yiecpta ukuze uqhube isiqiwi.

src: "izicwangciso zethu kukwakha iilodge ezimbini kodwa ngoku sele sisakha iindawo zokuhlala oonogada balo myezo kunye nobuhlanti bokothulela izilwa nyana ezifikayo," utshilo ungesi.
tgt: "sihlele ukwakha izindawo zokuhlala izivakashi (amalodge) ezimbili futhi sisakha izizinda zabaqaphi basesiqiwini kanye nesibaya okuzothululwa kuso izilwane," kusho ungesi.

src: oosomashishini bezamachiza basefreyistatha badala imisebenzi more matshediso inkampani yeli eyenza iikhemikhali incedisa kwidabi lokulwa ingxaki yokunqaba kwemisebenzi ngokuthi idale imisebenzi esisigxi na engama70 eharrismith kwiphondo lasefreyistatha.
tgt: osozimboni abamnyama abenza amakhemikhali basefreyistata badala amathuba emisebenzi more matshediso inkampani yendawo eyenza amakhemikhali isiza ukulwa nokwentuleka kwemisebenzi ngokudala imi sebenzi ezinzile engama70 eharrismith efreyistata.

src: ikevali chemicals yinkampani yokuqala yasefreyistatha eye yabantu abamnyama eyenza iikhemkhali.
tgt: ikevali chemicals iyinka mpani yabantu abamnyama yokuqala efreyistata eyakha amakhemikhali okulanza ama nzi, ezenhlanzeko kanye nawo kuhlanza izindlu zangasese kanye neglu yokunamathisela.

src: le nkampani yenza iintlobo ezahlukeneyo zeekhemikhali zokuhluza ukungcola emanzini, ezokucoca endlwini kunye nakwizindlu zangasese futhi yenza neglu yokuncamathisela.
tgt: le nkampani yasungulwa ngowezi2014 abangani abahlanu abangongoti ezimbonini zamakhemikhali, izimpahla ezithengisa ngokushesha, ukwe nziwa kwemikhiqizo, kanye nokunamathelisayo.

src: le nkampani yasekwa ngowa ma2014 ngabahlobo abahlanu abazingcali zeekhemikhali, kwiimpahla ezithengiseka ngokukhawuleza, kumsebenzi wokuqaliswa nokudidiyelwa kweemveliso ezintsha kunye nakwiintlobo ezahlukeneyo zeglu yokuncamathisela.
tgt: umqondisi wesigungu seziphathimandla wekevali chemicals ufuneka khumalo uthi ibis yaxhasa inkampani yakhe ukuze ithole imishini kanye nezinsizakusebenza ukuze iqale ukwakha kanye nokukhiqiza izinsiza zokuhla nza amanzi, ukuhlanza kanye nokubulala amagciwane kanye neglu yokunamathisela.

src: umlawuli wesigqeba wakwa kevali chemicals ufuneka khu malo uthi ibis yayinceda inkampani yabo yatsho yakwazi ukuthenga oomatshini kunye nezinye izixhobo zokuqalisa ukuvelisa iimveliso zokuhluza ukungcola emanzini, ezokucoca endlwini nezokubulala iintsholongwane kunye neglu yokuncamathisela.
tgt: "ekuqaleni kwadingeka ukuthi sifake imali ukuze ibhizinisi liqale ukusebenza kodwa ekugcineni sathola umxhaso emnyangweni wezohwebo nezezimboni (idti) ngebis kanye nenkampani yokuthuthukiswa kwezimboni (iidc),’ kwengeza yena.

src: "ekuqaleni kwanyanzeleka ukuba sifake imali kweli shishini ukuze likwazi ukuqalisa ukusebenza kodwa ethubeni saye safumana inkxasomali kwisebe lezorhwebo noshishino (idti) ekhutshwa yibis kunye nequmrhu lophuhliso lwamashishini (ipic)," ucacise watsho ukhumalo.
tgt: ibis iwuhlelo lomxhaso lwenqubomgomo yosozimboni abamnyama ehlose ukuvulela amathuba osozimboni abamnyama abasebenza kumnotho waseningizimu afrika ngenxa yokungenelela okuqonde okuthile, okuphokophele ukuzuza okuthile nokuhlelwe ngendlela ethile okuphathelene kanye nokungaphathelene nezimali.

src: ibis yinkqubo yezibone lelomali yomgaqonkqubo woosomashishini abamnyama eyenzelwe ukuvulela amathuba oosomashishini abamnyama basemzantsi afrika ngokuthi banikwe uncedo olungayimali okanye lube zezinye izinto ezinge yomali olulungiselelwe kanye bona kunye neemeko zabo.
tgt: ukhumalo uthe kwabiza izigidi zamarandi eziyi18 ukuze ibhizinisi liqale ukusebenza kanye nezinyanga cishe eziyi11 ukuze liqale ukwenza inzuzo.

src: ukhumalo uthi batyala imali ezizigidi ezili18 zeerandi ukunceda inkampani ukuze ikwazi ukuqalisa ukusebenza kwaye kwathatha iinyanga ezili11 ukuze inkampani iqalise ukwenza inzuzo.
tgt: le nkampani ihambisa imikhi qizo yayo eningizimu afrika yonkana kanye naseuganda, enamibia, kanye nasetanzania.

src: imveliso zayo le nkampani zithe ngiswa kulo lonke eli lomza ntsi afrika futhi ziyafumaneka naseuganda, namibia kunye nasetanzania.
tgt: ukhumalo uthe umthelela inkampani enawo ezimpilweni zabantu bendawo mkhulu kunokudala amathuba emisebenzi.

src: ukhumalo uthi indima edla lwa yile nkampani ekuhlaleni ingaphezulu nakule misebenzi iyidalayo.
tgt: "ngaphezu kokudala ama thuba emisebenzi kubantu bendawo, sinohlelo lokutshala izimali ngokuphathelene neze nhlalo esisiza ngalo abesifazane baselokishini kanye nasezindaweni zasemakhaya ukuthi baqale amabhizinisi amancane agxile ekwakheni imikhiqizo yokuhlanza ikhaya kanye nokuhlanza izindlu zangasese," kusho yena.

src: ukudalela ulutsha lwasekzn imisebenzi hlengiwe ngobese abantu abatsha abangaphezulu kwama20 aba phuma kwiphondo lakwa zulunatal baza kuxhamla kumzimveliso wakwamahindra owakhiwe ngema li ezizigidi ezingama95 eerandi.
tgt: ukudalwa kwamathuba emisebenzi entsha yasekzn hlengiwe ngobese abantu abasha aba ngaphezu kwa ma20 bakwazu lunatali bazohlomula embonini yemahindra ebize izigidi zamarandi ezingama95 ezokwakha uhlobo olusha lwamaveni angamadouble cab abizwa ngokuthi yipik up endaweni engaphandle kwasedurban.

src: lo mzimveliso ukufutshane nesixeko sasedurban uza kuvelisa uhlo bo olutsha lweeveni ezina macango amane, idouble cab, ezibizwa ngokuba zipik up.
tgt: abantu abasha abangama25 bakwazulunatali sebethole ukuqeqeshwa baphide baqashwa ngenxa yokuvulwa kwemboni entsha yemahindra.

src: abantu abatsha abangama25 bakwazulunatal bafumene uqeqesho kunye nomsebenzi ngokuvulwa kwalo mzimveliso mtsha wakwamahindra edurban.
tgt: abasebenzi bathola ukuqeqeshwa ngokuba mbisana nenkampani yakwamahindra kanye neaih logistics futhi bazohanjiswa eindia ukuze bayothola okunye ukuqeqeshwa lapho kudi ngeka khona.

src: abasebenzi bafumana uqeqesho oluqhutywa yinkampani yakwamahi ndra group isebenzisana noaih logistics futhi baza kuthunyelwa eindia ukuze bafumane olunye uqeqesho xa kukho imfuneko.
tgt: ukulinga ukwakhiwa kwezimoto kwesikhungo kuyaqhubeka futhi kuli ndeleke ukuthi kukhiqizwe izimoto eziyizi2 000 ngonyaka, bese ngokuhamba kwesikhathi kube yizimoto eziyizi4 000 ngonyaka.

src: umsebenzi wokuvelisa iimoto kodwa osalingwayo sele uqalile kulo mzimve liso kwaye kucetywe uku velisa iimoto ezingama 2 000 ngonyaka, inani elo liza kunyuka ngokuha mba kwexesha libe zimoto ezingama4 000 ngonyaka.
tgt: "ukutshalwa kwezimali kuhle ngokuphathelene nokuzethemba kwezama bhizinisi.

src: "olu tyalomali luza kwenza amanye amashishini aluthembe uqoqosho lweli lizwe.
tgt: kuyaqhubeka nokukhombisa ukuthi lapha kwazulunatali siyindawo ekahle kwaba tshala izimali.

src: oku kubonisa ukuba ikwazulunatal liphondo elityebileyo ngamathuba otyalomali.
tgt: kuthu mela nomlayezo kulabo abalokhu bengabaza ukuthi idurban iyindawo ekahle ngokuphathelene nokutshalwa kwezimali," kusho ungqongqoshe wesifundazwe wokuthuthu kiswa kwezomnotho, ezokuvakasha nezindaba zemvelo usihle zikalala ngesikhathi sokwethulwa kwemboni.

src: lo mzimveliso ukwangumzekelo wamalinge enziwa yidurban okuthoba amaxhala kwabo bamathidala ukuza kutyala imali kwesi sixeko," utshilo umphathiswa wephondo wezophuhliso loqoqosho, ezokhenketho kunye nezendalo, usihle zikalala ngethuba kuvu lwa lo mzimveliso ngoku sesikweni.
tgt: wathi amathuba okuqala okuqashwa azoqhamuka kule nkampani azoba nesandla ekwandiseni isibalo sabantu abanamakhono esifundazweni.

src: uthi imisebenzi yokuqala edalwe ngulo mzimveliso iza kwandisa inani labantu abanezakhono kweli phondo.
tgt: omunye wabasebenzi ofunde wagogoda izifundo zobunjiniyela usthembiso mthembu okujabulela kakhulu ukuthi useyasebenza.

src: omnye wabasebenzi balo mzimveliso ngusthembiso mthembu onesidanga sobunjineli, uthi uvuya kakhulu ngalo msebenzi.
tgt: "bengihleli ekhaya unya ka wonke ngingawutholi umsebenzi.

src: amathuba owafumana ebomini, wasebenzise amukelani chauke isebe lezolimo lasentsho na koloni liqhuba inkqu bo enceda amafama asa qalayo nalawo sele emile ngenkxaso ukusuka mhla ubani waqalisa ukufama xa efuna uncedo ngezimali ade akwazi ukuzimela.
tgt: uma impilo ikujikijela ngolamula, batshale amukelani chauke umnyango wezoli mo entshonalanga kapa uqhuba uhle lo olusiza abalimi abasha nasebethuthukile ngamasu okubeseka kusukela ngosu ku lokuqala lapho bedinga usizo lwezimali kuze kube yilapho sebezimele.

src: inkqubo yokuxhasa noku phuhlisa amafama incede abantu abatsha abafana nowayne mansfield (one minyaka engama33 ubudala) wasepaarl, osuke ekubeni ngu mthengisi wasesitalatweni osebenzela utatomncinci wa khe emarikeni yasekapa xa kuvalwe izikolo waya ekube ni ngusomashishini othume la kumazwe angaphandle iilamuni azilima ngokwakhe kumhlaba awuqeshileyo.
tgt: uhlelo lokwesekwa no kuthuthukiswa kwabalimi selusize abantu abasha aban jengowayne mansfield (one minyaka engama33 ubuda la) wasepaarl, osuke ekubeni asebenze njengomdayisi kamalume wakhe emakethe yasekapa ngesikhathi esa funda isikole njengoba ma nje esedayisa olamula bakhe abatshale esiqeshini somhla ba asiqashile.

src: kwisithuba seminyaka eli shumi edlulileyo, umansfield engusomashishini osakhasayo oneminyaka engama23 ubu dala, zange asithathe isithuba somsebenzi awayesifumana kwifama awayethenga kuyo iilamuni awayezithengisa ngelo xesha.
tgt: eminyakeni eyishumi eye dlule, ngesikhathi engusoma bhizinisi oneminyaka enga ma23 ubudala, umansfield walahla ithuba lokusebenza epulazini ayebheka kulona olamula ukuze athengise kabusha.

src: isizathu sakhe yayikukuba ngelo xesha waye ngenamdla kwinto yokuba ngu mfama.
tgt: ngaleso sikhathi wayengenandaba nokulima.

src: kodwa ekuhambeni kwemi nyaka, oku kwaye kwatshi ntsha xa ebona indlela iilamu ni ezithengwa ngayo.
tgt: kodwake, iminyaka emba lwa eyalandela, wawushi ntsha umqondo lapho ebona ukukhula kwesidingo sola mula.

src: "ndaqaphela ukuba amafa ma nawo enza le nto nathi bathengisi basesitalatweni sasiyenza ayezipakishela iimveliso zawo aze aye kuzi thengisa emarikeni yasekapa.
tgt: "ngaphinde ngabona uku thi abalimi babenza okwa kwenziwa yithina badayisi abahamba ngezinyawo – babepakisha isitokwe sabo bese besidayisa emakethe yasekapa.

src: ndaye ndaqonda ukuba thina njengabathengisi basesitala tweni siza kungabi nabantu siza kubathengisela.
tgt: ngabona ukuthi kungekudala thina badayisi abahamba ngezinyawo sizo phelelwa indawo yokudayi sa, "kusho yena.

src: malunga nonyaka wama2013, umfama walengi ngqi wavuma ukuba afundise umansfield onke amaqhinga okuba ngumfama waza wamni ka umhlaba ozihektare ezili12 ukuba awuqeshe.
tgt: ngomnyaka wezi2013, umlimi wasendaweni wavu ma ukucebisa umansfield fu thi wamqashisela amahektha ayi12 omhlaba.

src: waya wa faka nemibhobho yokunkce nkceshela into leyo yanceda umansfield watsho wakwazi ukulima.
tgt: waphinde wamfakela uhlelo lokunisela olwenza umansfield akwazi ukutshala.

src: ngowama2015, wakwazi ukuthumela kumazwe anga phandle umthwalo weelamuni ozitoni ezingama31.
tgt: ngonyaka wezi2015, wa kwazi ukudayisa ngapha ndle lwaleli cishe amathani angama31 kalamula futhi ngowezi2016, lesi sibalo sakhuphuka kakhulu saba ngamathani angu168.

src: oku kwenzeka ngenxa yoku fundiswa nokuqeqeshwa ngu makhwekhwetha kunye nangoncedo awalifumana kwinkqubo yokuxhasa noku phuhlisa amafama into leyo yamenza wafumana isibone lelomali senkqubo ebanzi yokuxha sa ezoli mo (icasp) ngowama2015.
tgt: ngenxa yenkuthazo nosi zo oluvela kuhlelo lokwe sekwa nokuthuthukiswa kwabalimi okwamenza wathola isibonelelo sohle lo oluphelele lokwesekwa kwezolimo (icasp) ngowe zi2015, wakwazi ukubeka isisekelo esiqinile futhi wa chuma njengomlimi.

src: esi sibonelelomali samnceda kakhulu watsho wazinza futhi nefama yakhe yakhula.
tgt: ukwandisa nokuhlomisa abalimiuhlelo lokwesekwa nokuthuthukiswa kwabalimi luhlose ukwandisa noku chumisa imiphakathi yabantu ababengabonelelwa ngaphambilini, ikakhulukazi abahlomuli bohlelo lokwabiwa kabusha komhlaba.

src: ukuxhobisa amafama ngezakhonoinkqubo yokuxhasa nokuphuhlisa amafama ilungiselelwe ukuxhobisa ngezakhono abantu ababehlelelekile ngaphambili, ingakumbi abo baxhamla kwinkqubo karhulumente yokubuyiswa kwemihlaba.
tgt: lu bhekelela abalimi abasafufusa, abalimela ukuziphilisa, aba limi abancane nabahwebayo.

src: inceda amafama asakhasayo, lawo alimela ukuzondla wona neentsapho zawo, lawo aneefama ezincinci kunye nalawo arhwebayo.
tgt: umqondisi wezinhlelo ze zinsizakalo zokuthuthuki swa kwezolimo kumnyango wezolimo entshonalanga kapa ushaheed martin uthe lolu hlelo selusize abalimi bakwazi ukuzimela.

src: inhi yinkqubo yeenkonzo zempilo engcono kakhulu vukuzenzele unnamed umphathiswa weze mpilo ugq aaron motsoaledi uthi umthethosihlomelo oyilwa yo weinshorensi yesizwe yezempilo (inhi) uza ku wuphucula umgangatho weenkonzo zempilo emza ntsi afrika.
tgt: inhi iwuhlelo lezinsizakalo zempilo eziphuculiwe vukuzenzele unnamed ungqongqoshe wezempilo udkt aaron motsoaledi uthi umthethosivivinywa womshuwalensi wezempi lo kazwelonke (inhi) uzo thuthukisa izinga lezinsizaka lo zempilo eningizimu afrika.

src: ugq motsoaledi ebethe tha kutsha nje kwintla nganiso nonoondaba apho ebenika iinkcukacha ezi gcweleyo ngomthethosihlo melo oyilwayo wenhi kunye nomthethosihlomelo oyilwa yo wezikimu zezonyango.
tgt: umotsoaledi ubekhulu ma kamuva nje enkundleni yabezindaba lapho ambule khona umthethosivivinywa wokuchibiyelwa kwenhi kanye nomthethosivivinywa wokuchibiyelwa kwezikimu zezokwelapha.

src: le mithetho iyilwayo inga maqalela amalinge okulu ngiselela ukuba abantu abaninzi bafumane iinkonzo zonyango ngenhi.
tgt: le mithethosivivinywa izo phendla indlela yokufikelela kangcono izinsizakalo zempi lo ngenhi.

src: umthetho oyilwayo ngu mthetho ongekagqitywa osafuna ukugqithiswa kuwo onke amanqanaba okwenzi wa komthetho.
tgt: umthethosivivinywa uyinguqulo yomthetho ewuhlaka.

src: imithetho eyilwayo emininzi ibhalwa lisebe likarhulumente, isebe elo likhokelwa ngumphathi swa walo.
tgt: imithethosivivinywa eminingi ibhalwa yiminyango kahulu meni ngaphansi kokuqondi swa ngungqongqoshe ofane lekile.

src: umthetho oyilwayo kufuneka uvunywe yikha bhinethi phambi kokuba unge niswe epalamente.
tgt: umthethosivivinywa kufanele ugunyazwe yikha bhinethi ngaphambi kokuba uthunyelwe ephalamende.

src: ukungeniswa kwale mi thetho iyilwayo mibini ku thetha ukuba umzantsi afri ka sele kumbovu ukuba ube nenkqubo yeenkonzo zempilo zomntu wonke, into leyo ethe tha ukuba inhi iza kuba ngu mthetho kungekudala.
tgt: ukwethulwa kwale mithetho sivivinywa yomibili kusho ukuthi iningizimu afrika isiseduze ekufinyeleleni izi nsizakalo zempilo ezingujike lele okusho ukuthi inhi ma duze nje izoba ngumthetho.

src: le nkqubo iza kuqinisekisa uku ba bonke abemi bomzantsi afrika bayazifumana iinko nzo zempilo ezibalukeleki leyo, nokuba umntu usebenza phi na okanye akanayo imali yokubhatala inhi.
tgt: inhi yindlela yokuxhasa ngezimali ezoqinisekisa uku thi zonke izakhamuzi zase ningizimu afrika zihlinze kwa ngezinsizakalo zempilo ezibalulekile, kungakhatha liseki isimo sabo sokusebe nza kanye nokuthi bazokwazi na ukuba nabakufakayo ngqo esikhwameni.

src: ugq motsoaledi uthi urhulu mente uyayazi ukuba abanye abantu bakholelwa ekubeni akufuneki kuthethwe noku thethwa ngenhi, ingeka lungiswa inkqubo karhulu mente yezempilo ekwisimo esimaxongo kuqala.
tgt: umotsoaledi uthe uhulume ni wazi kahle kamhlophe uku thi abanye abantu bakholelwa ukuthi ngaphambi kokukhu luma ngenhi, kunesidi ngo sokulungisa izinsizakalo zempilo ezikhungweni zokwe lapha zikahulumeni ezidonsa kanzima kuqala.

src: uthi urhulumente uyazazi iingxaki zeenkonzo zempi lo ezingekho mgangathweni nezisokolekayo ukuba zifu nyanwe kumaziko ezempilo karhulumente.
tgt: uthe uhulumeni uzazi kahle izinkinga zekhwalithi embi kanye nokuntuleka koku sebenza kahle ohlelweni lwezempilo lukahulumeni.

src: ugq motsoaledi uthi isi cwangciso sophuhliso sesi zwe (indp) saphawula ukuba ikhona ingxaki kwi inkonzo zempilo kumaziko karhulumente kwaye ngo kuqalisa inkqubo yenhi kuza kulungiswa ingxa ki yeenkonzo zempilo ezi ngekho mgangathweni ku maziko karhulumente kunye neyeendleko eziphezulu ku maziko abucala.
tgt: umotsoaledi uthe uhle lo lokuthuthukiswa kwe zwe (indp) luye lwayi gqamisa ngokungananazi nokuthi ekuqaliseni uku sebenza kwenhi, izinga eliphansi lezinsizakalo ze mpilo kanye nezindleko ezi khona zezinsizakalo zempilo embonini ezimele kudingeka kubhekanwe nazo.

src: nangona izilungiso kule mi thetho iyilwayo zisagwadlwa, isebe liza kuqalisa ngeeproje kthi zenhi ezine ubuncinane.
tgt: ngenkathi izichibiyelo ezi bhekiselwe kwimithethosivi vinywa zidingidwa, umnya ngo uzoqalisa ukusebenza okungenani amaphrojekthi amane enhi, okuzobanda kanya izinsizakalo zempilo ezikoleni, izinsizakalo zempi lo zalabo abakhubazeke ngo kwengqondo, izinsizakalo zempilo zabesifazane aba khulelwe abanezinkinga ngokukhulelwa kwabo ezi bhedlela ezingama22 ezithi nteka kakhulu kanye nokwe lashwa komdlavuza (ionco logy), ngosizo oluqondile egauteng nakwazulunatali, kodwa futhi nezinye izifunda zwe zingashaywa indiva.

src: imisebenzi yeofisi kazwelonke yokuqwalasela izicelo yowama2018 vukuzenzele unnamed yintoni iofisi kazwelonke yokuqwalasela izicelo (icach)?
tgt: icentral application clearing house (icach) yowezi2018 vukuzenzele unnamed iyini icentral application clearing house?

src: iofisi kazwelonke yokuqwalasela izicelo yavulwa lisebe lemfundo ephakamileyo noqeqesho ukuze incede okwethutyana abafundi abafanelekileyo abaqala kwizinga lemfundo ephakamileyo noqeqesho (ipset) abafuna uncedo ngale miba ilandelayo: abo bafake isicelo sokufunda kwangethuba kwiziko lemfundo abalithandayo saze isicelo sabo asaphumelela ke ngoku sele bedlulelwe lixesha ukuba bangafaka isicelo kwamanye amaziko.
tgt: central application clearing house, ebizwa ngokuthi yicach, umzamo wesikhashana womnyango wemfundo ephakeme nokuqeqesha yasungulwa umnyango wemfundo ephakeme nokuqeqesha ukuze isize abafundi abafuna izikhala zokufunda ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme abafisa ukungena ohlelweni lwemfundo elandela ukuqeda isikole nokuqeqeshwa (ipset) kodwa kungenzeka ukuthi ibhekene nesimo lapho: befake isicelo kusenesikhathi ezikhungweni zemfundo abazikhethile kodwa izicelo zabo zachithwa, manje osekuphele isikhathi sokubhalisa kwesinye isikhungo.

src: abo bangakhange bafake zicelo kuba bengawafumenanga la manqaku afunwayo kwibanga 11 ukuze umntu athathwe.
tgt: labo abazoba ngabafundi abangasifakanga isicelo ngoba bengakwazanga ukuthola imiphumela edingekayo kubanga le11 ukuze babhalise kodwa bathole ukuthi imiphumela yabo yebanga le12 iyahlangabezana nalokho okudingekayo ukuze babhalise.

src: abo bangakhange bafake sicelo ngexesha ngenxa yezizathu ezahlukeneyo okanye khange bafake sicelo kwaphela.
tgt: abangazange basifake isicelo ngesikhathi ngenxa yesizathu esithile noma abangazange basifake nhlobo isicelo.

src: aba bangayaziyo ukuba baza kufundela eliphi ikhondo.
tgt: abangazi nhlobo ukuthi bazofundani lapho beqeda umatikuletsheni.

src: abo bayaziyo into abayifundelayo qha bengaqinisekanga ukuba eli khondo balithandayo libalungele na.
tgt: abazi kancane ngalokho abafuna ukukufunda kodwa abangenasiqiniseko ukuthi ingabe lo mkhakha ubalungele na.

src: iinkonzo ezinikezelwa yicach izicelo zokufuna indawo zokufunda kwizinga lepset (iidyunivesiti, iidyunivesiti zezobuchwepheshe, iikholeji zemfundo noqeqesho lobugcisa nobuchule (iitvet) kunye namaqumrhu amacandelo emfundo noqeqesho (iiseta) ulwazi ngeendawo ezinceda ngemali yokufunda (inkcukacha ngensfas) iinkonzo zengcebiso ngamakhondo (iingcebiso, ulwazi, ukuboniswa nokucetyiswa ngamakhondo/ulwazi ngeendawo ezinceda ngemali yokufunda, kunye neentlobo ezahlukeneyo zemali yokufunda).
tgt: imisebenzi ehlinzekwa icach izicelo zamathuba okufunda epset (emanyuvesi, emanyuvesi obuchwepheshe, emakolishi emfundo yezobuchwepheshe namakhono emisebenzi kanye nokuqeqeshwa kanye nesector education and training authorities).

src: ukuxhasa amagcisa (iziko lesizwe lokuxhasa uphuhliso lwamagcisa).
tgt: ulwazi mayelana nosizo lwezimali (ulwazi lwenfsas).

src: icach ivula ngomhla wesi3 kweyomqungu, isithutyana nje emva kokuba iziphumo zeemviwo zebanga 12 zikhutshiwe kwaye iza kuvula kude kuye ekupheleni kweyomdumba ngowama2018.
tgt: imisebenzi yecach iqala ngomhla ka 3 kumasingana 2018, ezinsukwini ezimbalwa kusanda kuphuma imiphumela yokuhlolwa yensc futhi izosebenza kuze kube sekupheleni kukanhlolanja 2018. icach isebenza kanjani?

src: inqanaba 1: abafundi abangayifumenanga indawo yokufunda kumaziko emfundo ephakamileyo ebebefake kuwo izicelo, okanye abo bafuna indawo yokufunda kwiipseta, bangaqhagamshelana necach kule nombolo ingahlawulewayo: 0800 356 635, kwiwebhusayithi (www.
tgt: isigaba 1: abafundi abangasitholi isikhala ezikhungweni abafake izicelo kuzo, noma abafuna amathuba okufunda epset, bangaxhumana necach kunombolo yamahhala (0800 356 635), iwebhusayithi (www.

tgt: dhet.

src: gov.
tgt: gov.

src: za) okanye ngokuthumela isms (igama kunye nenombolo yesazisi ku49200) okanye bangabhalisa ngokungena kuintanethi.
tgt: za) noma ngomyalezo wesms ojwayelekile (thumela igama ngesms ku 49200) noma bangabhalisa online.

src: ungafumana ezinye iinkcukacha ku facebook (cach_sa).
tgt: eminye imininingwane ungayithola ekhasini labo le facebook (cach_sa).

src: inqanaba 2: umsebenzi wecach uza kumtsalela umnxeba umfundi lowo, kwiziko lemibuzo aze ambhalise kuluhlu lwecach, enika iinkcukacha ngekhondo elikhethwe ngulo mfundi kunye nephondo abafuna ukufunda kulo.
tgt: isigaba 2: amaejenti azoshayela umfundi, ofuna isikhala sokufunda esikhungweni semfundo ephakeme, ucingo mahhala, ngokusebenzisa isikhungo sezingcingo, kubhaliswe nemininingwane kusizindalwazi secach, kuhlonzwe umkhakha umfundi awubhalisele kanye nesifundazwe afisa ukufunda kuso.

src: inqanaba 3: iinkcukacha zomfakisicelo kunye neziphumo zakhe zebanga 12 ziyaqinisekiswa zize zizithumele zona ngokwazo kumaziko emfundo ephakamileyo ngeenjongo zokukhangela ukuba umfundi lowo angayifumana na indawo yokufunda futhi athathwe.
tgt: isigaba 3: imininingwane eqondene nomfakisicelo kanye nemiphumela kamatikuletsheni kuzoqinisekiswa futhi kudluliselwe esikhungweni semfundo ephakeme nokuqeqesha ngokuzenzakalela ukuze mhlawumbe umfundi abhaliswe noma afakwe esikhungweni.

src: inqanaba 4: icach iza kuqinisekisa iinkcukacha zomfundi ize izithumele kumaziko emfundo asenazo iindawo zokufunda.
tgt: isigaba 4: imisebenzi yecach izoqinisekisa imininingwane yomfundi futhi iyidlulisele ezikhungweni ezisenezikhala.

src: amaziko aseneendawo zokufunda kwaye nomfundi lowo enazo ezi zinto zifunwayo, iziko lemfundo elo liza kuqhagamshelana nomfundi ngqo ngokwalo.
tgt: lapho kukhona izikhala, abafakisicelo behlangabezana nakho konke okudingekayo, kuzoxhunywana nezikhungo ngqo.

src: izinto ekufuneka ziqatshelwe icach ayizibopheleli ithi umfakisicelo uza kuyifumana indawo yokufunda.
tgt: amaphuzu okumele aqashelwe icach ayikwazi ukuqinisekisa umfakisicelo ukuthi uzosithola isikhala.

src: icach ayinakuxelela iziko lemfundo ukuba maliqhagamshelane nini na nomfaki sicelo.
tgt: icach ayikwazi ukubona ukuthi isikhungo sizomthinta nini umfakisicelo ukuze mhlawumbe athole isikhala.

src: ingaba icach ibanceda njani abafakizicelo abangaqinisekanga ngekhondo abafuna ukulifundela okanye abangenazo ezi zinto zifunwayo ukuze umntu afunde kwizinga lepset?
tgt: icach isiza abafakisicelo abangenasiqiniseko sokuthi bafuna ukufundani noma labo abangahlangabezani nalokho okudingekayo ukuze bangene ohlelweni ipset?

src: icach isebenzisana neziko lesizwe leenkonzo zamakhondo (icsd) lona elinceda abantu ngolwazi olugcweleyo malunga: namakhondo ahlukeneyo.
tgt: imisebenzi yecach isebenza ngokubambisana nesikhungo sokuthuthukisa imisebenzi kuzwelonke (incds) esiza ngokuhlinzeka ngolwazi lwezemisebenzi olunzulu kanye neseluleko mayelana: imisebenzi kanye nemikhakha efundwayo ukukhetha isifundo.

src: izifundo ekufuneka zikhethwe.
tgt: ulwazi ngokuhlola kokuchibiyela.

src: ulwazi ngemviwo zoxabangelo ukuphucula amanqaku ebanga 12 indawo zokufunda ezikhoyo kwizinga lepset.
tgt: ukulungiswa kwemiphumela yakamatikuletsheni.

src: imali yokufunda kunye neentlobo zayo.
tgt: izindlela ezingakhethwa zoxhaso kanye nosizo lwezezimali.

src: ulwazi ngenkqubo yokufaka izicelo kunye nemihla yokugqibela yokufaka izicelo.
tgt: ulwazi ngezinqubo zesicelo kanye nezinsuku zokuvala.

src: ukufaka isicelo sekota yesibini kunye nemihla yokubhalisa.
tgt: ukufakwa kwesicelo kwengxenye yesibili yonyaka kanye nezinsuku zokubhalisa.

src: naye nabani na onomdla kwiinkonzo ezifumaneka kwicsd angaqhagamshelana neziko lemibuzo lecsd ngokusebenzisa ezi zixhobo zilandelayo: thumela ngesms umbuzo wakho okanye thumela u"please call me" ku: 072 204 5056, okanye tsalela umnxeba le nombolo: 086 999 0123, eyinombolo esetyenziswa ngabantu abaninzi, ukusuka ngomvulo ukuya ngolwesihlanu phakathi kwentsimbi ye8:00 kusasa no4:30 emva kwemini, iimeyile: careerhelp@dhet.
tgt: noma ubani onentshisekelo emisebenzini ehlinzekwe amacds angaxhumana nophiko lwezosizo lwecds ngokusebenzisa izinkundla ezilandelayo: thumela umbuzo wakho ngesms noma uthumele umyalezo othi "please call me" ku: 072 204 5056, noma shayela u: 086 999 0123, okuyinombolo ehlanganyelwayo, kusukela ngomsombuluko kuya kulwesihlanu phakathi kwehora lesi8 ekuseni nelesi4:30 ntambama, thumela iimeyli ku: careerhelp@dhet.

src: abantwana abahluthiyo baqhuba kakuhle kwizifundo zabo more matshediso abantwana besiko lo abangaphezulu kwizigidi ezisithoba kwizikolo zikarhulumente emzantsi afrika banakho ngoku ukwenza umsebenzi wabo wesikolo.
tgt: izisu ezigcwele ziholela emiphumeleni engcono more matshediso bangaphezu kwezigi di abafundi abafu nda ezikoleni zika hulumeni eningizimu afrika yonkana abakwazi ukwenza umsebenzi wabo wesikole ngenxa yohlelo lukahulumeni oluqinisekisa ukuthi izisu zabo zigcwele ukudla okunempilo.

src: oku kwe nzeka ngenxa yenkqubo ka rhulumente eqinisekisa uku ba bafumana ukutya oku nezakhamzimba.
tgt: umnyango wezemfundo eyisisekelo (idbe), ngoku sebenzisa uhlelo lokuhli nzeka ngokudla okune mpilo ezikoleni (insnp), usebenze waze weqa umgo mo wawo wokuhlinzeka ngokudla kubafundi bakule li abangama75%.

src: isebe lemfundo esisise ko (idbe), lisebenzisa inkqubo karhulumente yo kutyis a a bantwana ezikolweni (insnp), lifike legqithisa kwinjongo ebe lizibekele yona yokubone lela ngokutya abantwana besikolo abamalunga nama 75% kweli lizwe.
tgt: umqondisi wensnp kulo mnyango, uneo rakwena, uthe izikole eziyizi20 619 zipheka futhi ziphakele abafundi abalinganiselwa kuzi9 032 622 ezweni nsu ku zonke.

src: umlawuli wensnp ese beni, uneo rakwena, uthi izikolo ezingama20 619 ziphekela zize ziphakele abantwana besikolo abazi 9 032 622 ngosuku kulo lonke eli.
tgt: uthe izikole ezingabanda kanywanga ohlelweni ku mele ziqonde emahhovisi esifunda uma zifuna ukuba yingxenye yohlelo.

src: uthi izikolo ezingaxha mliyo kule nkqubo kufune ka ziye kwiiofisi zesithili ukuba nazo zifuna ukuba yinxalenye yale nkqubo.
tgt: onyakeni wezimali wezi 2015/16, isabelomali esabe lwe lolu hlelo silinganise lwa kuzigidigidi eziyisi 5 703 zamarandi.

src: ngonyakamali wama 2015/16, imali emalunga neebhiliyoni zeerandi ezi yi5 703 yaye yabekelwa bu cala ukulungiselela insnp.
tgt: urakwe na uthe imali esetshenziswa ohlelweni iyakhushulwa minyaka yonke ukuze ku hlangatshezwane nokukhu phuka kwamanani ezinto, is abelomali sonyaka wezimali wezi2017/18 silinganiselwa kuzigidigidi eziyisi6.4 zam arandi.

src: urakwena uthi le mali i c hi th w a ku l e n kqu bo iyongezwa rhoqo ngonya ka kulungiselelwa umba wokunyuka kwamaxabi so ezinto, ke ngoko imali ebekelwe insnp yowa ma2017/18 imalunga nee bhiliyoni eziyi6.4 zeerandi.
tgt: lolu hlelo luqeda indla la yesikhashana futhi lube negalelo esimweni senhla lakahle yabafundi.

src: insnp ilicebo lexesha eli futshane lokugxotha ikati eziko kwaye inegalelo elihle kakhulu kubomi babafundi.
tgt: uthe, "izingane eziningi zi buya emakhaya adla imbu ya ngothi, futhi kwabanye abafundi, ukudla kwase sikoleni yikho kuphela ukudla abakudlayo ngosu ku.

src: "abantwana abaninzi ba phuma kumakhaya angatha thi ntweni, angenamali yo kuthenga into esiwa phantsi kwempumlo, kwaye abanye abantwana oku kutya baku fumana esikolweni, yiyo yodwa abayityayo ngosu ku.
tgt: ukudla okutholakala esikoleni kubanikeza umd landla wokufunda, bakwazi ukugxilisa umqondo kanye nokuzibandakanya eklasi ni."

src: ukutya abakufumana esikolweni kuyabanceda abafundi kwizifundo zabo, bakwazi ukuhlala bemamele bethatha nenxaxheba kwi zifundo zabo," utshilo.
tgt: ukubhaliswa esikoleni kanye nokuya esikoleni kwabafundi kuthuthukile ngenxa yohlelo lokuhlinze kwa kwezingane ngokudla.

src: u rakwena wongeze ngelithi amanani abantwana abaya esikolweni enyukile futhi abantwana basiha mba kakuhle isikolo ngenxa yale nkqubo yokutyiswa kwabantwana ezikolweni.
tgt: kamuva nje, ikhabhinethi igunyaze ukushicilelwa kombiko wokuhlola insnp odidiyewe umnyango we zokuhlela, ukuqapha kanye nokuhlola (idpme).

src: kwezi ntsukwana zimba lwa zidlulileyo, ikhabhi nethi ivumile ukuba kupapa shwe ingxelo yokuvava nywa kwensnp, ebhalwe lisebe lezokucwangcisa, ukuhlola nokuvavanya (idpme).
tgt: lo mbiko ubonakalisa impu melelo kanye nezinyathe lo ezithathiwe ukuze ku thuthukiswe lolu hlelo.

src: le ngxelo ichaza izinto eziyimpumelelo eze nziwe yinsnp kunye na manyathelo anokuthathwa ukuphucula indlela esebe nza ngayo.
tgt: umqondisi wezokuhlo la kudpme, ujabu mathe, uthe inhlosongqangi yoku hlola wukuhlola ukuthi ingabe insnp iqaliswa ngendlela engaholela em phumeleni omuhle ozohlo mulisa abafundi maqondana nezempilo kanye nezemfu ndo.

src: umlawuli wezokuhlola kwidpme, ujabu mathe, uthi eyona njongo ipha mbili yokuvavanya insnp ibikukujonga ukuba ingaba isebenza ngendlela eza kwenza umahluko obo nakalayo kwimpilo na kwindlela abaqhuba ngayo abafundi kwizifundo zabo.
tgt: ugcizelele ukuthi inhlo songqangi yohlelo isiyonke ukuthuthukisa isimo seze mpilo kanyene sok ondlek a k wab afun di ababuya eminde nini edla imbuya ngothi eningizimu afrika.

src: ukubethelele ukuba eyo na njongo ingundoqo ye nsnp kukuphucula impilo yabafundi abaphuma ku makhaya asokolayo kunye nokuqinikisa ukuba imizi mba yabo yomelele ngenxa yezakhamzimba abazifu mana ekutyeni.
tgt: lolu hlelo luqondiswe kubafun di abafunda ezikoleni zika hulumeni eziku quintile 13, okungamaphesenti anga ma60 ezikole ezinezingane eziqhamuka emindenini em pofu eningizimu afrika.

src: insnp ikwanceda nase kulweni indlala ebantwini kuba idala imisebenzi.
tgt: uhlelo luphinde lusize ukuqeda ubub ha emi phakathini ngokudala ama thuba omsebenzi.

src: "inkqubo yokuvavanya ifu manise ukuba insnp inike abantu abangamavolontiya ancedisayo ekulungiseni ukutya abangaphezulu kwa ma50 000 ngonyaka ama thuba omsebenzi okupheke la abantwana ukutya.
tgt: "ngenkathi kuhlolwa ku tholakale ukuthi insnp ihlinzeka abantu abalungi selela abafundi ukudla ben gaholelwa, abangaphezu kwezi50 000 minyaka yon ke, ngethuba lokukhokhe lwa isibonelelo semali yokugibela okungama960 amarandi ngenyanga," ku sho umathe.

src: la mavolontiya nawo afumana nemali yokuwabulela enga ma960 eerandi ngenyanga," utshilo umathe.
tgt: "sekukonke kwakha inani lwezibonelelo eziyizigidi ezingama 576 zamarandi ngonyaka ezisiza amalungu omphakathi."

src: "imali yokuhlawula aba ntu ngokubabulela zizigidi ezingama576 zerandi ngo nyaka, imali leyo iya eba ntwini basekuhlaleni."
tgt: uhlelo luphinde lusimamise ukuqhutshwa kwemisebe nzi ethuthukisa ezomnotho njengamabhizinisi aman cane nasafufusa kanye nezigungu ezisebenza ngokubambisana, phecelezi amacooperatives okuyi wo azuzayo njengabahli nzeki bemisebenzi kulezo zifundazwe ezinezindawo ezihlinzeka ngemisebenzi eziqhelelene (kwazuluna tali, egauteng, empumala nga nasenyakatho kapa).

src: insnp ikwanegalelo ele nzayo kuqoqosho njengoko amashishini amancinci, aphakathi namancinane (ii smme) kunye nookopolo tyeni exhamla kuba ngawo asebenza njengababonele lizinkonzo kumaphondo akhuphela eminye imise benzi yokulawula insnp kwamanye amaqumrhu (la maphondo yikwazuluna tal, igauteng, impumalanga kunye nomntla koloni).
tgt: ukutholakala kwemifi no endaweni kunamathu ba okuhlomulisa izikole nemiphakathi kuphin de kuthuthukise ezolimo zasendaweni.

src: uyolisa uphila ngokuthengisa izinto ezihonjiswe ngeentsimbi dale hes ukuthanda imisebenzi yobugcisa kuncede ufuma waziqalela ishishini eliqhuba kakuhle kakhulu.
tgt: uyolisa wenza ubuhlalu obumholela empumelelweni dale hes uyolisa fuma usethuthuke ngo kumangalis ayo ukusukela ekuphileni impi lo yobumpofu empumala nga kapa, ukuya ekutholeni uthando lwezobuciko kanye nomsebenzi wezandla futhi manje useqhuba eyakhe imi hlangano yokucobelelana ngolwazi ukuze abelane ngamakhono akhe nabantu besifazane abangasebenzi.

src: sele esuka eku thwaxweni yintsokolo nendlala empuma kolo ni, waya wazibona ukuba uyayithanda imisebenzi yobugcisa nezandla ku ngoku nje uneshishini la khe apho aphuhlisa aba nye oomama abangase benziyo ngezakhono.
tgt: ufuma wazalelwa eloki shini elingaphandle kwase queenstown empumalanga kapa, ehlala endlini encane namalungu omndeni wakhe ayi15.

src: "abantu basekhaya babe ngenamali yaneleyo yoku ndifundisa.
tgt: "umndeni wami wawunge nayo imali eyanele yokungi hambisa esikoleni.

src: ngenxa yokuba ndandingafundanga, kwaye kwanyanzeleka ukuba ndenze amanye amacebo okuzenzela imali," utshilo ufuma.
tgt: njengoba ngangingafundile, kwadinge ka ukuthi ngithole indlela yami yokwenza imali," kusho ufuma.

src: wachitha ixesha lakhe eli ninzi efunda ukunitha waza waya kuhlala nodawe wabo ekapa.
tgt: wachitha amahora amaningi efunda ukukhrosha (uku nitha) wase eya ekapa eyo hlala nodadewabo.

src: ufuma waye wazi fundisa ukuhlohla iintsimbi, waze walishiya ikapa waya embekweni epaarl eyokufu na amadlelo aluhlaza.
tgt: ufuma wabe esezifundisa ukwenza umsebenzi wobuhlalu, wase ethuthela embekweni epaarl ukuyofuna amadlelo aluhlaza.

src: "baninzi abantu ababendi buza ngomsebenzi weentsi mbi.
tgt: "babebaningi abantu ababe funa okwenziwe ngobuhlalu.

src: ndaye ndakhangela zonke izinto ezihonjiswe ngeentsimbi ndaza ndazi qhaqha kuba ndifuna ukuzi bona ukuba zenziwe njani.
tgt: ngokhoke ngathatha imi sebenzi embalwa eyenziwe ngobuhlalu ngase ngiyiqaqa isinyathelo ngesinyathe lo ukuze ngithole ukuthi yayenziwe kanjani.

src: ndaye ndazifundisa ukwe nza ezam izinto ezihonjiswe ngeentsimbi ndaqalisa uku zithengisa ekwezi centre epaarl.
tgt: ngase ngizifundisa ukwenza imi khiqizo yami ngase ngiqala ukuyithengisa eikwezi cen tre epaarl," kusho yena.

src: ufuma wayengomnye woosomashishini aba sakhasayo abenza izinto ezihonjiswe ngeentsimbi owakhethwa ngumasipala wengingqi wasedraken stein ukunye nedrakenstein local tourism associa tion (idlta) ukuba aye kwizifundo zoqeqesho ezaziqhutywa yicraft and design institute (icdi).
tgt: ufuma wayengomunye wabakhiqiza umsebenzi wezandla abangama 20 abakhethwa ngumasipala wendawo wasedrakenstein kanye nedrakenstein local tourism association (dlta), ukuze bayokwethamela uhlelo lokuqeqesha lwezinsu ku ezine olwalusingethwe yicraft and design institute (icdi).

src: ezi zifundo zifundisa oosomashishini iindlela zokwenza imizekelo yezi nto ezinokuthengiseka lula kubathengi ukunceda ama gcisa emisebenzi yezandla ukuba aziqalale awawo amashishini.
tgt: uhlelo lwafundisa ababe bambe iqhaza ukuthi bakhi qize amasampula emikhiqizo ethandwa ngamakhasimende ezosiza abenza umsebenzi wezandla ukuthi bathuthu kise amabhizinisi abo.

src: ngethuba sithatha inxa xheba kweza zifundo si fundiswe indlela yokubha la isicwangciso seshishini.
tgt: "emhlanganweni wokuco belelana ngolwazi safundiswa ukuthi singazenza kanjani izinhlelo zethu zokuhlelela ibhizinisi.

src: ndilibulelela kakhulu eli thuba, njengoko ndiza ku kwazi ukukhulisa ishishini lam," ufuma ucaciswe wa tsho.
tgt: ngibonga kakhulu ngaleli thuba, ngoba sengizo kwazi ukuthuthukisa ibhizini si lami," kuchaza ufuma.

src: izinto zakhe ezihonjiswe ngeentsimbi nezinithiweyo ngoku zithengwa ngabantu abasuka phesheya kwe zilwandle, emazweni afana negermany nesweden.
tgt: imikhiqizo yakhe yobu hlalu kanye nekhroshiwe seyithengwe nangamakhasi mende akude akogermany nakosweden.

src: "kunzima ngamanye amaxesha, kodwa inkxaso endiyifumene kwicdi na kumasipala, indincedile ndatsho ndenza imali yokondla abantwana bam abane.
tgt: "bekuba nzima ngesinye isikhathi, kodwa ngenxa yokwesekwa yicdi kanye nomasipala, sengikwazile ukuqala ukwenza imali kanye nokweseka izingane zami ezine.

src: amaphupha am ama maninzi azalisekile," utshilo ufuma.
tgt: sekufezeka namani ngi amaphupho ami," kusho ufuma.

src: uyolisa wagqiba kweloku ba naye ufuna ukufundisa nabanye oomama abanga sebenziyo kulo mmandla olu lwazi kunye nezakhono anazo, ukuze nabo bakwazi ukuzenzela imali yokondla iintsapho zabo.
tgt: uyolisa wanquma ukuthi ufuna ukwedlulisela ulwa zi kanye namakhono akhe kubantu besifazane abanga sebenzi basendaweni, ukuze nabo baqale ukuzenzela imali abayidingayo ukuze beseke imindeni yabo.

src: ungaleka uyaxhamla nge nxa yothando lokulima hlengiwe ngobese ngethuba untombi fikile ngaleka eqala ukulima imi funo eyadini yakhe waye ngazi ukuba ngenye imini uza kuba ngumlimi ongu somashishini othengisela iivenkile zasekuhlaleni kunye nezikolo.
tgt: uthando lukangaleka lokulima imifino lwamqhubela ebhizinisini hlengiwe ngobese ngesikhathi unto mbifikile ngaleka eqala ukutshala imifino egcekeni lakhe wayengazi ukuthi ngelinye ilanga uzoba nebhizinisi lezolimo elithengisela izi tolo zendawo kanye nezi nhlelo zokupha abafundi ukudla ezikoleni.

src: ungaleka (oneminya ka yobudala engama67) ngowakwaxolo eport shep stone, kwiphondo lakwazu lunatal.
tgt: ungaleka (oneminya ka yobudala engama67) ngowakwaxolo eport shepstone, esifundazweni sakwazulunatali.

src: ulima isipinatshi, ikhaphe tshu, umnqathe, iitumata, itswele, iimbotyi kunye neebhanana.
tgt: ulima isipinashi, iklabishi, izaqathi, utamatisi, uanya nisi, ubhontshisi kanye nobhanana.

src: ishishini lakhe laphumelela imbasa yoku ba ngumvelisi obagqwese bonke ngowama2016 ngethuba kubanjwe umsitho weembasa zesebe lezolimo lakwazulunatal, ifemale entrepreneurs awards.
tgt: ibhizinisi lakhe liphumelele umklomelo wokhiqiza imifino ehamba phambili ngowezi2016 ngesikhathi semiklomelo yefemale entrepreneurs awards yomnyango wezoli mo wakwazulunatali.

src: ungaleka uthi ngethuba eqalisa ukulima imifuno, wayefuna ukunceda usapho lwakhe ukuba lufumana imifuno kodwa kwathi kuba enothando lwamashishini waphela sele eneshishini.
tgt: ungaleka uthe ngesikhathi eqala ukutshala imifino, wayefuna ukusiza umndeni wakhe ukuthi uthole imi funo kodwa le ntshisekelo yakhe yamqhubela ebhizi nisini.

src: ukwaqashe nabanye ooma ma basekuhlaleni kule fama yakhe.
tgt: useqashe nabantu besifazane ababili bendawo abasebenza epulazini lakhe.

src: "ngokwangoku ndilima imifuno yam kumhlaba ozihektare ezimbini ko dwa awanelanga.
tgt: "okwamanje ngitshala imifino yami emhlabeni ongamahekthare amabili kodwa awanele.

src: abantu bafuna imifuno yam kuba andisebenzisi machiza aneekhemikhali ndisebe nzisa umgquba endiwutha tha ebuhlanti.
tgt: abantu bafuna imifino yami ngoba angisebenzisi umanyolo ona makhemikhali ngisebenzisa umquba ovela ezibayeni," kusho yena.

src: ungaleka, owayenguti tshala ngaphambili, uthi ukulima wayekuthanda ese ngutitshala esebenza egci lima primary.
tgt: ungaleka, owayenguthi sha, uthi waba nothando lwezolimo ngesikhathi esasebenza njengothisha egcilima primary.

src: "ndandiqhele ukuthi xa ndibuya esikolweni ndiye emasimini.
tgt: "bengibuya esikoleni bese ngiya emasimini.

src: ngethu ba kufika ixesha lokuthatha umhlalaphantsi inye into endandiyifuna yayikukuli ma ngexesha endinalo.
tgt: ngesikhathi sengithatha umhlalaphansi into kuphela engangifuna ukuyenza uku lima ngesikhathi engangi ngenzi lutho ngaso".

src: "ndaqala ngesipinatsi, ikhaphetshu kunye nebi truthi ndizithengisa kule klinikhi yalapha.
tgt: "ngaqala ngesipinashi, iklabishi kanye nobeetroot ngase ngiyokudayisa emtho lampilo wendawo.

src: yonke imihla ndandibuya iphelile imifuno yam, ithengwe yo nke.
tgt: ngangi buya uphele wonke umkhi qizo wami nsuku zonke.

src: oku kwandikhuthaza kakhulu," utshilo.
tgt: lokhu kwangigqugquzela ukuthi ngitshale nakakhu lu," kusho yena.

src: ungaleka uyacacisa ukuba ukulima imifuno akulula nga.
tgt: ungaleka uchaza ukuthi ukutshala imifino kunezi nselele zako.

src: "ukulima imifuno aku thandwa kakhulu ngamafa ma amaninzi kuba imozulu kufuneka ikulungele uku tyala imifuno.
tgt: "imifino ayithandwa aba limi abaningi ngoba isimo sezulu kumele sibe sihle.

src: akufuneki kubande okanye kutshise kakhulu," utshilo.
tgt: kumele singabandi noma singashisi kakhulu," kusho yena.

src: ngemali ayenzileyo ngeli shishini lakhe ungaleka sele ethenge omnye umhlaba ozi hektare ezintathu apho aza kulima imithi yeti khona.
tgt: ngenzuzo ungaleka aye nze ebhizinisini lezolimo usethenge amanye amahe kthare amathathu omhla ba lapho ezotshala khona izihlahla zetiye.

src: "sele ndiyibonile nendawo endiza kuthengisa kuyo le mithi yeti.
tgt: "sengithole nendawo engi zoyithengisela izihlahla ze tiye.

src: imithi yeti yenza amayeza anceda ukulwa iingxaki zolusu ezifana ne rhatshalala.
tgt: izihlahla zetiye zenza owoyela abadingekayo abe lapha izinkinga zesikhumba ezifana nokuqubuka."

src: abakhenkethi bangaphandle abayivali imilomo zizibiliboco zeli dale hes abahlali beeloki shi zikamasipala wasegeorge entsho na koloni baza kuphekela abakhenkethi bangaphandle ukutya nezinye izibiliboco ezimuncis'iintupha.
tgt: abavakashi baphesheya kwezilwandle abawuvali umlomo ngezibiliboco zakuleli dale hes abantu basemaloki shini akumasipala wasegeorge entsho nalanga kapa bazozwisa aba vakashi baphesheya kwezi lwandle ubusuku abangeke baphinde babukhohlwe ngecebo ledine with locals.

src: eli phulo liyinxalenye yephulo idine with locals.
tgt: leli su liyingxenye yoku gubha inyanga yezokuvaka sha lapho umasipala eqoke amathimba ayisithupha aselokishini lasethemba lethu nasepacaltsdorp uku ba amukele abavakashi baphesheya kwezilwandle ngesidlo esihamba nazo zonke izibiliboco kanye nezikaqedisizungu.

src: eli phulo liyinxalenye yokubhiyozela inyanga ye zokhenketho apho umasipa la akhethe amaqela amatha ndathu aphuma kwilokishi yasethembalethu nasepa caltsdorp ukuba aphekele abakhenkethi bangaphandle ukutya okuhamba nazo zonke izimuncumuncu, futhi aba ntende kangangoko.
tgt: njengengxenye yokulungi selela ukubungaza lokhu, amathimba abehambele ukuqeqeshwa okuhlobene nezokuvakasha nokupheka.

src: ngethuba la maqela esenza amalungiselelo okuntenda nokuphekela ezi ndwendwe athe afumana uqeqesho olu nxulumene nezokhenketho nobuchule bokulungisa uku tya.
tgt: bafundiswa amakhono ahambisana nokuqala kanye nokuqhuba ibhizinisi, lapho injongo kungukukwazi uku gcina behlomula ngomholo embonini yezokuvakasha.

src: baye bafundiswa izakhono ezinxulumene nokuqala kunye nokuqhuba ishishini, injongo yoku ikukuba ekugqi beleni babe ngoosomashishi ni abanengeniso encumisayo kwicandelo lezokhenketho.
tgt: unomzamo entile (one minyaka yobudala enga ma31) oyingxenye yamaqe mbu ayisithupha uhola ithi mba leexplore our hood, eli qhamuka ethembalethu.

src: uno mzamo waqala iexplore our hood ngenjongo yokukhu thaza ukubambisana noku hlalisana ngoxolo egeorge.
tgt: uentile wasungula iexplore our hood ukuze akhuthaze umoya wobunye egeorge.

src: "saya saqaphela ukuba kukho ukungavani phakathi kwabantu basegeorge.
tgt: "saqaphela ukuthi kwaku negebe phakathi kwemi phakathi eminingi yasegeorge.

src: sifuna ukuba abantu beze kwiiloki shi zethu babone ukuba siphi la impilo yesixhosa endilise kileyo kwaye sifuna nabanye abantu baze kuzibonela ngo kwabo," wongeze watsho uno mzamo.
tgt: sifuna abantu beze emalokishini bazobona uku thi sinesiko lamaxhosa eliqa vile okufanele beze bazozi bonela lona," kusho uentile.

src: njengoko iyinyanga ye zokhenketho, eli qela sele libambe imisitho emibini eyinxalenye yamalungise lelo, entenda futhi ephekela amalungu ecandelo lezokhe nketho ebetyelele apha.
tgt: njengoba sekusondela inya nga yezokuvakasha, ithimba selivele liphothule ngempu melelo izivivinyo ezimbili zokulinga lolu hlelo, lemuke la amalungu abevakashile evela embonini yezokuvaka sha.

src: "siwenze onke amalungise lelo kwaye sivuya kakhulu kuba siza kutyelelwa ngaba khenkethi bangaphandle njengeendwendwe zethu.
tgt: "sizibona sesikulungele futhi sinentokozo enkulu yokwamukela abavakashi baphesheya kwezilwandle.

src: amaza asusa abantwana ezitalatweni vuyo ndlovu isurfing, okanye ukutyibiliza phezu kwamaza, ayilohlobo lomdlalo okanye into nje yokuzonwabisa yabantu abatsha abahlala embindi ni wesixeko sasedurban kwiphondo lakwazuluna tal koko ikwaluhlobo lomdla lo apho umntu angakwazi ukupholisa ingqondo.
tgt: amagagasi agcina izingane zingabi uvanzi emgaqweni vuyo ndlovu lukuhuhuluza emanzini akuwona nje umdlalo noma umkhuba woku zithokozisa kubantu abasha abahlala enkabeni yedolo bha lasedurban esifunda zweni sakwazulunatali kodwa futhi kungenye ye zindlela zokubalekela izi nkinga zomphakathi.

src: isurfers not street chi ldren ngumbutho oqeqe sha simahla abantwana basezitalatweni kunye na bantu abatsha abangathathi ntweni abahlala kumbindi wesixeko ngezakhono zo kutyibiliza phezu kwamaza.
tgt: isurfers not street chi ldren iyinhlangano ehli nzeka ngezifundo zamahha la zokuhuhuluza emaga gasini ezinganeni ezihlala emgaqweni kanye nentsha eswele ehlala khona enka beni yedolobha.

src: lo mbutho usabela kanye kwikhwelo elahlatywayo lokuliwa kwengxaki ya bantwana abangenama khaya kwaye uqinisekisa ukuba abantu abatsha be nza izinto ezakhayo ngobo mi babo.
tgt: inhlangano iwumzamo ngqo wokubhekana nokwa nda kwezingane ezingena makhaya futhi uqinisekisa ukuthi intsha yenza okuthi le okuhle ngezimpilo zayo.

src: umasipala wasethekwini uxhase lo mbutho kutsha nje ngokuwuliza ngeebhodi ezili10 zokwenza isurfing.
tgt: umasipala wetheku usa nda kweseka le nhlangano ngokunikela ngamabhodi okuhuhuluza emagagasini ayi10.

src: ezi bhodi zenzelwe uku phuhlisa kwaye zenziwe ngento engathi yirabha ence da abo basafunda ukwenza isurfing ukuba bangatshoni.
tgt: amabhodi akhelwe izi nhloso zokuthuthuka fu thi akhiwe ngegwebu futhi asiza abahuhuluzi abasa yizimfundamakhwela uku ba bakwazi ukuntanta phe zu kwamanzi.

src: umlawuli wesebe likama sipala lezemidlalo nolo nwabo uteddi adams uthi ezi bhodi ziza kunceda abo bafuna ukuba ngabantu abenza isurfing.
tgt: imenenja yomnyango we zokuthuthukiswa kweze midlalo nezokungcebeleka kumasipala uteddi adams uthe amabhodi lawa azosi za abahuhuluzi abasafu fusa.

src: "esi sipho siyinxalenye yezicwangciso zikamasi pala zokuphuhlisa ezemi dlalo nokuqinisekisa ukuba abantu abatsha, kungajo ngwanga bala labo nakufu ma kweepokotho zamakha ya abaphumo kuwo, banazo izixhobo eziza kubanceda ukuba bagqame kuhlobo lomdlalo abawukhethileyo.
tgt: "umnikelo lo uyingxenye yecebo likamasipala lo kuthuthukisa ezemidlalo kanye nokuqinisekisa uku thi yonke intsha, kunga khathalekile ubuhlanga ne zinga, iyakwazi ukufinye lela izinsiza ezizoyileke lela ibe yimiqabavu emi dlalweni eyikhethile.

src: ulangelihle nkosi (one minyaka yobudala eli16) ongomnye wabo benza isurfing ubulela umasipala ngesipho asenzileyo.
tgt: "ulangelihle nkosi (one minyaka yobudala eyi16) naye ongumhuhuluzi ubonge umasipala ngalo mnikelo.

src: "ndiyakuthanda ukuza kufunda isurfing kuba inde nza ukuba ndomelele futhi ndiyakuthanda ukutyibiliza phezu kwamaza."
tgt: "ngiyakuthokozela ka khulu ukuhambela izifu ndo zokuhuhuluza emgaga sini ngoba zingisiza ngiqine emzimbeni futhi ngiyaku thanda kakhulu ukuhuhu luza emagagasini."

src: unkosi uyabakhuthaza abo ban qwenela ukwenza isurfi ng ukuba baze kuthatha inxaxheba bafunde banzi ngayo.
tgt: unkosi ukhuthaze abanye abahu huluzi abasafufusa ukuba beze bazoba yingxenye yalo mkhankaso futhi bafunde kabanzi ngokuhuhuluza emagagasini.

src: usandile mqadi, ongumqe qeshi wesurfing esurfers not street children club, uthi iinjongo zalo mbutho kukufundisa abantwana isurfing into leyo eza kuba nceda ukuba bangahlali ezi talatweni.
tgt: usandile mqadi ongumqe qeshi wokuhuhuluza ema gagasini wesurfers not street children club, uthe inhlangano yayisophe uku fundisa izingane amakhono okuhuhuluza emagagasini njengendlela yokuzikhipha emgaqweni.

src: "sisebenza nabantwa na abahlala ezitalatweni kunye nabo baphuma ku makhaya asokolayo.
tgt: "sihlinzekela izingane ezi hlala emgaqweni kanye na labo abavela emiphakathini eyayinganakiwe ngapha mbilini.

src: unce do esilunikayo lusimahla kwaye sinceda abantu aba tsha abaneminyaka yobu dala ephakathi kwemihlanu nengama23," utsho umqa di.
tgt: izinsiza zethu zimahhala futhi yonke intsha eneminyaka esuka kwemihlanu iya kwenga ma23 yamukelekile," ku sho umqadi.

src: wongeze wathi ezi bhodi umasipala alize ngazo ziza kunceda kumalinge abo kwaye abantwana abani nzi baza kukwazi ukuthatha inxaxheba kule nkqubo.
tgt: wengeze ngokuthi ama bhodi okuhuhuluza anike lwe umasipala azolekelela imizamo yabo kanti ziningi izingane esezizokwazi uku ba yingxenye yohlelo.

src: isurfers not street chi ldren club iqhuba uqeqesho lokwenza isurfing uku suka ngomvulo ukuya ngolwesihlanu ngo08h30 nango13h30.
tgt: isurfers not street chi ldren club inikeza izifundo zokuhuhuluza emagagasini kusukela ngomsombuluko kuya kulwesihlanu ngo08h30 kanye nango13h30.

src: isebe lezempilo laselimpopo ligxi ninisa ukubaluleka kokuncancisa kanego lewele no more matshediso ukuncancisa ku luncedo kakhulu kwimpilo yomntwa na futhi kuzigcina iintsana zondlekile kodwa oomama abaninzi abaphangelayo ba banobunzima ngokuncanci sa xa bebuyela emisebenzini emva kwekhefu lasemva kokubeleka.
tgt: ezempilo elimpopo sezidlulisele ukunceli sa ibele eqophelweni eliphakeme kanego lewele no more matshediso ukuncelisa ibele yikonakona kudla okunomsoco noku thuthukisa impilo yezinsa na kodwa komama abaningi abasebenzayo kuba nzima ukuqhubeka nokuncelisa ibele lapho sebebuyela e msebenzini emva kokuphela kwekhefu langemva kokube letha.

src: oku kubangelwa kuku ba kungekho zindawo zi fanelekileyo emisebenzini zokuba abadlezana banca ncise iintsana zabo okanye bakhame ubisi, baze bangabi namdla wokuqhubeleka be ncancisa kuba bachitha ixe sha labo elininzi emisebe nzini iintsana zabo zingekho.
tgt: lokhu kungenxa yokuthi azikho izindawo ezifane lekile emsebenzini lapho omama abaseyimidlezane bengakwazi ukukhama ubi si noma bancelisele khona izingane zabo ngesikhathi somsebenzi, ngenxa yalo khoke baye badikibale uku ncelisa ngoba phela bachitha ingxenye enkulu yesikhathi besemsebenzini bengahleli nezingane zabo.

src: ngelinge lokuzama uku lungisa le ngxaki, isebe lezempilo laselimpopo livule kwiiofisi zalo iziko lokuqala ngqa lokuncancisa nokukhama ubisi.
tgt: njengomzamo wokubhe kana nale nselele, umnya ngo wezempilo elimpopo sewethule undabizekwayo wokuqala ngqa oyigumbi lokuncelisela noma lo kukhamela khona ubisi nga phakathi emahhovisi akho na.

src: eli ziko lokuncancisa livu lwe ngokusesikweni ngu mphathiswa wephondo ugq phophi ramathuba.
tgt: igumbi lokuncelisela lethulwa ngungqongqoshe wezempilo esifundazweni udkt phophi ramathuba.

src: eli ziko lithiywe ngegama likamama albertina sisulu.
tgt: liqanjwe ngomama a lbertina sisulu esigubha imi nyaka elikhulu yokuzalwa kwakhe kulo nyaka.

src: sinethemba lokuba eli ziko alizikunceda kuphela ooma ma abancancisayo abapha ngelayo koko liza kukhutha za amanye amasebe ukuba abaxhase oomama abanca ncisayo emisebenzini.
tgt: kwethenjwa ukuthi igu mbi leli ngeke nje ligcine ngo kweseka omama abancelisayo abasebenzayo kuphela, ko dwa lizophinde likhutha ze neminye iminyango ukuba yeseke abesifazane abancelisayo ezindaweni zomsebenzi.

src: abasebenzi besebe baza ku vumeleka ukuba bacele aba ntu ababonasela abantwa na ukuba bazise abantwa na emisebenzini ngesithuba sesidlo sasemini ukuze ba ncancise.
tgt: abasebenzi bomnya ngo bangakwazi nokuba abazanyana babo babale thele izingane emsebenzini ngesikhathi sesidlo sasemini ukuze bazincelise ibele.

src: eli ziko liza kuse tyenziswa nangabadlezana abafuna ukukhama ubisi besemsebenzini.
tgt: igu mbi lizophinde lisetshe nziswe nangomama abafuna ukukhama ubisi ngesikhathi somsebenzi.

src: omnye wabasebenzi bese be umpho kutumela nongu mdlezana onamawele, eli yinkwenkwe neliyintombi, aneenyanga ezili11 ubudala, uvuyiswa kakhulu kukuvu lwa kweli ziko.
tgt: omunye wabasebenzi bo mnyango umpho kutumela nongumama wamawele a nezinyanga eziyi11 ubuda la, umfana nentombazane, wesese kakhulu ngale nsiza.

src: "eli ziko lokuncancisa liza kusinceda kakhulu thina njengabadlezana kuba siza kukwazi ngoku ukukhama ubisi endaweni efaneleki leyo ngaphandle kokupha zanyiswa," utshilo.
tgt: "igumbi lokuncelisela li zoba wusizo kakhulu kithina bomama ngoba lizophinde lisinikeze ithuba lokukhama ubisi lwebele ngokukhulule ka futhi endaweni ekukhu thazayo lokhu," kusho yena.

src: oomama abandwendwela isebe bephethe iintsana zabo, nokuba balindwendwele ngantoni isebe, baza ku vunyelwa ukuba bancancise iintsana zabo.
