tgt: omama abavakashela u mnyango behamba nezi ngane zabo ngenxa yanoma yiziphi izizathu nabo ba zovunyelwa ukusebenzisa igumbi leli ukuze bancelise izingane zabo ibele.

src: umphathiswa wephondo uramathuba uthi ialbertina sisulu breastfeeding room iliziko elifana lodwa kweli phondo.
tgt: ungqongqoshe wesifunda zwe uramathuba uthe igu mbi ialbertina sisulu breastfeeding room yilo lo dwa esifundazweni.

src: umphathiswa wephondo unethemba lokuba eli ziko liza kunceda ukuba ooma ma bakwazi ukuncancisela ezindaweni ezikhuselekileyo nezilungiselelwe kanye oku ngeenjongo zokuqinisekisa ukuba baba nabantwana aba khula bondlekile futhi be sempilweni.
tgt: ungqongqoshe wesifu ndazwe uramathuba wethe mba ukuthi lo mzamo uzo ba negalelo emkhankasweni wokukhuthazwa nokuvike lwa kwezinqubo zokuncelisa ibele lingaxutshwe nalutho ngenjongo yokuba impilo yengane ithuthuke kahle.

src: "ubisi lwebele luneza khamzimba ezifunwa kanye zintsana kwaye lelendalo, soze lenziwe ngoomatshi ni," utshilo umphathiswa wephondo.
tgt: "ubisi lwebele luqukethe wonke umsoco odingwa usa na futhi ayikho enye indlela yokulukhiqiza ngaphandle kokwemvelo," kusho ungqo ngqoshe wesifundazwe.

src: umphathiswa wephondo laselimpopo ugq phophi ramathuba ephahlwe ngoomama abancancisayo abeze kuzimasa lo umsitho wokuvulwa kweziko.
tgt: ungqongqoshe wezempilo esifundazweni saselimpopo udkt phophi ramathuba ekakwe ngomama abancelisa ibele abebehambele umcimbi wokwethulwa kwegumbi lokuncelisa.

src: ukubhalisa umtshato wesintu kukhusela iintsapho dale hes emzantsi afrika, imitshato yesintu yamkelekile kwaye ithathwa njengenxalenye yamasiko nenkcubeko.
tgt: ukubhalisa umshado wesi ntu kuvikela imindeni dale hes eningizimu afrika, imishado yesintu yamukeleka nje ngenxenye yamasiko nenda buko.

src: noko kunjalo kubalulekile ukuba sikuqonde uku ba le mitshato kufuneka iqhutywe ngendlela esemthethweni nefanelekileyo, ukuze kukhuselwe amalungelo endoda na womfazi ngokunjalo.
tgt: nokho, kubaluleke kakhulu ukuthi le misha do iqhutshwe ngendlela efanele nesemthethweni, ukuze amalungelo endoda nonkosikazi avikeleke.

src: umlawuli wezomthetho wekhomishini elwelwa ulingwano ngokobuni umarissa van niekerk, ucacisa ngemitshato yesintu kunye nezinye izinto ezibalulekileyo ngawo.
tgt: umqondisi wezomthetho wekhomishana yezokuli ngana ngokobulili umari ssa van niekerk, uchaza imi shado yesintu kanye nama phuzu abalulekile okumele abantu bawakhumbule.

src: vuk: yintoni imitshato yesintu?
tgt: vuk: iyini imishado yesintu?

src: mvn: imitshato yesintu iqhutywa ngokwamasiko nezithe the zentlanga ezahlukeneyo zomzantsi afrika.
tgt: mvn: imishado yesintu iqhu tshwa ngokosiko nangoku sebenzisa izindlela zesintu ezilandelwa izakhamuzi za seningizimu afrika.

src: vuk: ingaba le mitshato ku funeka iqhutywe ngokweyiphi imithetho?
tgt: vuk: le mishado kumele ila ndele emiphi imithetho?

src: mvn: imitshato yesintu iphantsi komthetho wokuhlonitshwa kwemitshato yesintu wowe1998 (umthetho unombolo 120 wowe1998).
tgt: mvn: imishado yesintu ilawu lwa ngokomthetho wokwazi sa imishado yesintu we1998 (umthetho 120 wowe1998).

src: kufuneka iqhutywe ngokwale migaqo ilandelayo: ■ abatshati bobabini kufune ka bavumelana ukuba baza kutshatana.
tgt: kumele kwaneliseke izidingo ezilandelayo: ■ bobabili abathintekayo ku mele bavumelane ngoku shadana ■ bobabili abashadayo kumele babe neminyaka engaphezu kweyi18, ngaphandle kwalapho abazali noma abanakekeli ngokomthetho behlinzeke ngemvume lapho oyedwa noma bobabili bebancane ngokomthetho.

src: ■ abatshati bobabini kufune ka babe neminyaka yobu dala engaphezulu kweli18, ngaphandle kokuba aba zali okanye abagcini babo abasemthethweni ngabo ababakhululelayo, ukuba omnye wabatshati uselula.
tgt: ■ umshado kumele ubha liswe kumnyango wezase khaya ezinyangeni ezi ntathu kushadiwe ukuze kuvikelwe izintshisekelo zabashadikazi, izingane kanye namalungu omnde ni uma kwenzeka kuba nesahlukaniso somshado noma ukufa.

src: ■ lo mtshato kufuneka ubha liswe kwisebe lemicimbi yezekhaya zingaphelanga iinyanga ezintathu ukuze kukhuselwe abatshati, abantwana kunye namalungu osapho xa kunokwenzeka lo mtshato uqhawulwe okanye kubekho oswelekayo.
tgt: ■ lapho kubhaliswa umsha do, abashadikazi kumele baphathe amakhophi oma zisi kanye nesivumelwano selobolo (uma sikhona).

src: kufuneka kubekho ingqina nokuba linye elikhoyo eliphuma kwikhaya ngalinye.
tgt: kumele kube nofakazi oyedwa okungenani ovela emndenini ngamunye.

src: ■ indoda efuna ukutshata umfazi wesibini ngokwesi ntu kufuneka ifake isicelo enkundleni.
tgt: ■ umyeni ofuna ukushada ngokwesintu okwesibili nomunye unkosikazi kumele afake isicelo enka ntolo.

src: ■ abantu abatshate umtshato wesilungu abavumelekanga ukutshata isintu.
tgt: ■ abantu abashade umshado wesilungu abanakungena emshadweni wesintu.

src: umthetho wokuhlonitshwa kwemitshato yesintu uthi boba bini abatshati kolu hlobo lomtshato banamalungelo afa nayo njengendoda nomfazi.
tgt: umthetho wokwaziswa kwemishado yesintu uthi bobabili abathintekayo e mshadweni banamalungelo alinganayo njengendoda ne nkosikazi.

src: vuk: ingaba zeziphi iingxaki ezinokulindeleka emtshatweni wesintu?
tgt: vuk: ngeziphi izinkinga ezi ngase zivele emshadweni wesintu?

src: mvn: ukungawubhalisi umtshato kungenza iingxa ki ezinkulu.
tgt: mvn: ukungabhaliswa ko mshado kudala izinkinga ezi nkulu.

src: ukuwubhalisa kwenza ukuba abatshati babe nobungqina bokuba umtshato ukhona ngenene, kuba kunzima kakhulu ukuqinisekisa ukuba umtshato ongabhaliswanga ukhona ngenene.
tgt: ukubhalisa kuhli nzeka ngobufakazi bokuthi impela umshado ukhona, ngakho kuba nzima ukufa kazela ubukhona bomshado ongabhalisiwe.

src: oku kwenza kube nzima nakwiinkundla zomthetho ukuba zikhusele amalungulo abatshati xa kuthe kwakho uqhawulomtshato, xa kuchotshelwe imiba yelifa lomntu oswelekileyo kunye namalungelo abantwana kunye namalungu osapho.
tgt: lokhu ku zoba nomthelela emandleni enkantolo okuvikela amalu ngelo abashadikazi lapho behlukanisa umshado, ukwa biwa kwamafa lapho ku nomshadikazi oshonile kanye namalungelo ezingane kanye namalungu omndeni.

src: enye into edla ngokubange la ingxaki phakathi kwabatshati kukungahluli phakathi koqhawulomtshato nokwa hlukana.
tgt: enye inkinga engase ibe khona wukuthi abashada umshado wesintu bavame ukupha mbanisa ukwahlukanisa u mshado nokwahlukana ngale komthetho.

src: kufuneka kube thelelwe ebantwini ukuba yinkundla kuphela enelungelo lokuqhawula umtshato.
tgt: kubalulekile uku gqamisa ukuthi yinkantolo kuphela enamandla okwa hlukanisa umshado.

src: urhulumente unceda amakhaya dale hes njengoko amaxabi so ezinto enyuka urhulumente wenza konke anakho ukuphungula umthwalo ohleli emagxeni abantu abaninzi bomzantsi afrika ngokuthi ezinye izinto ezithe ngwayo zingafakwa irhafuntengo (ivat).
tgt: uhulumeni usiza imindeni dale hes njengoba izindleko zokuphila zikhu phuka uhulume ni usebenza ngokuzikha ndla ukunciphisa umthwa lo wezezimali othwelwe izakhamuzi zaseningizimu afrika ngokuthi kube ne mpahla ethile ezoba sesiga beni sokungakhokhelwa i ntela yokuthenga.

src: iinjongo zokungafaki ivat kukuphungulela umthwalo amakhaya amkela imivuzo ephantsi, wona achitha isixa esikhulu semivuzo yawo kwizinto zasekhaya.
tgt: inhloso yokuthi kube nesi gaba sempahla engakhokhe lwa intela yokuthenga wu kusiza imindeni ehola imali encane, esebenzisa ingxenye enkulu yomholo ukuthenga impahla yasendlini.

src: izinto ezingafakwa irha fu azibhataliswa irhafuntengo eyi15%.
tgt: impahla efakwe esiga beni sokunga yikhokhi inte la yokuthenga ayikhokhelwa i15% yente la yentengo (ivat).

src: injongo yoku kukunceda abemi bomzantsi afrika ukuba bonge imali.
tgt: ku hloswe ukuthi ilekelele izakha muzi zase ningizimu afrika ukulo ndoloza imali.

src: ezi ntlobo zokutya zinge navat zili19 ziquka: umbo na, umngqusho, irayi si, isonka esimdaka, iziqhamo, imifuno, intlanzi esetotini, amaqanda.
tgt: kunezinhlo bo zokudla eziyi19 ezi ngakhokhelwa ivat ezibanda kanya: impu phu, isitam bu, irayisi, isi nkwa esinsu ndu, izithelo, imifino, i nhlanzi esekanini namaqa nda.

src: ezinye izinto ezingabhataliswa ivat ziquka idzi li, ipetro li kunye neparaf ini kwakunye neenkonzo ezithile ezifana nemali yerenti, imali yokukh wela uloliwe nezinye izithuthi kunye nemali yokufunda.
tgt: phezu kwalokho, impahla enjengodizili, uphethilomu nopharafini, kanye nezihli nzekelo ezithile okubanda kanya imiqasho, ezoku thutha ngojantshi nango mgwaqo kanye nezemfu ndo, azikhokhelwa ivat.

src: ngenyanga yomdumba urhu lumente wabhengeza ukuba uza kuyinyusa ivat isuke kwi14% iye kwi15%.
tgt: kunhlolanja uhulumeni wamemezela ukuthi uzo nyusa ivat isuke ku14% iye ku15%.

src: urhulumente waqonda ukuba oku kuza ku wafaka ezingxakini zezimali amakhaya asokolayo.
tgt: uhulumeni uya zi ukuthi imindeni eswe le izosindwa kakhulu kwezezimali.

src: ukuphungula umthwalo weengxaki obangwa ngamaxabiso ezinto aphezulu umphathiswa wezemali unhlanhla nene watyumba iqela eliza kucebisa ngezinye izinto zase khaya ezinokongezwa kuluhlu lwezo zingabhataliswa ivat.
tgt: ukuze kuthulwe umthwa lo wokunyuka kwezindleko zokuphila, ungqongqoshe wezezimali unhlanhla nene waqoka ithimba elalizoqha muka nezincomo zokuthi ngeziphi ezinye izimpahla ezidingeka emakhaya okwa kumele zifakwe esigabeni sokungakhokhelwa ivat.

src: emva kokuba eli qela liqhu be uphando olunzulu labamba neendibano zokubonisana noluntu, liye lacebisa ukuba kongezwe ezinye izinto ezise tyenziswa emakhaya kuluhlu lwezo zingafakwa vat.
tgt: emuva kocwaningo olu nzulu nokubonisana no mphakathi, leli thimba lancoma ukuthi kunenye impahla okumele ifakwe ohlwini.

src: usithibe uphila kamnandi ngoku anealbinism galoome shopane ulerato uligqiyazana elinealbinism .
tgt: usithibe uphila impilo emnandi kakhulu enebala elimhlophe galoome shopane ulerato sithibe ungu muntu wesifazane ophila nebala eli mhlophe, ialbinism.

src: uyazidla ngeli bala lim hlophe kuye futhi akazihluphi ngabo bathetha izinto ezimbi phofu ezingeyonyani ngalo.
tgt: uyazigqaja ngebala lakhe ngokungavumeli ezinkoleloze zilawule impilo yakhe.

src: "kubalulekile ebantwini abafa na nam ukuba singabamameli abanye abantu abacinga ukuba bayasazi kodwa bengasazi.
tgt: uthe, "kubalulekile ukuthi abantu abanjengami banga bavumeli abanye abantu ukuthi balawule ububona.

src: "mu sa ukumamela abanye abantu ukuba bathini ngawe, udalwe wafana wedwa," utshilo.
tgt: zigqaje ngebala lesikhumba sakho ngoba wakhiwe ngobuhle obumangalisayo."

src: usithibe (oneminyaka yobu dala engama28) wasekroon stad efreyistata ucacisa athi eli bala limhlophe kuye liyimfuza.
tgt: usithibe (oneminyaka yobudala engama28) wasekroo nstad efreyistata, uchaze ukuthi isimo sakhe siwufuzo lokuthi umuntu usuka engenazo izakhi ezanele zokukhiqiza umbala wesikhumba, izinwele noma namehlo.

src: "asizozilwanyana zokwenza amayeza amaxhwele angcolileyo okanye izinto ezenziwe ngemilingo njengoko abantu besitsho.
tgt: "asiwona umuthi noma izilwane njengokokucabanga kwabantu.

src: singabantu njengaye wonke umntu.
tgt: singabantu njengabo bonke ababantu.

src: "usithibe wenza imisebenzi emininzi.
tgt: "usithibe utholakala emikhakheni eminingi.

src: ungunobuhle ose benzisa iimpahla ukufundisa ngealbinism kwaye uphambili kumaphulo okulwela abantu abakhubazekileyo efreyistatha.
tgt: uwunobuhle omodelayo, osebenzisa imfashi ni ukuqwashisa abantu ngokuba nebala elimhlophe futhi uyi sishoshovu sabantu abaphila nokukhubazeka efreyistata.

src: uthi wakhula kwikhaya elishushu nelinothando apho enga zange azive ukuba ungumntwa na owahlukileyo kwabanye ngenxa yokuba enealbinism .
tgt: uthe wakhula emndenini ongazange umenze azizwele ehlukile noma engathandwa ngokwanele ngenxa yokuba nebala elimhlophe.

src: "ndandingazi ukuba kutheni ibala lesikhumba sam lahlukile kwelabanye abantu, ndingasazi nesizathu sokuba xa ndihamba ngaphandle abantu bendibiza ngamagama amabi futhi ufike abanye bendithe ntsho ngokungathi ndingumntu olahlekileyo.
tgt: "ngangingaqondi ukuthi kungani ibala lesikhumba sami lehlukile kunelabanye abantu, ukuthi kungani ngaso sonke isikhathi uma ngiphumela phandle abantu bangibize ngamagama angalungile futhi bangibuke njengomuntu ongafanelwe ukuba kuleyo ndawo.

src: "indlela ebonwa ngayo ngabantu ialbinism yamenza usithibe wayibona indlela abantu bakowabo ababaluleke ngayo kuye, futhi elibulela negalelo labo ekumenzeni eli nenekazi lingenaxhala futhi lingoyiki bani alilo namhlanje.
tgt: "isihlamba esihambisana nokuba nebala elimhlophe senza usithibe awubonge kakhulu umndeni wakhe, ubonga bona ngokuba ngumuntu wesifazane onamandla nozethembayo.

src: ezinye zezinto angasoze azili bale ebomini bakhe usithibe ziquka ukuwongwa ngokuba ngumiss free state albinism ngowama2018 kunye nokukhethwa njengomnye unobuhle ufikelele kumjikelo wokugqibe la wokuba ngunobuhle onguno zakuzaku wombonisozimpahla, iface of free state fashion week yowama2018.
tgt: ezinye izinkathi usithibe aziqhenya ngazo kakhulu zi bandakanya ukuthola isicoco emncintiswaneni wonobuhle abanebala elimhlophe imiss free state albinism 2018 noku khethwa njengomunye wabadle umhlanganiso embuki sweni wemfashini iface of free state fashion week 2018. njengoba umandulo kuyi nyanga yokuqwashisa ngo kuba nebala elimhlophe usi thibe uthe kuzomjabulisa ka khulu ukubona nabanye aba ntu abanebala elimhlophe bephumela obala benza izinto ezimangalisayo emkhakheni wonobuhle kanye nakweminye imikhakha.

src: njengokuba eyomsintsi iyinyanga yokufundisa ngealbinism usithibe uthi angavuya kakhulu ukuba angabona abanye abantu abanealbinism bethatha inxa xheba kwicandelo loonobuhle nakumanye amacandelo.
tgt: usithibe uphila impilo emnandi kakhulu enebala elimhlophe abantu abanebala elimhlophe bangazinakekela kanjani?

src: usithibe uphila kamnandi ngoku anealbinism ingaba abantu abanealbinism bazikhathalela njani?
tgt: gwema ukushiswa ilanga lapho ilanga lishisa kakhulu (ngehora lesi9 ekuseni kuya kwelesi3 ntambama).

src: iinkcukacha ezibalulekileyo ngokuqala ib&b dale hes ingaba ufuna ukuzenze la imali ngokunika abakhenkethi iindawo zokulala, ubenze bangabulibali ubububele kunye nendlela abe behleli ngayo kamnandi ngethuba betyelele kwingingqi yenu?
tgt: konke okumele ukwazi ngokuqala ib&b dale hes ufuna ukwenza ima li ngokuhlinzeke la izihambeli nge ndawo yokuhlala, ubana kekele ngendlela eseqophe lweni eliphezulu ngenkathi zivakashele indawo yanga kini?

src: ukuqalisa ishishini lebed and breakfast (ib&b) yenye yendlela ezingcono kakhulu yokuziqalela ishishini kwicandelo lezokhenketho.
tgt: amabed and breakfast (amab&b) angenye yezindle la ezinenzuzo enkulu yokuba ngumnikazi webhizinisi e mkhakheni wezokuvakasha.

src: nazi iinkcukacha ekufuneka uzazi malunga nokuziqalela ib&b.
tgt: nakhu konke okumele ukwa zi ngokuziqalela eyakho ib&b.

src: yintoni ib&b?
tgt: yini ib&b?

src: ngokwebhunga lokuhlela lezokhenketho lomzantsi afrika, ib&b yindawo yoku lala engenabucukubhede buninzi efanayo nje nalo naliphi na ikhaya.
tgt: ngokomkhandlu oklama amazinga ezokuvakasha eningizimu afrika, itourism grading council of south africa, amab&b ahlinzeka ngendawo yokuhlala ehlinze ka ngemisebenzi ekhethekile kuphela engatholakala ekhaya.

src: igumbi ngalinye kufuneka libe nendlu yalo yangasese, kwaye imali yesidlo sakusasa kufuneka iqukwe kule yokula la.
tgt: igumbi ngalinye kumele libe nendawo yokugezela yalo, futhi isidlo sasekuseni kumele sibalwe emananini okuhlala.

src: ukongeza, igumbi kufuneka licocwe yonke imihla xa kukho indwendwe elihlala kulo.
tgt: phezu kwalokho, igumbi kumele lilungiswe nsukuzonke ngenkathi isihambeli sakho sisahlala khona.

src: iindlu eyenziwe ib&b inganamagumbi amathathu kuphela ubukhulu.
tgt: amab&b akanakuba namagumbi ezihambeli anga phezu kwamathathu.

src: ukuba le ndlu inamagumbi angaphezu lu kwamathathu, ayiseyob&b kufuneka ibizwe ngokuba iyiguest house .
tgt: uma amagumbi ezihambeli engaphezu kwalokhu, ibhinizisi lakho kumele lichazwe ngokuthi iguest house .

src: ngawaphi amanqanaba alandelwayo xa kuvulwa ib&b?
tgt: ngeziphi izinqubo oku mele uzilandele ukuze uqale ib&b yakho?

src: inqanaba lokuqala kukuya kumasipala wakho uye kufaka isicelo sokunikwa ilungelo lokuguqula indlu yakho ibe lishishini lokulalisa nokuntenda iindwendwe.
tgt: isinyathelo sokuqala okumele usithathe ukuqonda kumasi pala wakho wasendaweni uye kofaka isicelo sokuthi umuzi wakho uklamwe njengesa khiwo sokuhlinzeka ngendawo yokuhlala izihambeli.

src: kungafune ka ukuba ufumane nemvume kubamelwane bakho, uze uxhome nezaziso zokwazisa abantu ngokubanzi, ukwenzela abo banokuwukhaba lo mbono wakho.
tgt: ungase udinge ukuthola imvume kubanikazi bemizi owakhe lene nayo, nokufaka izaziso zokwazisa umphakathi, uma kwenzeka ufuna ukufaka iziphikiso.

src: xa sele uyifumene imvume kumasipala, kuza kufuneka ukuba wanezise nezinye izinto ezifunekayo ngokomthetho.
tgt: uma sewuthola isigunyazo e sivela kumasipala, kuzodinge ka ukuthi ulandele imithetho ethile emisiwe.

src: izinto ezibalulekileyo ekufuneka uziqwalaseleindawo – indawo ekuyo ib&b yakho ibaluleke kakhulu.
tgt: izinto ezibalulekile oku mele uzibhekeindawo – indawo ib&b yakho ekuyo ibaluleke kakhulu.

src: ukuba uhlala kwindawo engathandwa kakhulu ngabakhenkethi kuza kubanzima kakhulu ukuba ishishini lakho liqhube kakuhle.
tgt: uma uhlala endaweni engazihehi izihambeli, akuzukuba lula ukuthi ibhizinisi lakho liphu melele.

src: izimali – ishishini lezokhenketho lihamba ngokwamaxe sha onyaka, ke ngoko kufu neka ube nemali oyibekileyo eza kuqhuba ngala maxesha onyaka anqatyelwe ngabakhenkethi.
tgt: ezezimali – ukuvakasha ku ngavama kakhulu ngezikhathi ezithile zonyaka, ngakho kudingeka ube nemali oyi bekile eyanele ukuthi ukwazi ukuphila ngezikhathi zonyaka ezingekho matasa.

src: ubomi obutsha – ubomi bakho buza kutshintsha kakhulu xa ungumntu oneb&b.
tgt: indlela yokuphila entsha – indle la ophila ngayo izoshintsha kakhulu uma sewungumni kazi web&b.

src: amaxesha amaninzi kuza kufuneka uvuke ngonyezi futhi ngamanye ulale ebusuku, kwaye kufuneka uyiqhele into yokuba uza kuba nabanye abantu aba zindwendwe abaza kusebenzisa eli khaya lakho.
tgt: kuzodingeka ukuthi uvuke ekuseni kakhu lu uphinde ulale ebusuku kakhulu, futhi kuzodingeka ujwayele ukuhlalisana kahle nezihambeli emzini wakho.

src: kwaye kufu neka uqinisekise ukuba indlu yakho ihlala isemgangathweni futhi icocekile ukwenzela ukuba iindwendwe zakho zaneliseke ngalo lonke ixesha.
tgt: okunye okuzodingeka uku thi ukunake ukunakekela nokugcina izihambeli zakho zanelisekile ngaso sonke isikhathi.

src: ukwazisa ngeb&b yakho – icandelo lokulalisa nokuntenda iindwendwe linamashishini amaninzi kakhulu, ke ngoko kufuneka uzinike ixesha futhi ube nayo nemali yokwazisa nokuthengisa ib&b yakho.
tgt: ukukhangisa ngeb&b yakho – umkhakha wezokuhlalisa izihambeli ugcwele ukunci ntisana, ngakhoke kuzodinge ka unikele ngesikhathi sakho nemali ngokuthi ukhangise ngeb&b yakho.

src: njengendoda yoqobo, ndithi nawe ube yindoda emadodeni, nyana vukuzenzele unnamed ngela xesha *utshepo mofokeng waye neminyaka eli10, wahlala engcungcuthekiswa ngaphakathi yintlungu yoku dlwengulwa kukadade wabo ominyaka ili17 ubudala.
tgt: ingxoxo ephakathi kwamadoda: yiba yindo da, mfana wami vukuzenzele unnamed ngesikhathi *utshepo mofokeng eneminya ka yobudala eyi10, wayekhona kudlwengulwa udadewabo oneminyaka eyi17.

src: ngethuba umhlaseli oxhobileyo eyalela le nkwenkwana ukuba mayilale phantsi ingajongi, usa liva nanamhlanje ilizwi lesikhalo sikadade wabo ezindlebeni zakhe.
tgt: ngesikhathi umdlwenguli owayehlome ngesikhali etshela lo mfanyana ukuthi akalale phansi futhi angabuki, usakuzwa na manje ukukhala kukadadewabo.

src: emva kolu hlaselo, le ndoda yamyalela yena nodade wabo ukuba babaleke bangabheki ngasemva.
tgt: ngemva kokudlwengula, le ndoda yatshela utshepo noda dewabo ukuthi bagijime futhi bangabheki emuva.

src: ngeli xesha begoduka kubuhlungu kunjalo, udade wabo wamcela ukuba athembise ukuba akasokuze axelele namnye umntu ngolu dlwengulo.
tgt: ngesikhathi bethatha uhambo olubuhlungu lokulibangisa ekhaya, udadewa bo wamenza wathembisa ukuthi ngeke atshele muntu mayelana nokudlwengulwa.

src: utshepo wasigcina isithembiso sakhe kodwa eli hlebo lamenza waba krakra kakhulu umphefu mlo wakhe.
tgt: utshepo wenza njengalokho ethembisile kodwa le mfihlo yamenza waba muncu.

src: "ngeli xesha ndikhula, ndandi mana ndimbona lo mdlwenguli apha ekatlehong lo nto yandenza ndakhulelwa ngumsindo ngakumbi nangakumbi.
tgt: "ngesikhathi ngikhula, ngangimbona umdlwenguli ekatlehong futhi ngaya ngokuba nolaka.

src: azange ndikwazi ukuyamkela into yoku ba angafumani sohlwayo ngoko wakwenzayo.
tgt: ngangingakwazi ukwe mukela ukuthi wayengazange ajeziselwe into ayenzile.

src: "utshepo uthe xa eyinkwe nkwana efikisayo nekhula amandla akakwazi ukuyilawula ingqumbo yakhe, waza wamana ukumhlasela umdlwenguli ka dade wabo nanini na xa embona.
tgt: "ngesikhathi esekhulakhulile, futhi eyibhungu elinamandla, utshepo wayengasakwazi uku gcina ngaphakathi ulaka lwakhe, futhi wayeshaya owahla sela udadewabo la embona khona.

src: wasuka ekubeni yinkwenkwana engenankathazo wayidyongwana esoloko ilugcwabevu ngumsindo.
tgt: wayeka ukuba yingane enokuthula waphenduka umuntu omusha onolaka.

src: zaba mbini izinto ezasindisa utshepo kobu bundlongondlo ngo.
tgt: zimbili izinto ezasindisa utshepo kule ndlela yobudlova.

src: okokuqala, wayenethamsa nqa lokuba notata nomkhuluwa ababesazi ukuba ubundlongo ndlongo abusiso isisombululo nangona babengayazi intsusa yabo apha kutshepo, kodwa ba kwazi ukumkhokelela kwindlela ethe tse neyakhayo.
tgt: okokuqala nje, wayebusiswe ngobaba kanye nomfowabo omdala ababazi ukuthi udlame lwalungeyona impendulo nomake babengazi ukuthi kungani utshepo eziphatha ngale ndlela, bakwazi ukumholela endleleni yokuziphatha efanele.

src: okwesibini okumsindisileyo kukungene lela kwamapolisa akwaloliwe ambonayo utshepo ehlasela umdlwenguli kadade wabo.
tgt: okwesibili kwaba ukungenelela kwamaphoyisa aqapha kuja ntshi wesitimela abona ngesikhathi utshepo ehlasela owadlwengula udadewabo.

src: lo mdlwenguli washiyeka ophuke umlenze kodwa emva kokuba utshepo ewacacisele yonke into eyayenzwe yile ndoda kwiminya ka eyadlulayo, amapolisa akwa loliwe alikhulula eli tyendyana ngokulityityimbisela nje umnwe.
tgt: umdlwenguli wasala ephuke umlenze kodwa ngesikhathi utshepo echazela ama phoyisa aqapha kujantshi wesitimela ukuthi le ndoda yayenzeni eminyakeni emini ngi edlule, akhetha ukumdedela kodwa amyala.

src: umdlwenguli wasiwa esibhedlele kwaye akazange afake simangalo.
tgt: umdlwenguli wayiswa esibhedlela futhi aka zange alivule icala.

src: noko kunjalo, ukuhlaselwa kwabasetyhini kusahleli kuqhu beka, kwaye utshepo uya exha laba nangakumbi.
tgt: ukuhlaselwa kwabantu be sifazane kuyaqhubeka nokuba yinto ejwayelekile, noma ku njalo, futhike utshepo wayeya ngokukhathazeka ngalokhu.

src: ngethuba engu mfundi epretoria technikon, wancedisa ekusekweni kombu tho wokuvula amadoda amehlo ukuba ayiqonde indima yawo ekuhlaleni waza ngowama2004, wabhalisa umbutho wamadoda obizwa isouth african men's action group (isamag) njengo mbutho ongekho phantsi kuka rhulumente.
tgt: ngesikhathi eyisitshudeni sasepretoria technikon, wasiza ukusungula ithimba eliqwashi sa amadoda mayelana nendi ma yawo emphakathini fu thi ngowezi2004, wabhalisa isouth african men's action group (samag) njengenhla ngano engekho ngaphansi kuka hulumeni.

src: namhlanje, isamag inabase benzi abali10 abasebenza isigxi na kwaye ineeofisi egauteng, efreyistata, emntla ntshona, elimpopo nasempumalanga.
tgt: namhlanje, isamag isina basebenzi abasebenza ngoku gcwele abayi10 futhi inamhho visi egauteng, efreyistata, enyakatho ntshonalanga, elimpopo kanye nasempumala nga.

src: izinikele ekukhuthazeni inguqu kwezentlalo.
tgt: izinikele ekugqugquzeleni izinguquko.

src: umyalezo wayo ongundoqo uthi ‘amadoda okwenene awaba phathi kakubi abantu basetyhini’ (real men don’t abuse women) .
tgt: umyalezo wabo oyinhloko uthi ‘real men don’t abuse women’ (amadoda angempela awabahlu kumezi abantu besifazane)’.

src: igama elithi ‘real’ sisishunquleli sala magama esingesi: responsi ble (thembekileyo), enlightened (khanyiselwe), archetypal (yiba ngumzekelo) kunye noloving (nokuthanda)," utshilo umo fokeng.
tgt: "ureal umele la magama esi ngisi: uresponsible, enlightened , archetypal (ukuba yisibone lo) kanye noloving ," kusho utshepo.

src: "uninzi lwamadoda lufunde iindlela zokuziphatha ezisekelwe kugonyamelo lwamadoda.
tgt: "iningi lamadoda lifunzelelwe ukuba yizinhloko kwabesilisa.

src: kuba ayebethwa ebuntwaneni ngoku awaboni sizathu sokuba kutheni engenako ukukhulisa kwa ngalo ndlela abantwana bawo.
tgt: babeshaywa besebancane futhi ababoni ukuthi kungani kunga mele bakhulise izingane zabo ngendlela efanayo.

src: kwizizwe ezininzi, amadoda aphethe baze bona abantu base tyhini babonwe bekwinqanaba elinye nelo labantwana ke ngoko kuthathwa njengento eyamkele kileyo into yokubaphatha njenga bantwana.
tgt: emasikweni amaningi, kuphethe amadodafuthi abantu besifazane babo nwa njengabasezingeni elifa nayo nezingane futhi kuyinto ethathwa njengeyemukelekile ukubajezisa ngendlela efanayo," kusho utshepo.

src: umntu ngamnye unendima ekufanele eyidlalile ukuguqula indlela abacinga ngazo abanye," utshilo umofokeng.
tgt: wonke umuntu unendima okumele ayidlale ngokupha thelene nokuguqula indlela abantu abacabanga ngayo, kusho utshepo.

src: ukholelwa ekubeni abantwana bakhuliswe ngendlela engazi kugxininisa umahluka ngokwe sini.
tgt: ukholelwa ekutheni abantwana kumele bakhuliswe ngapha ndle kokubunjwa ngokobulili.

src: ityotyombe elidelelekileyo liphu culwe laba yibeauty spa nonkululeko mathebula thaini masakane uzenzele igama ngokujika ityotyo mbe libe yindawo yoku qhunkqa nokuzihombi sa, ibeauty spa .
tgt: umjondolo ongatheni uguqulwe waba yispa esisezingeni eliphe zulu nonkululeko mathebula uthaini masakane usezenzele iga ma ngokuguqula umjondolo wawenza ibeauty spa .

src: uzinze ebotshabelo efrey stata, ishishini lakhe, ivictor body and nail studio, likhu la ngokukhawuleza kwaye linomtsalane kumntu wonke ofika eze kufuna ukufekethi swa ngandlela ithile.
tgt: ibhizinisi lakhe, elisebo tshabelo efreyistata, ivictory body and nail studio , likhula ngamandla futhi liheha abantu abaqhamuka ezindaweni ezahlukene abazela ukuzo mfanyazwa umzimba kanye nokucwalwa.

src: sele evela kuthengisa izitya zakwatupperware ngexesha eneminyaka eli19, uneminya ka engama28 ngoku uthi wayesoloko ekulangazelela ukuba angaziqhubela elakhe ishishini kwaye unovuyo lokuba wayiqala le ndlela.
tgt: waqala ukudayisa utupperware eneminyaka eyi19, lona oneminyaka engama28 njengamanje uthe wayelokhu enothando lokuba nebhizini si lakhe futhi kuyamjabulisa ukuthi waziqalela ibhizinisi lakhe.

src: "ndaqala ngokuse benzela omnye umntu oneshishini elifana neli kwaye kulapho ndathi ndafumana khona amava," utshilo, wongeza athi wafu ndela izifundo zobugci sa bokutsheyisa noku hombisa umzimba, icosme tologist kwikholeji imotheo tvet, ebloemfontein.
tgt: "ngaqala ngisebenzela othile kule mboni futhi yilapho engathola khona isipiliyoni," kusho yena, wengeza na ngokuthi wafundela ukuba yicosmetologist emotheo tvet college yasebloem fontein.

src: ekugqibeleni uye wakulungela ukuzi phumela ecaleni ngo kwakhe kwaye akakhange aphinde eme.
tgt: ekugcineni wayeseku lungele ukuphuma azimele futhi akazange esabheka emuva kusukela ngaleso sikhathi.

src: ishishini lakhe linabantu abe bekade befuna uncedo olufana neli ebotshabelo kwaye unabantu bakhe abeza rhoqo kuye.
tgt: ibhizinisi lakhe li namakhasimende amaningi ebotshabelo futhi liyakhula futhi unamakhasimende ahla le eza kuye.

src: kweli shishini lakhe kwenziwa iinzipho zezandla nezenyawo, uku susa uboya, ukuthambisa nokuhonjiswa kobuso.
tgt: kuhlinzekwa ukwenziwa kwezinzipho zeminwe, ezezinzwane, ukumfanyazwa umzimba, ukususwa kweziboya (wax ing) kanye nokubhucungwa kobuso.

src: iifoto zendawo yakhe yokuvocavocwa ongenaku tsho ukuba isetyotyombeni ngenxa yobuhle bayo azifake kumajelo oluntu onxibele lwano zithandwe ngabantu abaninzi bencoma ubuchule bukathaini besithi ungumze kelo omhle wokuvuselela amantombazana asezilo kishini.
tgt: izithombe zakhe azifaka ezinkundleni zokuxhuma na zomjondolo oguqulwe wenziwe ispa sikanokusho esihle zidle ubhedu kamuva nje, abantu bencoma uku qhamuka namasu amasha kukamasakane futhi bethi unika ugqozi amantomba zane asemalokishini.

src: le ndawo yokuvocavocwa yakhelwe kwityotyombe lamazinki amatsha, kwaye xa uyijongile ungapha ndle awunakuyicingela ukuba ngaphakathi lino bunewunewu nobu qheleqhele obufanele kanye ukuntenda nokufekethisa.
tgt: sisemjondolo kathayela obukeka ungojwayelekile ngaphandle, ispa sisezi ngeni eliphezulu ngaphakathi elikufanele ukumfanyazwa umzimba kanye nokucwa lwa.

src: "yandothusa indlela abantu abalixhasa ngayo ishishini lam.
tgt: "lokhu okwashiwo abantu kwangimangaza.

src: iinjineli ezisakhulayo zifumana uqeqesho zisebenza ekwakhiweni kweendlela vukuzenzele unnamed alikho igumbi loku fundela elibhetele lenjineli esaqeqe shwayo kunasembenzini apho abasebenzi bebila be soma futhi kuqhuma nothu li kuphithizela oomatshini abangxolayo.
tgt: onjiniyela abancane bathole ukuqeqeshwa bezibambele ngezabo ekwakhiweni komgwaqo vukuzenzele unnamed alikho ikilasi eli ngcono konjiniyela abasaqeqeshwa u kwedlula izizinda zokwakha ezimahhadlahhadla, ezi gcwele izintuli nokuduma kwemishini nemijuluko ya madoda nabesifazane be matasa besebenza kanzima.

src: uthabiso dladla nosumay maharaj ziinjineli ezince disayo [iiare] ezisafunda ukwenza umsebenzi kwii njineli ezinamava kun2 olungiswayo phakathi kwemthunzini kunye neempangeni kummandla ongakwinxweme lomntla wakwazulunatal.
tgt: uthabiso dladla nosumay maharaj bangabasizi bonjini yela [amaare] esizindeni abacobelela ulwazi koza kwabo abasemnkantshubo mvu esizindeni sokukhuli swa nokuthuthukiswa ko mgwaqo onguthelawayeka un2 phakathi kwendawo yasemthunzini nasempange ni ogwini olusenyakatho ne sifundazwe sakwazuluna tali.

src: "senza imisebenzi efanayo neyeeare.
tgt: "senza umsebenzi othi awu fane ncamashi nowamaare.

src: senza uhlolo, sibale nezixhobo zokuse benza, senze oko kuthiwa masikwenzwe njengeenjine li ezincedisayo, senze oko kufanele ukwenziwa kule ndawo yokusebenza kwaye siphendula nayiphi na imi buzo yezobunjineli ebuzwa yile nkampani yenza indle la," utshilo udladla.
tgt: siyahlola, sibale isitokwe, senze lokho esiyalelwa uku thi sikwenze njengabasizi, senze imiyalelo yesizinda, siphinde siphendule noma yimiphi imibuzo emayelana nobunjiniyela evela enka mpanini eyakhayo," kusho udladla.

src: umaharaj owaqala kule projekthi kweyethupha ngowama2016, kwaye nga phambili ebesenza iindle dlana ezisecaleni kwendle la kunye noyilo lwejometri ebhayi kwiziko loqeqesho lakwasanral, uthe sele efunde izinto ezininzi ezi balulekileyo oko wathi weza kweli phondo lakwazu lunatal.
tgt: umaharaj oqale kulo mse benzi ngoncwaba 2016, futhi phambilini obenza amadizayini ezindlela zoku hamba ngezinyawo onqenqe meni lomgwaqo kanye nawe jiyomethri ebhayi esanral centre of excellence, uthi usefunde lukhulu njengoba esefudukele esifundazweni sakwazulu natali.

src: "ndiye ndafunda ukuba icandelo lecivil enginee ring linzima kangakanani na kwanangendlela yonke into ehlangana ngayo ukwenza izinto zisebenze."
tgt: "sengi funde ngobunkimbinkimbi becivil engineering kanye nendlela konke okuhlangana ngayo ukwenza izinto zise benze.

src: ayikuko kodwa nje ukuyila iindle dlana ezisecaleni kwendle la.
tgt: akukhona nje kuphela ukudizayina izindlela zoku hamba ngezinyawo onqenqe meni lomgwaqo.

src: kukusebenza ngeza khiwo, imibhobho yokuha mbisa amanzi kunye ne mizobo emile oku kwe jometri.
tgt: sisebenza ngezakhiwo, amapayipi oku chitha amanzi kanye nama dizayini ejiyomethri.

src: okubalulekileyo kukufunda indlela yokubeka yonke into kunye nokuyenza ukuba isebenze, "utshilo.
tgt: empe leni lokhu kuphathelene nokufunda ukuhlangani sa zonke izinto ndawonye ukuze zisebenze," kulandisa umaharaj.

src: udladla wathatha inxa xheba kule projekthi malu nga neenyanga ezili10 emva kokuba eyinxalenye ye nkqubo yoqeqesho lwa sesanral.
tgt: udladla wazibandaka nya kulo msebenzi cishe ezi nyangeni eziyi10 ngemuva kokuba yingxenye yohlelo lakwasanral lokuqeqe sha.

src: uyavuya kukusebenza kwiprojekti enomcelimnge ni ayichaza njengento eyahlu kileyo nequka ukwakhiwa kweebrorho ezinkulu ezini nzi kunye nezinye ezinci nci ezinqumla phantsi kwe ndlela.
tgt: kuyamthokozisa ukuba yingxenye yalo msebenzi oyi nselelo awuchaza ngokuthi uhlukile futhi ubanzi impela futhi ubandakanya amabhu loho nemihubhe yamapayipi evulekile.

src: "ndiye ndabandakanye ka ekuhloleni nasekunce diseni inkampani eyenza indlela apho ifuna ukuca ciselwa khona ngemizobo.
tgt: "bengilokhu ngenza umse benzi wokuhlola kanye nokulekelela inkampani eyakhayo uma idinga uku caciselwa ngemidwebo.

src: xa kufikelelwa kumsebenzi wokulungiswa kusembiwa umhlaba ekuza kwakhiwa kuwo, siyahlola kananjalo uhlobo lomhlaba ogalelwa ukudiba imingxunya egru njiweyo kunye nohlobo lo mhlaba ongaphantsi eku galelwa phezu kwawo lo mhlaba mtsha.
tgt: mayelana nomsebenzi opha thelene nokumba nokulungi sa isizinda okuzokwakhiwa kusona, siphinde sihlole ama tshe nomhlabathi wokuvala imigodi kanye nomhlabathi ongaphansi kwendawo okwa khiwa kuyona.

src: kutshanje siye saqala ukwenza umse benzi wokufaka itela ngoko ke sisebenzisa ibtb kwaye sihlola wonke umsebenzi owenziwe yinkampani eye nza indlela, "utshilo.
tgt: kamuva nje sesiqale nokwenza umsebe nzi wokwakha umgwaqo ngetiyela, ngakhoke sisebe nzisa ibtb siphinde sihlole wonke umsebenzi owenziwa yinkampani eyakhayo," ku sho udladla.

src: usumay uthi ukusebe nza kwiprojekthi kunemice limngeni.
tgt: usumay uthi ukusebenza kulo mklamo kunazo izinse lelo.

src: abafundi kwizikolo zasemapha ndleni bafumana uncedo more matshediso isebe lemfundo esisise ko lisungule inkqubo eza kunceda uninzi lwabafundi kwiindawo zase maphandleni ezihleleleki leyo ngokwezemfundo.
tgt: abafundi ezikoleni zase makhaya bathola usizo more matshediso umnyango wezemfu ndo eyisisekelo wethule uhlelo olu zohlomulisa iningi labafu ndi abancishwe amathuba kwezemfundo emiphakathi ni yasemakhaya.

src: iprojekthi yootitsha la abancedisayo ema phandleni (ireap) yi nkqubo yeminyaka emitha thu eza kuphunyezwa uku suka ngowama2018 kude kube ngowama2021 kwisi gaba sokulinga, kwaye yenzelwe ukuba kuzuze izikolo ezimalunga ne188 emzantsi afrika ngeli xesha.
tgt: umkla mo wabasizi bothisha ezi ndaweni zasemakhaya (ireap) wuhlelo lweminya ka emithathu oluzoqala u kusebenza njengohlelo oluli ngwayo kusukela ngowe zi2018 kuya kowezi2021, futhi kulindeleke ukuthi lu hlomulise izikole ezilinganise lwa kwi188 eningizimu afri ka kulesi sikhathi.

src: isebe lithemba ukuba oku kuza kubanegalelo ekuphu culeni umgangatho wokufu nda nokufundisa kwinkqubo yemfundo esisiseko yasema phandleni.
tgt: umnyango uyethemba ukuthi lokhu kuzolekelela ekuphuculeni izinga lokufu nda nokufundisa ohlelweni lwemfundo eyisisekelo ezi ndaweni zasemakhaya.

src: le nkqubo ngoku isalingwa kwizithili ezibini kwipho ndo ngalinye kula amathathu asemaphandleni aneziphu mo zemfundo ezingezihla nga.
tgt: okwamanje lolu hlelo lu salingwa ezifundeni ezimbi li esifundazweni ngasinye kwezintathu ezisezindaweni zasemakhaya ezingaqhubi neze kahle kwezemfundo, okubalwa kuzona isifunda ialfred nzo east district kanye neor tambo coa stal district empumalanga kapa, isifunda ilembe kanye nomzinyathi kwazuluna tali, ngokunjalo nesifunda isekhukhune kanye nemo pani elimpopo.

src: ezi zithili ziquka i alfred nzo east kunye nezi thili zonxweme lweor tambo empuma koloni, isi thili iilembe kunye neumzi nyathi kwiphondo lakwazu lunatal, kunye nesithili sase sekhukhune nesasemopani elimpopo.
tgt: umqondisi omkhulu wophiko lwezokuqaliswa nokuthuthukiswa kohlelo lokufunda emnyangwe ni wemfundo eyisiseke lo useliki tlhabane, uthe umnyango usuqashe intsha ephothule umatikuletshe ni elinganiselwa kuma750 ukuba ibe ngabasizi bothisha ezikoleni ezisezindaweni zasemakhaya.

src: "bafumene uqeqesho olu sisiseko oluza kubaxhobisa batsho bakwazi ukwenza imi sebenzi eyabelwe bona.
tgt: "sebethole ukuqeqeshwa okuyisisekelo okuzobasiza ukuqhuba umsebenzi aba belwe wona.

src: baza kusebenza kwiiklasi zesiga ba esisiseko nakwezesigaba esiphakathi, eziquka ibanga loku1 ukuya kwele4," ucha zile watsho.
tgt: bazofakwa ezi ngeni eliyisisekelo kanye nasezingeni elimaphakathi, okubandakanya ibanga 14," kuchaza utlhabane.

src: ootitshala abancedisayo emaphandleni kulindeleke ukuba bancedise ngemise benzi eyahlukeneyo enxu lumene nezifundo, ngoku kodwa ukuphucula isifundo sezibalo, esobuchule boku funda nokubhala (ilitherasi) kunye nezakhono zokufu nda.
tgt: abasizi bothisha ezi ndaweni zasemakhaya kulindeleke ukuba balekelele emisebenzini ehlukahlukene yohlelo lokufunda, ikakhulu kazi ukuphucula amakhono okubala, ukubhala nokufu nda.

src: "le yindlela yokuxho bisa kananjalo ulutsha kwiindawo ezihlelelekileyo ngokwezoqoqosho ngoku sebenzisa uphuhliso lweza khono kunye namava omse benzi," utshilo utlhabane.
tgt: "lokhu kuphinde kube yindlela yokuhlomisa ngama khono intsha esezindaweni ezibhekene nezinselelo kwe zomnotho, ngokuthuthukisa amakhono abo nokubanikeza isipiliyoni somsebenzi," ku sho utlhabane.

src: uthe ootitshala abance disayo emaphandleni kuli ndeleke ukuba baphungu le umthwalo wootitshala kwizikolo zasemaphandleni ngokuncedisa ngemisebenzi ehambelana nekharityhu lam efana nokuququzelela amaqela emisebenzi yesiko lo, amaqela ezibalo, amaqela okufunda, amaqela emise benzi yobugcisa bokuyila kunye neeprojekthi zolimo.
tgt: uthe abasizi bothisha ezi ndaweni zasemakhaya kulindeleke ukuba behlise umthwalo kothisha ezikoleni zasemakhaya ngokubalekele la emisebenzini ephathelene nohlelo lokufunda efana nokuhlela nokuhlangani sa amaqembu omsebenzi wesikole owenzelwa ekhaya, amaqembu ezibalo, amaqe mbu okufunda, amaqembu obuchule kwezobuciko kanye nemiklamo yezolimo.

src: untombikayise mkhize oyi nqununu yesikolo samaba nga aphantsi iozwathini pri mary enodwengu kwisithili saseilembe uthemba ukuba le nkqubo iza kunceda uni nzi lwabafundi bakhe abatsa la nzima ngokufunda noku bala.
tgt: uthishanhloko untombi kayise mkhize wasesikoleni iozwathini primary school endaweni yakwanodwengu esifundeni ilembe uthemba ukuthi lolu hlelo luzosiza ini ngi labafundi bakhe abane nkinga esifundweni sokufu nda kanye nenyumeresi.

src: isikolo sakhe esiqala kwiba nga r siphele kwibanga 7 sinabafundi abamalunga nama387 kulo nyaka.
tgt: isikole sakhe sinabafu ndi ababhalisile kulo nyaka abalinganiselwa kuma387 kusuka ebangeni r kuya kwelesi7.

src: "uninzi lwabafundi bethu luvela kumakhaya angena bantu badala ngelixa abanye bephuma kumakhaya aphethwe ngoomawokhu lu.
tgt: "iningi labafu ndi bethu livela emakhaya aphethwe yizingane kanti futhi abanye babo banakeke lwa ngogogo.

src: abanabo abantu aba nokubancedisa ngomsebenzi wesikolo okanye ukubakhu thaza ukuba bafunde, kwaye oku kuchaphazela indlela abaqhuba ngayo kwizifundo zabo," uchaze watsho.
tgt: abanabo aba ntu abazobasiza ngomse benzi wesikole owenzelwa ekhaya noma abazobagqu gquzela ukuba bafunde izincwadi, futhi lokhu kunomthelela ongemu hle ekuqhubeni umse benzi wabo egunjini loku funda," kuchaza uthisha nhloko.

src: "enye ingxaki kukuba abafundi bethu abakwisi gaba sesiseko bafundiswa zonke izifundo ngesizulu kwaye xa beya kwisigaba esiphakathi kuyanyanzeleka ukuba batshintshe benze uni nzi lwezifundo ngesingesi, ngoko ke kubangumceli mngeni omkhulu kubo ukuba baqhele ukufunda ngesingesi."
tgt: "enye inkinga uku thi abafundi bethu abasezi ngeni eliyisisekelo bafundi swa zonke izifundo ngesizu lu kuthi uma sebeqhubekela ezingeni elimaphakathi ku fanele bashintshe benze ini ngi lezifundo ngesingisi, nga khoke kuba inselelo enkulu uma sekufanele bashintshe.

src: ngexesha lesigaba sokuli nga, siza kuhlola ifuthe kunye nendlela esebenza ngayo inkqubo yereap ngokwenza uvavanyo nohlo lo lwenkqubo yereap .
tgt: "kulesi sigaba sokulingwa kwalolu hlelo, sizohlola umthelela nempumelelo yalo ngokuthi siqaphe fu thi sihlole uhlelo lwereap .

src: siye sacela noncedo lwabantu abathandathu abanezidanga abangaphangeliyo okwango ku ukuba basebenze njenga baququzeleli beprojekthi.
tgt: siphinde saqasha nabafu ndi abayisithupha abaneziqu zemfundo ephakeme aba ngakawutholi umsebenzi abasebenza njengabalawu li nabahlanganisi bohle lo.

src: baza kubekwa kwisithili ngasinye esithatha inxa xheba.
tgt: bazobekwa esifundeni ngasinye kulezo eziyingxe nye yalolu hlelo.

src: abaququzeleli be projekthi baza kusinceda kananjalo ekubekeni iliso nasekuhlolweni kweproje kthi.
tgt: abalawuli nabahlanganisi bohlelo ba zophinde basize ekuqapheni nasekuhloleni lo mklamo.

src: kwiminyaka emibini edlu lileyo, sibambe intlanganiso yokuqala ngemfundo yase maphandleni kwisigaba esi siseko.
tgt: eminyakeni emibili edlu le, sabamba izingxoxo zokubonisana zokuqala ngqa mayelana nemfundo yase makhaya emkhakheni we zinga lemfundo eyisisekelo.

src: idriving ambitions ifundisa abantu abakhubazekileyo ukuqhuba vukuzenzele unnamed abantu abakhubazeki leyo kumaxa amaninzi abawafumani lula amathuba njengabantu abangakhubazekanga.
tgt: abakwadriving ambitions bafundisa abantu abakhubazekile ukushayela vukuzenzele unnamed abantu abakhubaze kile ngokuvamile bakuthola kunzima ukufinyelela amathuba afa nayo nabantu abangenakho ukukhubazeka.

src: amanye ala mathuba aquka ukukwazi ukuqhuba imoto.
tgt: okunye kwalawa mathuba ukufunda ukushayela imo to.

src: kodwa inkqubo eyodwa eqhutywa yiquadpara association of south africa (iqasa) ifundise abantu abakhubazekileyo abangama120 ukuqhuba iimo to ezilungiselelwe abantu abakhubazekileyo, kwaba bantu abangama80 sele bezifumene iilayisenisi zabo zokuqhuba.
tgt: kodwa uhlelo oluyingqayizivele lwabakwaquadpa ra association of south afri ca (iqasa) luye lwafundisa abantu abayi120 abakhubaze kile ukuba bakwazi ukushayela izimoto ezilungiselelwe bona, kanti abangama80 kulaba bantu baye bakwazi ukuthola izincwadi zabo zokushayela.

src: "abantu abakhubazekileyo kumaxa amaninzi bayasokola ukuzihambela baye kwiindawo abafuna ukuya kuzo, kwaye isizathu soku ubukhulu becala kukuba bengakwazi ukusebenzisa izithuthi zika wonkewonke.
tgt: "abantu abakhubazekile ba vame ukubhekana nezinselele ezinkulu lapho bezama uku ya ezindaweni, ikakhulukazi ngoba abakwazi ukusebenzisa iningi lezinhlelo zokuthutha zomphakathi.

src: sifuna ukuyi lungisa le ngxaki, kodwa eyona nto siyifuna ngamandla kukuba bakwazi ukufumana imisebenzi," litshilo igosa eliphezulu lesigqeba (iceo) seqasa uari seirlis naye okhubazeke iingalo nemilenze.
tgt: besifuna ukuxa zulula le nkinga futhi, okuba luleke kakhulu, senze abantu baqasheke," kusho isikhulu esiphezulu (iceo) seqasa uari seirlis naye okhubazeke kwesingezansi.

src: koku okwabangela ukuba kuqaliswe le nkqubo yoku fundisa ukuqhuba yakwadriv ing ambitions ngowama2013.
tgt: kwakuyilena injongo eyayiqhuba uhlelo lwabakwadriv ing ambitions, olwasungulwa ngowezi2013.

src: uqasa waya wadibana nenkampani eqeshisa ngeemoto uavis ukuze babonisane ngomba wokufundisa abantu abakhubazekileyo ukuqhuba izithuthi ezilungiselelwe kanye le meko yabo.
tgt: iqasa yahla ngana nenkampani eqashisa izimoto iavis ukuze baxox isane ngokufundisa abantu abakhubazekile ukushayela izimoto ezilungiselelwe bona.

src: "uavis wayiqonda le ngxa ki, futhi wabona nokubalule ka kwayo njengoko beqeshisa ngeemoto ezinobuxhakaxhaka bokuqhuba obusetyenziswa ngezandla.
tgt: "abakwaavis basiqonda isidingo, futhi bakubona uku baluleka kwalokhu kubona, njengoba beqashisa ngezimoto ezishayelwa ngezandla.

src: baye bavuma ukusipha imoto yokuqala esasiyise benzisa ukufundisa abantu uku qhuba," utshilo useirlis.
tgt: bavu ma ukunikela ngemoto yethu yokuqala eyayizosetshenziselwa izifundo zokushayela," kusho useirlis.

src: izicelo zabantu abafuna uku funda ukuqhuba zivulelekile kubantu abakhubazeke amanqe kunye nabo bakhubazeke iingalo nemilenze banelayisenisi yokufunda ukuqhuba.
tgt: izicelo zalolu hlelo zivulelekile kubantu abakhubazeke izingalo nemilenze kanye nabakhubaze ke isingezansi asebevele benayo ilayisensi yokufundela ukushayela.

src: "baya kuvavanyo olwenziwa yingcali yokuncedisa izigu lane zikwazi ukuzenzela izinto (ioccupational therapist) uku qinisekisa ukuba banazo izakhono zokuqhuba ngendlela engazikubeka abanye abaqhubi engozini.
tgt: "baye bahanjiswe kudokote la wokunyakaza kwamalungu omzimba, phecelezi ioccupa tional therapist , ukuze iqinise kise ukuthi umzimba wabo uya kwazi ukunyakaza ngendlela engabenza bakwazi ukushaye la izimoto ezenzelwe abantu abakhubazekile ngaphandle kokubabeka engozini.

src: emva koko kuye ku jongwe imeko yezimali yomntu lowo, oko kukuthi, angakwazi ukubhatala malini na, ize xa ingazukwanela leyo anayo, enye ayibhatalelwe," ucacise watsho useirlis.
tgt: kube se kubhekwa ukuthi umuntu lowo angakwazi ukukhokha imali engakanani kulolu hlelo, bese konke okunye kukhokhelwe ngabaxhasi," kuchaza useirlis.

src: abantu abathatha inxaxheba kule nkqubo banikwa iiyure ezaneleyo befundiswa ukuqhu ba, bade babe bakulungele uku ya kuvavanywa.
tgt: ababambiqhaza bathola uchungechunge oluphelele lwe zifundo zokushayela, kuze kube sebekulungele ukuhlolwa.

src: omnye wabantu abalisebenzisayo eli thuba ngucarol kho za, owafumana ingozi yemoto kwiminyaka emibini eyadlu layo.
tgt: umuntu owalisebenzisa ngempumelelo leli thuba labakwaqasa ngucarol khoza, owabandakanyeka engozini yemoto eminyakeni emibi li edlule.

src: wafumana umonzakalo owamkhubaza amanqe.
tgt: wasala ekhubazeke kwesingezansi.

src: igo george ihamba phambili kuma phulo okuxhobisa abakhubazekileyo vukuzenzele unnamed ukusebenzisa izithuthi zikawonkewonke yingxaki enkulu abajamelene nayo abantu abakhubazekileyo njengoko iibhasi kunye neeteksi ezininzi zingenabo ubuxhakaxhaka obufunekayo ukuze zikwazi ukubakhwelisa.
tgt: igo george isiza ekuhlomiseni abantu abakhubazekile vukuzenzele unnamed ukufinyelela ezoku thutha zomphakathi ngokuvamile kuyinselele kubantu abaphila nokukhubazeka njengoba amabhasi amaningi namatekisi engenazo izinto ezidingekayo ukuthutha abagibeli abakhu bazekile.

src: oomasipala kulo lonke eli nabo ngoku bafuna ukuqalisa iinkqubo eziza kusombulula le ngxaki.
tgt: omasipala bakuleli nabo sebezibandakanye kulolu hle lo lokusombulula le nkinga.

src: kwaye umasipala wengingqi wasegeorge nguye ohamba phambili ngokwendle la izithuthi zikawonkewonke ezinokutshintshwa ngayo uku ze zikwazi ukukhwelisa abantu abakhubazekileyo.
tgt: kanti umasipala wasegeorge usukhuphule kakhulu iqophelo lokuthi izinhlelo zezokuthutha umphakathi kumele zime kuphi lapho kusetshenzelwa abantu abakhubazekile.

src: inkqubo yeebhasi eziquqa zibuyelela, igo george, ixhaswa ngemali lisebe lika zwelonke lezothutho kwaye kungoku nje ineebhasi ezincinci ezingama35, iibhasi ezinku lu ezingama36 kunye neebha si eziphakathi ezingama33.
tgt: njengoba luxhaswe ngezimali ngumnyango kazwelonke we zokuthutha, uhlelo lwezoku thutha ngamabhasi asheshayo (ibrt) igo george njenga manje lunamabhasi amancane angama35, amabhasi ajwayele kile angama36 namabhasi amakhudlwana angama33.

src: zonke ezi bhasi ziyakwazi ukukhwelisa abantu abahamba ngesitulo esinamavili.
tgt: wonke la mabhasi akhiwe ngendlela ehlinzekela izihlalo zabakhu bazekile.

src: iibhasi ezinkulu neziphakathi zinendawo ethotywa ngombane elungiselelwe ukukhwela noku hlala abantu abahamba ngezitulo ezinamavili kwakunye nezinye izinto eziqhelekileyo ebhasini.
tgt: amabhasi ajwayelekile kanye namakhudlwana afakwe ipha sishi lezihlalo zabakhubazekile elisebenza ngogesi, izihlalo ezikhethekile kanye nezinye izinto ezijwayelekile.

src: kodwa umsebenzi omkhulu wenziwe kwezi bhasi zincinci, zona ukufika kwazo ngowama2015, yayizezokuqa la emzantsi afrika ukuba nenqwanqwa lokunyusa abantu abahamba ngezitulo ezinama vili zibakhwelisa.
tgt: kuye kwagxilwa kakhulu emabhasini amancane, wonake, okwathi ngesikhathi eqala ukukhishwa ngowezi2015, aba ngawokuqala eningizimu afrika ukuba nomshini wokukhuphula abagibeli abanezihlalo zabakhubazekile.

src: zikwanayo nendawo yokuba bamise izitulo zabo ezinamavili futhi amacango azo anehayidrolikhi, loo nto yenze ukuba abantu abakhuba zekileyo bakwazi ukuzikhwela.
tgt: aphinde futhi abe nekhosombane lezihlalo zabakhubaze kile nezicabha ezisebenza nge hayidrolikhi, okwenza kube lula ukuthi abagibeli abakhu bazekile bangene ebhasini.

src: "olu hlobo lweebhasi lulo kuphela emzantsi afrika eku lula ukuba lukhwelwe nguye wonke umntu," utshilo umlawuli wego george ujames robb.
tgt: "lolu ukuphela kohlelo lwamabhasi olufinyeleleka ngokuphelele eningizimu afrika," kusho imenenja yego george ujames robb.

src: le yenye yezinto ezingundoqo ezibalula ngayo igo george.
tgt: "lena enye yezinsika ezi balulekile zohlelo lwego george.

src: kubalulekile ukuba wonke umntu wasegeorge akwazi ukuzisebenzisa izithuthi ziwonkewonke ukuze akwa zi ukuya emsebenzini, ezivenkileni, ecaweni, kwiindawo zolonwabo kunye nezo kufu maneka kuzo iinkonzo zezempilo.
tgt: kubalulekile ukuthi umuntu ngamunye egeorge akwazi ukusebenzisa ezoku thutha zomphakathi ukuze akwazi ukufinyelela amathuba omsebenzi, ezitolo, ezenkolo, ezokungcebeleka kanye nezinsiza ezifana nokunakekelwa kwezempilo.

src: "abakhweli abakhubazekileyo bayayibulela into yokuba imeko yabo iqondwe kunye neenzima abadibana nazo imihla nezolo bezama ukuya kwiindawo ezi kude namakhaya abo, kwaye nokuba kuqondwe ukubaluleka kokungaxhomekeki emntwini, uzihambele wedwa."
tgt: "abagibeli abakhubazekile bakubonga kakhulu ukucatshangelwa kwezidingo zabo kanye nomshikashika wo suku nosuku wokufinyelela ezindaweni ezikude nekhaya, nokuzimela okulethwa ukukwazi ukuzihambela ngokwabo.

src: urodrique felix, omnye wabantu abasebenzisa ezi bha si, yena wafumana ingozi ye sithuthuthu kwiinyanga ezinga ma18 ezidlulileyo.
tgt: "urodrique felix, omunye wabasebenzisa uhlelo lwama bhasi, wabandakanyeka engozini yesithuthuthu ezinyangeni eziyi18 ezidlule.

src: kungoku nje uhamba ngesitulo esinama vili kwaye uthi kulula kakhulu ukuhamba ngezi bhasi xa esiya esibhedlela.
tgt: njengamanje uhamba ngesihlalo sabakhuba zekile kodwa uthi usizo lwama bhasi lwenze kwaba lula ukuba akwazi ukuya esibhedlela.

src: "okuyinene kukuba sonke isixeko sasegeorge sicetywe ngendlela ethathela ingqalelo abantu abanezitulo ezinamavili, into leyo iluncedo kakhulu ku thi sonke," utshilo urodrique.
tgt: "empeleni, idolobha lonke lasegeorge lwenza impilo ibe lula kubantu abahamba ngezi hlalo zabakhubazekile, okuyinto enhle kakhulu," kusho urodrique.

src: zazi iindlela ngeendlela zokuxhatshazwa vukuzenzele unnamed okokuba uphatheke kakubi eluthandweni okanye umntwa na ophantsi kwakho uphe thwe kakubi, ungawathatha amanyathelo okuzikhusela okanye okukhusela umntwa na ngokuya ezinkundleni zamatyala okanye ngokuya kuxela le meko kumbutho wamapolisa asemzantsi afri ka (isaps).
tgt: yazi izinhlobo ezahlukene zokuhlukunyezwa vukuzenzele unnamed uma usebudle lwaneni obuhlu kumezayo noma uma ingane oyinakekelayo ihlukunyezwa, ungathatha izinyathelo zokuzivikela noma zokuvikela ingane ngokuya ezinkantolo noma ngokubika lolu daba embu thweni waphoyisa aseni ngizimu afrika (isaps).

src: umthetho wobundlo bongela basekhaya unika amaxhoba obundlobongela basekhaya olona khuseleko luliqilima olunokunikwa ngumthetho.
tgt: umthetho obhekelele u dlame lwasekhaya uzi vikela ngokugcwele izisulu zodlame lwasekhaya.

src: ukuphathwa kakubi kuzi bonakalisa ngeendlela ngeendlela kwaye kubalule kile okokuba abantu aba bhinqileyo bazazi iintlobo ngeentlobo zokuphathwa kakubi ukuze bakwazi uku zikhusela.
tgt: ukuhlukumeza kwe nzeka ngezindlela ezahlu kene futhi kubalulekile ukuthi abantu besifazane bazi izindlela ezahlukene zokuhlukumeza ukuze ba zivikele.

src: ubundlobongela basekhaya benzeka xa umntu ephantsi kwezi meko zilandelayo:ukuphathwa kakubi ngo kwasemzimbeni: umzekelo, xa ubethwa okanye ugrogriswa ngobundlobongela.
tgt: udlame lwasekhaya lwe nzeka uma umuntu ehle lwa yilokhu:ukushaywa: isibonelo, uma ushaywa noma wesatshiswa ngodlame.

src: ukuphathwa kakubi ngokwe sondo: xa ixhoba lidlwengulwa okanye linyanzelwa ukwenza okanye ukubukela izenzo zesondo ezilithoba isidima.
tgt: ukuhlukunyezwa ngoko cansi: uma isisulu sidlwe ngulwa noma siphoqwa ukuthi senze noma sibukele okuphathelene nocansi okwe hlisa isithunzi.

src: ukuphathwa kakubi ngokwa semphefumlweni, ngentetha nangokwasengqondweni: oku kwenzeka xa umntu esoloko ethukwa, ephoxwa okanye esenyeliswa.
tgt: ukuhlukumeza ngoko mphefumulo, ngamazwi kanye nangokomqondo: lokhu kwenzeka uma umu ntu ehlale ethukwa, ejivazwa noma ebizwa ngamagama ajivazayo.

src: ukuphathwa kakubi ngokwe zoqoqosho: le nto ingenzeka xa ixhoba lithintelwa ukwamkela umvuzo.
tgt: ukuhlukumeza ngokupha thelene nomnotho: lokhu kungenzeka uma isisulu sivi njelwa ukuthi sithole iholo.

src: isoyikiso: umzekelo wesoyiki so kuxa ixhoba lifumana iisms okanye imiyalezo esongelayo neyoyikisayo.
tgt: ukwesabisa: isibonelo sokwesabisa yilapho isisu lu sithola imilayezo noma amasms asesabisayo futhi ethusayo.

src: ukuxhatshazwa: umzekelo kukusoloko utsalelwa umnxe ba okanye ukusoloko ujongiwe, nto leyo ekwenza woyike.
tgt: ukukhathazwa: kungaba isibonelo ngokuthi uhlale ushayelwa ucingo noma uma uhlale ugadiwe futhi lokhu kukwenza ukuthi wesabe.

src: ukuchwechwelwa: kwenzeka xa lowo ukuphethe kakubi esoloko ekulandela okanye ekunyanzela okokuba uthethe naye noxa ungafuni.
tgt: ukulandelwa: kwenzeka uma umhlukumezi ehlala ekulandela noma ephoqa ukukhuluma nawe ungafuni.

src: ukuthetha kubaluleke kakhulu ekwazini umntwana wakho vukuzenzele unnamed akululanga uku khulisa umntwana, kodwa uncedo olu ncinane lweengcali lunga nceda kakhulu ekuqiniseki seni okokuba wenza konke okunokwenza.
tgt: ukuxoxisana kusemqoka ekutheni wazi ingane yakho vukuzenzele unnamed akulula ukukhulisa ingane, kodwa usizo oluncane oluvela kongoti lungasiza kakhulu ekutheni wenze okungcono ongakwazi ukukwenza.

src: ngokwabakwachildline south africa, umbutho onga sebenzeli nzuzo okhuse la abantwana kuzo zonke izenzo zobundlobongela nokhuthaza ukuhlonitshwa kwamalungelo abantwa na emzantsi afrika, aba zali mabathethe ngendlela eyakhayo nabantwana.
tgt: uchildline south africa, inhlangano engenzi nzuzo evikela izingane kuzo zonke izinhlobo zodlame futhi ekhuthaza ukuhlonishwa kwamalungelo ezingane eni ngizimu afrika, uthi abazali kumele baxoxisane ngokwa khayo nezingane.

src: musa ukubangxolisa: the tha nabo ngembeko; benze bazikhethele; babandakanye xa kuthathwa izigqibo; bafundise okuhle kokubi; kwaye bakhuthaze ukuba bazivakalise izimvo zabo.
tgt: ningazithethisi; khuluma ni nazo ngenhlonipho; zivumeleni zizikhethele, zibandakanyeni ezinhle lweni zokuthathwa kwezi nqumo; zifundiseni ngoku phathelene nokufanele kanye nokungafanele; bese nizigqugquzele ukuthi zisho ukuthi zizizwa kanjani.

src: oku ungakwenza ngokubamba iintlanga niso zosapho rhoqo, apho wonke umntu athi athethe kwaye aphulaphule.
tgt: ningakwenza lokhu ngokubamba imihlanga no yomndeni njalo, lapho kukhuluma futhi kulalela khona wonke umuntu.

src: uku thetha yeyona ndlela ingco no kakhulu yokufundisa abantwana, kwaye unga bakhuthaza okokuba bazi phathe kakuhle ngokuthi nje ubachazele izinto.
tgt: uku khuluma kuyindlela engco no kakhulu yokufundisa izingane futhi ungakhutha za ukuziphatha kahle ngo kuvele nje uzichazele izi nto.

src: umbutho ichildline ucebisa abaza li okokuba baphulaphule ngononophelo kwaye babe nomonde, kuba abantwana basenokungakwazi ukuthe tha into abayicingayo okanye abanemvakalelo yayo.
tgt: uchildline south afri ca ucebisa abazali ukuthi ba lalelisise futhi babe nesineke, ngenxa yokuthi kungenzeka izingane zingakwazi ukusho ukuthi zicabangani noma ukuthi zizizwa kanjani.

src: abantwana kufuneka bayazi into eyamkelekileyo nengamkelekanga qinisekisa okokuba bayazi ukuba kutheni imithetho ifuneka nokokuba ukuba bayayaphula kuza kubakho iziphumo.
tgt: izingane zidinga ukwazi ukuthi yini eyemukelekile kanye nengemukelekile qinisekisa ukuthi ziyazi ukuthi kungani kudingeka imithetho nokuthi uzojeziswa uma uyephula.

src: kufuneka uso loko ungagungqi kwaye ezo ziphumo uzinyanzelise.
tgt: ungaguquki kulokho okwenzayo bese usebenzisa lokhu kujezisa.

src: ngokuya bekhula abantwa na, bakhuthaze okokuba bayixoxe le mithetho kwaye benze bancedise ekumiseleni iziphumo.
tgt: ngesikhathi izingane zikhu la, zigqugquzele ukuthi zidi ngide le mithetho futhi zisize ukuthi zihlonze imiphumela.

src: soloko ubancoma abantwana ngokuziphatha kakuhle ngokubaxelela indlela ozithanda ngayo izinto ezintle abazenzayo, ukuziphatha kakubi kunga thi shwaka.
tgt: ncoma izingane ngaso sonke isikhathi uma ziziphathe kahle ngokuzitshela ukuthi uzithanda kanjani izinto ezinhle ezizenzayo, zingayeka ukungaziphathi kahle.

src: ngaphezu koko, imivuzo ingcono kune zohlwayo.
tgt: ukengeza kulokho, ukuklomelisa kusebenza kangcono kunokujezisa.

src: noxa abazali aba ninzi bevuza abantwana ngezinto zokudlala okanye iilekese, eyonayona mivuzo kukwanga, uncumo noku bonisa ukuba nomdla kubo.
tgt: nanoma abazali abaningi beklomelisa izingane ngezinto zezingane zoku dlala noma ngamaswidi, ukuklomelisa okungcono ukwanga, ukumamatheka kanye nokukhombisa ukuthi unendaba nazo.

src: ukwakha ukuzithemba kubalulekile okokuba umncede umntwana wakho azithembe.
tgt: ukwakha ukuzethembakubalulekile ukuthi usize ukwakha ukuzethemba kwe ngane yakho.

src: abantwana bakho ungabanceda ngokubancoma kuba bezame ukunceda no kusebenzisa ingqondo yabo, ngobukrelekrele nokutha nda ukudlala; ubakhuthaze ukuba bathethe, bazive bebalulekile nokubaxelela okokuba babalulekile; nawe kufuneka uthembeke ukuze nabo bakuthembe.
tgt: ungasiza izi ngane zakho ngokuzincoma ngokuzama ukusiza kanye nangokusebenzisa lokho ezikucabangayo, ubuhlakani kanye nokudlala kwazo; zigqugquzele ukuthi zikhu lume; zenze zizizwe zikhe thekile; futhi nawe wethe mbeke, ukuze zikwazi uku thembela kuwe.

src: ukuba ngqwabalala akulungangaakwamkeleki ukuba ngqwabalala ebantwaneni.
tgt: indlela yokuziphatha elimazayo ayemukelekileakwemukelekile nanini ukulimaza izingane.

src: ithuba lokugqibela lokubhalisela uvota vukuzenzele unnamed impelaveki yokubha lisela ukuvota izakuba ngomgqibelo, umhla wama26 nangecawa, umhla wama27 kweyomqungu yowama2019 ngokutsho kukasihlalo wekhomishini yonyulo ezimeleyo (iiec), uglen mashinini.
tgt: ithuba lokugcina lokubhalisela ukuvota vukuzenzele unnamed impelasonto yokubha lisela ukuvota izoba ngo mgqibelo mhla zinga ma26 nangesonto mhla zingama27 kumasingana 2019 ngokusho kukasihlalo wekhomishani yokhetho ezimele (iiec), uglen mashinini.

src: umashinini uthi zonke izikhululo zokuvota ezi ngama22 932 ziza kuvula ngentsimbi ye08h00 zivale ngeye17h00 ngempelaveki yokubhalisela ukuvota.
tgt: umashinini uthe zonke izikhungo zokuvota eziyizi22 932 zizovula kusukela ngo08h00 ukuya ngo17h00 ngempelasonto yokubhalisela ukuvota.

src: "oku kukuvumela abavoti abatsha ukuba babhalise bona asebebhalisile balungi se baze bakhangele iinkcu khacha zabo zokubhalisa.
tgt: "lokhu kwenzelwa uku vumela abaqala ukubhalisa ukuba babhalise kuthi labo aseke babhalisa bavuselele futhi babheke imininingwane yabo yokubhalisa."

src: "umashinini uthi bazizigidi ezingama26.1 abavoti aba bhalisileyo kumqulu wabavoti odibeneyo wesizwe.
tgt: umashinini uthe esikhathini samanje balinganiselwa kwizigidi ezingama26.1 abantu ababhalisele ukuvota ohlwini lukazwelonke lwabavoti.

src: iiec inethemba lokongeza nokuba sisigidi esinye ubu ncinane sabavoti abatsha kumqulu wabavoti phambi konyulo lowama2019.
tgt: iiec ifisa ukwengeza oku ngenani esinye isigidi sabavo ti ohlwini lwabavoti ngapha mbi kokhetho lowezi2019.

src: umashinini uthi ukubha lisela ukuvota kuzakuqhu tywa nakumaziko ezolule ko (iintolongo) kweli lizwe jikelele ukunika amabanjwa ithuba lokuba asebenzise ilungelo lawo lokuvota.
tgt: umashinini uphinde wathi ukubhalisela ukuvo ta kuzokwenziwa futhi na sezikhungweni zokuqondi swa kwezigwegwe ezweni lonkana ukunikeza iziboshwa ithuba lokusebenzisa ilungelo lazo lokuvota.

src: "ngokuphathelene noku vota, amabanjwa athathwa njengabhalisele ukuvota kwizithili zovoto apho iinto longo zawo zikhoyo.
tgt: "ngokohlelo lokuvota, iziboshwa zithathwa ngo kuthi zibhalisele ukuvota ezifundeni zokuvota lapho ziboshwe khona.

src: "iintsapho zabo baseluvale lweni kumaziko ezoluleko ziyacelwa ukuba zibazisele iincwadizazisi zabo lingekaqalisi eli phulo lokubhalisela uvoto," utshilo umashinini.
tgt: "amalungu emindeni alabo abagqunywe emajele kucelwa ukuba athumele omazisi babo ngaphambi kosuku lokubha lisela ukuvota," ngokusho kukamashinini.

src: ukubhalisela ukuvotaiiec inethemba lokuba abavoti asebebhalisile baza kusebenzisa eli thuba ukutyelela izikhululo zabo zovoto ukuyokukhangela ukubhali swa kwabo kwaye baqinisekise iinkcukacha zeedilesi zabo.
tgt: ukubhalisela ukuvotaiiec ithemba ukuthi abavoti, asebebhalisile, bazothatha leli thuba bavakashele izikhungo zabo zokuvota babheke ukuthi babhalisile, ikakhulukazi baqinisekise futhi balungise amakheli abo.

src: naku ekufanele ukuba ukwazi: bonke abemi bomzantsi afrika abaminyaka ili16 nangaphezulu ubudala abaneencwadizazisi banga bhalisa njengabavoti (nango na ingabo baminyaka ili18 ubudala ngosuku lokuvota abanokuvota).
tgt: nakhu okufanele ukwazi: zonke izakhamuzi zase ningizimu afrika ezine minyaka yobudala eyi16 nangaphezulu ezinomazisi osemthethweni zingabhali sela ukuvota (nakuba kuyila bo abaneminyaka eyi18 ngo suku lokuvota abangavota).

src: iindlela zokuzigcina ukhuselekile ngezi holide zekrisimesi dale hes iiholide zekrisime si zilixesha leziyu nguma nolonwa bo.
tgt: amasu okukugcina uphephile ngale si sikhathi samaholide kakhisimusi dale hes isikhathi samaholide kakhisimusi isikhathi senjabulo.

src: kodwa zikwalixesha lokuxhaphaka kwezehlo ezifana neengozi zeemoto, ubusela nolwaphu lomthetho.
tgt: kodwa sibuye sandise nezehlakalo zezigemegeme ezifana nezingozi zezimoto, ubusela nobunye ubulelesi.

src: sebenzisa ezi ngcebiso ukuqinisekisa ukuba ukhuselekileyo futhi uyalonwabela eli xesha nezihlobo zakho.
tgt: landela lawa masu ukuze uqikelele ukuthi uphe phile futhi uthokozile ngaso sonke isikhathi, wena nezihlobo zakho.

src: hlala ukhuselekile ezindleleniiingozi zendlela zanda kakhulu ngexesha leeholide zekrisimesi, futhi zibulala abantu abaninzi.
tgt: phepha emigwaqweniizingozi zomgwaqo ziba ziningi kakhulu ngesikhathi samaholide kakhisimusi, zibulale amakhulu abantu.

src: ukuze uhlale ukhuselekile, qinisekisa ukuba: uyasihlola isithuthi sakho phambi kokuba ungene endleleni ukuya apho usingise khona, ukuqinisekisa ukuba imoto yakho ikumga ngatho ofanelekileyo.
tgt: ukuze uhlale uphephile, qikelela ukuthi: uhlola imoto yakho ngaphambi kokuba uye lapho uphokophele ukuya khona, ukuze uqikelele ukuthi ise simweni esigculisayo.

src: wena nabakhweli ba kho nihlala niwanxibile amabhanti okhuselo.
tgt: wena nabagibeli bakho ngaso sonke isikhathi nifase amabhande emotweni.

src: uyaphumla rhoqo emva kweeyure ezimbini xa uqhuba imigama emide.
tgt: njalo ngemuva kwamahora amabili uthathe ikhefu uma ushayela ibanga elide.

src: nokuba kuyintoni na ungaqhubi xa usele.
tgt: ngaso sonke isikhathi gwema uphuzo ngesikhathi ushayela.

src: qhuba ngesantya esimiselweyo futhi uthobele yonke eminye imithetho yezendlela.
tgt: bambelela kwisivinini esibekiwe futhi uqa phele yonke imithetho yomgwaqo.

src: uyaziqaphela ezinye izithuthi nabahambi ngeenyawo endleleni.
tgt: qaphela ezinye izimoto nabahamba ngezi nyawo.

src: awusebenzisi mnxeba xa uqhuba.
tgt: kugweme ukusebenzi sa umakhalekhukhwini ngesikhathi ushayela.

src: ukhuseleko lwabantwanaiindawo ezininzi zoku chithela iiholide zizindawo ezixakeke kakhulu, into ethetha ukuba ungala hlekana nomntwana wa kho phakathi kwabantu abaninzi.
tgt: izindawo eziningi zamaho lide zimatasatasa kakhulu, okuchaza ukuthi kungenze ka ingane yakho ihlukane nawe esixukwini sabantu.

src: kukwabaluleke kakhulu ukubabeka esweni abantwana bakho xa besenza imidlalwana efana nokuqubha elwandle okanye bedlala kwiindawo zokudlala.
tgt: kusemqoka futhi ukuqapha abantwana bakho uma kunezinto enizenzayo ezifana nokubhukuda olwandle noma nidlala emabaleni okudlalela.

src: nazi iingcebiso zokugcina abantwana ba kho bekhuselekile: qinisekisa ukuba abantwana abancinci babaphantsi kweliso lomntu omdala okhathalayo.
tgt: lawa ngamasu azogcina abantwana bakho bephephile: qikelela ukuthi aba ntwana abancane baqa shwe umuntu omdala ngaso sonke isikhathi.

src: emotweni qinisekisa ukuba abantwana abancinci banxityiswe amabhanti.
tgt: emotweni, qikelela ukuthi abantwana abancane bafase amabhande.

src: fundisa abantwana bakho abadala ukuba bayazi iinombolo yomnxeba wakho weselula ukulungiselela xa kunokuvela ingxaki.
tgt: fundisa abantwana asebekhulile inombolo yakho kamakha lekhukhwini uma kwenzeka kuba nesimo esiphuthumayo.

src: qinisekisa ukuba abantwana abanga kwaziyo ukuqubha kakuhle bafakwa amabhanti asenga lweni avuthelwayo xa bequbha.
tgt: qikelela ukuthi aba ntwana abangakwazi ukubhukuda kahle bagqoke amabhangela afuthwe ngomoya uma bebhukuda.

src: fundisa abantwana bakho ukuba bangakhe balinge bakhwele kwisithuthi somntu abangamaziyo kwaye bangathethi nabantu abangabaziyo.
tgt: fundisa abantwana bakho ukuthi bangali nge bangene emotweni yomuntu abangamazi futhi bangakhulumi nabantu abangabazi.

src: mbambe ngesandla umntwana wakho xa ukwiindawo ezixa kekileyo naxa uwela indlela.
tgt: bamba isandla so mntwana wakho uma usendaweni ematasatasa futhi noma weqa umgwaqo.

src: funda uncedo lokuqala lwabaqalayo ukuze ukwazi ukunceda xa kunokuvela ingxaki yezonyango.
tgt: funda imigomo elula yosizo lokuqala ukuze uyisebenzise uma kunesimo esiphuthumayo.

src: ulwaphulomthethokukho ukwanda kwe mikhuba efana nokuqhe kezwa kwezindlu nobusela ngeli xesha leeholide zekrisimesi.
tgt: ubulelesi kunezehlakalo eziningi zokugqekezwa kwezindlu nezigebengu ngamaholide kakhisimusi.

src: yisebenzise ngobunono imali kule krisimesi allison cooper ixesha leeholide zekri simesi akufanelekanga ukuba likushiye use matyaleni.
tgt: sebenzisa imali ngobuhlakani allison cooper amaholide kakhisi musi akufanele aku shiye unembombo yomgodi wezikweleti uma ephela.

src: "ukusebenzisa imali ngokugqithisileyo kuku faka ematyaleni ubonoku waphepha.
tgt: "ukusebenzisa imali nge ndlela engafanele kufana nesikweleti esiyiphela e ndlebeni.

src: kungcono ukuba uyisebenzise ngobunono i mali ngeli xesha leeholide ze krisimesi kuba ukuba awenzi njalo ungazibona unengxaki yemali oku kuchaphazele nezicwangciso zakho," utshilo umlawuli wezentengiso wakwadebtsafe umatthys potgieter.
tgt: kuhle ukugwema ukuchitha imali ngendlela engafanele kulawa maholide kakhisimusi ngoba kungaba nomthelela omkhulu emalini yakho kanye nakuhlelo lwakho esikhathini esizayo," ngokusho komphathi wezokukhangisa nokudayisa edebtsafe umatthys po tgieter.

src: "oba bumnandi bokuyitya imali ngenyanga yenkanga neyomnga bobethutyana nje elifutshane futhi abantu baza kubuva ekupheleni kweyo mqungu yowama2019 ubu nzima bokungasebenzisi ima li ngobunono.
tgt: "ubumnandi bokuthenga ngenyanga kalwezi nozi bandlela bobesikhashana futhi abathengi bazokuzwa ubunzima bokusaphaza ima li ekupheleni komasingana 2019. ungayisebenzisi imali ongenayo," kwengeza upo tgieter.

src: musa ukuzifa ka ematyaleni ongenayo ima li yokuwahlawula," wongeze watsho upotgieter.
tgt: umellony ramalho wea frican bank uthi abasebenzi bajwayele ukusheshe bahole ngenyanga kazibandlela, okwenza bawulinde eside isikhathi umholo wabo wa ngomasingana.

src: umellony ramalho waseafrican bank uthi abasebenzi bayifumana ngaphambi kwexesha imivuzo yabo kwinyanga yomnga, into ke leyo eyenza ukuba libe lide ixesha lokulindela imivuzo yabo yenyanga yomqungu.
tgt: "umasingana inyanga enzi ma kubantu abaningi, abanye basebenzisa amakhadi ezi kweleti noma baboleke ima li.

src: kubalulekile ukuyisebenzisa ngokuqiqa imali.
tgt: kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi imali yakho uyisebenzi sa kanjani.

src: kungcono wenze wenze isicwangciso noluhlu lwezinto oza kuyisebenzisa kuzo imali yakho," utshilo uramalho.
tgt: okugcono enza uhlu lwezinto ofuna ukuyi sebenzisa kuzo imali yakho ukuze ugweme ukusebenzisa imali ngendlela engafanele," ngokusho kukaramalho.

src: upotgieter ucebisa abantu ukuba bakuqalise kwange thuba ukuthenga izinto ze krisimesi kwaye bazithenge ngezixa zonke iintlobo zo kutya abakusebenzisayo futhi bakhethe ezi iintlobo zihlala ixesha elide, ukuze baqinisekisa ukuba abagqithi kwimali ebebeyibekele ukuthenga ngayo ukutya futhi abaziboni sele besengxakini yokuthenga izinto ngemizuzu yokugqibela sele zibiza kakhulu.
tgt: upotgieter ululeke aba thengi ukuba baqale uku thenga izinto zikakhisimusi kusenesikhathi futhi baqikelele ukuthi bathenga ukudla okwanele futhi bathenge izi nhlobo zokudla ezizohlala isikhathi eside, ukuze banga sebenzisi imali ngendlela engafanele futhi bagweme nokuthenga izinto ezibizayo ngemizuzu yokugcina.

src: indlela upotgieter abacebisa ngayo abathengi ngeendlela zokungasebenzisi mali ngokugqithisileyo: thenga ukutya ngezixa futhi ukhethe iintlobo zokutya ezihlala ixesha elide lisebenzise icebo loku khwelisana nabanye abantu emotweni.
tgt: le indlela upotgieter aluleka ngayo abathengi ukuze bagcine imali yabo isesimweni esihle.

src: ukusebenzisa iimoto ezimbalwa kuthetha ukusebenzisa amafutha ezithuthi ama ncinci nemali encinci.
tgt: thenga ukudla okwanele futhi okuyizinhlobo ezizohlala isikhathi eside cabanga ngokusebenzisa imoto eyodwa.

src: uqhawulomtshato ngokusemthethweni dale hes xa sele uzame yonke into ukwenza ukubaumtshato wakho usebenze, uqhawulomtshato lungayeyona nto ingcono kuni nobabini nomlingane wakho.
tgt: kuqedwa komshado ngokomthetho dale hes uma sewukuzame konke ukuze umsha do wakho uphumelele, isahlukaniso somshado singaba yindlela engcono enganilungela wena nomli ngani wakho.

src: uqhawulomtshato lunzima kwaye luyadakumbisa kwii ntsapho zibe nazo iinkqubo zomthetho ziyenza ingqondo iphixane.
tgt: isahlukaniso sinzima futhi sifaka ingcinde zi emindenini kanti inqubo yezomthetho eqondene naso kwesinye isikhathi iyadida.

src: uqhawulomtshato kuxaumtshato uqhawulwe ngokusesikweni enkundleni yezomthetho.
tgt: isahlukaniso somshado sisho isimo lapho umshado sewuhlukaniswe ngokomthetho enkantolo yomthetho.

src: kukho iindidi ezim bini zoqhawulomtshato: olun gaphikiswanga – apho bobabini abalingane bavumelanayo ukuba uqhawulomtshato kufanele luqhubeke; noluphikiswayo – apho abalingane bangavumelaniyo ngoqhawulomtshato olo okanye bangavumelaniyo ngemiqathango yalo.
tgt: kunezi nhlobo ezimbili zesahlukaniso: esingaphikisiwe lapho bobabili abathintekayo bevumelana ngokuthi kufanele kube nesahlukaniso somshado; kanye nesiphikisiwe lapho abathintekayo bengavumelani ngesahlukaniso somshado noma imibandela yaso.

src: ujosephine peta, noligosa lolawulo lezomthetho eliphezulu kwiofisi yegqwetha lejaji elijongene nemiba yeentsapho yesebe lezobulungisa nophuhliso lomgaqosiseko, ucacisa ukuba uqhawulomtshato luqala xa kukhutshwe iisamani.
tgt: ujosephine peta, isenior legal admin officer yehhovisi lomnyango wezobulungiswa nokuthuthukiswa komthethosisekelo lommeli wezeminde ni, uchaza ukuthi inqubo yokuhlukanisa umshado iqala lapho kukhishwa amasamanisi.

src: "umntu ofuna ukuba umtshato wabo uqhawulwe angafuma na iisamani zoqhawulomtshato kwinkundla ephakamileyo okanye kweyenqila, okanye unokuya kwigqwetha ukuba limncede kulo nkqubo.
tgt: "umuntu ofuna ukuchitha umshado wakhe angawathola amasamanisi esahlukaniso somshado enkantolo ephakeme noma eyesifunda, noma lapho eya kummeli ecela ukusizwa ngenqubo.

src: lo mlingane ufaka isicelo sokuqala inkqubo yoqhawulomtshato ubizwa ngokuba ngummangali aze omnye umlingane abizwe ummangalelwa," utshilo upeta.
tgt: umlingani oqala inqubo yokwahlukanisa umshado ubizwa ngokuthi ummangali bese omunye umlingani abizwe ngokuthi ummangalelwa," kusho upeta.

src: upeta ucacise ukuba iisamani zoqhawulomtshato kufuneka: zichaze ukuba akukho themba lokuba ungaze uphinde ulungiseke lo mtshato, zilungiselele ukohlulwa kwempahla ekuditye nweyo ngayo okanye unyanzeliso lwemimiselo ekuvunyelwene ngayo kw isivumelwano somtshato esatyikitywa ekuqalweni kwalo mtshato, zize zicacise ukuba ngawaphi amalungiselelo aza kwenziwa ngabantwana besi sibini, afana nokuba abantwana baza kuhlala kubani.
tgt: upeta uchaze wathi amasamanisi esahlukaniso somshado kumele: asho ukuthi ayisekho nhlobo indlela efanelekile engasetshenziswa ukuze kuvuselelwe ubudlelwane, ahlinzekele ukwahlu kaniswa kwempahla ehlanganyelwe noma ukuphoqelela imigomo okuvunyelwene ngayo esivumelwaneni sanga phambi komshado esisayinwa ekuqaleni komshado, futhi acacise ukuthi zinhlelo zini ezizokwenziwa ngezingane zabalingani, njengokuthi ingane izohlala nobani.

src: "iisamami kwakhona kufuneka zichaze ukuba lowoungummangalelwa uneentsuku ezi10 zokuphendula iisamani – kwimeko apho bahlala khona kummandla omnye kunye nommangali, okanye iintsuku ezingama20 – ukuba bahlala kumaphondo awohlukeneyo," wongeze watsho upeta.
tgt: "amasamanisi kumele aphinde asho ukuthi ummangalelwa unezinsuku eziyi10 – ezimweni lapho ehlala endaweni eyodwa nommangali, noma ezinsukwiniezingama20 uma abathintekayo behlala ezifundazweni eza hlukene, zokuphendula amasamanisi," kwengeza upeta.

src: xa sele livuliwe ityala, amaxwebhu abuyiselwa kummangali, ekufanele eyokuwanikezela kunothimba wendawo ahlala okanye asebenza kuyo ummangalelwa.
tgt: uma icala selivuliwe, ama dokhumenti azobuyiselwa kummangali, okumele anike isikhonzi senkantolo amasethi amabili amadokhumenti esikhonzini senkantolo sasendaweni okusebenza noma okuhlala kuyo ummangalelwa.

src: "ngoko ke unothimba uza kusa la amaxwebhu kummangalelwa buqu aze akhuphe isiqinisekiso sokuba uwahambi sile, ukuqinisekisa ukuba amaxwebhu asiwe.
tgt: "isikhonzi senkantolo sizobe sesinika amadokhumenti kummangalelwa ngqo futhi sikhiphe incwadi ewubufakazi, ukuze ibe ubufakazi bokuthi imibhalo ihanjisiwe.

src: kwimeko apho kuchaphazeleka khona abantwana, iofisi yegqwetha lejaji elijongene nemiba yeentsapho kufuneka yazisiwe," uphawule watsho upeta.
tgt: lapho kunezingane ezibandakanyekayo, kumele kwaziswe ihhovisi lommeli wezemindeni," kubalula upeta.

src: emva kwexesha leentsuku ezi10 okanye ezingama20, ummangali angalubhalisa uqhawulomtshato kumqu lu wamatyala enkundla.
tgt: emuva kwesikhathi esiyizinsuku eziyi10 noma ezingama20, ummangalelwa angabhalisa isahlukaniso somshado ohlwini lwamacala azoqulwa enkantolo.

src: kuqhawulomtshato oluphikiswayo, ummangalelwa kufuneka ephendule iisamani ngokufaka isaziso senjongo yokuphikisa uqhawulomtshato olo.
tgt: ezahlukanisweni zomshado eziphikiswayo, ummangalelwa kumele aphendule amasamanisi ngesaziso senhloso yokuphikisana necala.

src: "xa sele kwenzekile konke oko, kukwafuneka efake impendulo ayakuzithethelela ngayo phakathi kwexesha elicacisiwe.
tgt: "uma sekwenziwe lokho, kumele aphinde afake isicelo sokuphikisa esikhathini esinqunyiwe.

src: le mpendulo yinkcazelo apho ummangalelwa aphendula kuyo izityholo ezikwiisamani.
tgt: isicelo sokuphikisa siyisitatimende lapho ummangalelwa ephendula izinsolo ezikumasamanisi.

src: emva kokuba ifakiwe lo mpendulo, ummangali naye usenokuyiphendula lo mpendulo okanye afake isaziso sokumisela umhla wokuxoxa.
tgt: emuva kokufakwa kwesicelo sokuphikisa, ummangali naye angaphendula noma afake isaziso sokuthi kunqunywe usuku lokuthethwa kwecala.

src: "ke ngoku ityala liya kumiselwa umhla wokuxoxa," uqukumbele watsho upeta.
tgt: "udaba luzobe selubhaliselwa usuku lokuqulwa kwecala," kuphetha upeta.

src: vyintoni uqhawu lomtshato oluzen zekelayo?
tgt: vsiyini isahlukaniso somshado oziphelelayo?

src: inkundla iyakunikezela ngoqhawulomtshato oluzenzekelayo ukuba iisamani bezinikezelwe kumlingane aze ke angaphenduli phakathi kwexesha elimiselweyo.
tgt: inkantolo izogunyaza isahlukaniso somshado oziphelelayo uma amasamanisi ethunyelwe kumlingani kodwa wangaphenduli ngesikhathi esinqunyiwe.

src: ukukhulelwa okwenzeka ngaphandle kwesibeleko yingozi edinga inkathalelo yezempilo kaxakeka allison cooper abantu basetyhi ni abaye bafuma na ukukhulelwa okwenzeka ngaphandle kwesibeleko babazi kakuhle ubuhlungu bentliziyo obubangelwa koku, ngenxa yeziphumo ezithembisayo ezingqina ukuba bakhulelwe kuvavanyo lomchamo nolwegazi.
tgt: ukukhulelwa okungekho esibelethweni (ectopic pregnancy) kuyisimo esiphuthumayo sezempilo allison cooper abesifazane ase beke behlelwa wumsho phi wokukhulelwa okungekho esibelethweni babazi kahle kamhlophe ubuhlungu benhliziyo obubangelwa yilokhu, emva kokutholaumphumela wokuhlolwa komchamo kanye negazi okukhombisa lolu hlobo lokukhulelwa.

src: ngokutsho kukagqr bushy mhlari, oyisenior registrar kwicandelo leectopic ob stetrics and gynaecology edr george mukhari academic hospital , ochaze ukuba ukukhulelwa ngaphandle kwesibeleko kukukhulelwa okwenzeke ngaphandle komngxuma wesibeleko.
tgt: bushy mhlari, ongusenior registrar ophikweni lwezeectopic obstetrics and gynaecology edr george mukhari academic hospital, ochaze wathi ukukhulelwa okubizwa phecelezi ngokuthi yiectopic pregnancy akwenzeki ngaphakathi esibelethweni, lapho ukukhulelwa okujwayelekile kwenzeka khona.

src: uye wathi ngokuqhelekileyo, emva kokuchunyiswa kweqanda yimbewu yobudoda – okuthi kwenzeke ngaphakathi kwemibhobho yesibeleko, iqanda elichunyisiweyo lihamba ngombobho liyokutsho ngaphakathi kumngxuma wesibeleko apho lincamathela khona kwinwebu engaphakathi esibelekweni, aze emva koko umntwana akhule.
tgt: wathi ngokujwayelekile, ngemuva kokulumbana kweqanda lowesifazane nesidoda sowesilisa okwenzeka kumashubhu esibeletho, iqanda elivundile lihamba ngamashubhu esibeletho liye esibelethweni esesikulungele ukwamukela iqanda lelo, bese lizinamathisela olwelwesini lwesibeletho olubizwa phecelezi ngokuthi yiendometrial lining bese kwakheka ingane.

src: "ekukhulelweni okwenzeka ngaphandle kwesibeleko, iqanda elichunyisiweyo lihlala kwezinye iindawo zomzimba.
tgt: "ekukhulelweni okungekho esibelethweni, iqanda elivundile lizinamathelisa kwezinye izingxenye zomzimba.

src: kwiziganeko ezingama98%, olu hlobo lokukhulelwa lwenzeka kwimibhobho yesibeleko.
tgt: ezehlakalweni ezingamaphesenti angama98, lokhu kukhulelwa kuba semashubhini esibeletho.

src: iindawo ezingaqhelekanga ziquka indawo esisiyilelomaqanda emzimbeni, emazantsi esisu, emlonyeni wesibeleko nakwisiqwanga esingaphandle kwesibeleko," utshilo ugqr mhlari.
tgt: ezinye izindawo zomzimba, kodwa ezingavamisile, zibandakanya isizalo samaqanda, ezinye izindawo esiswini, umlomo wesibeletho kanye nomsipha wesibeletho obizwa phecelezi ngokuthi yibroad ligament," kusho udkt.

src: xa oku kusenzeka, isihluma sembewu asinakumiliselwa kwenye indawo, into enokwenziwa inye kuphela kukuba sikhutshwe isisu eso.
tgt: uma kwenzeka lokhu, umbungu awukwazi ukuphinde uyofakelwa kwenye indawo futhi ukuwukhipha wukuphela kwento engenziwa ngowesifazane.

src: ugqr mhlari uthe umntu wasetyhini unamathuba amaninzi okufumana ingxa ki yokukhulelwa okwenzeka ngaphandle kwesibeleko ukuba; unemibhobho yesibeleko eyonakeleyo okanye engaqhelekanga, enokususela kukuba wakhe wanesifo okanye usuleleko lwesifo kule mibhobho alufumene ngokwabelana ngesondo okanye ngotyando kwimibhobho; wakhe wanayo ingxa ki yokukhulelwa okwe nzeke ngaphandle kwesibeleko ngaphambili; akanayo inzala; unamaqabane okwabelana ngesondo amaninzi; utshaya imidiza.
tgt: mhlari uthe makhulu amathuba okuthi owesifazane ehlelwe wumshophi wokukhulelwa okungekho esibelethweni uma; enamashubhu esibeletho alimele noma angakhekile ngendlela efanele, okungabangelwa wukutheleleka kwamashubhu ngezifo ezithathelwana ngokocansi noma ukuhlinzwa kwamashubhu esibeletho esikhathini esedlule; ngaphambilini eke waba nokukhulelwa okungekho esibelethweni; engenanzalo; enabalingani abehlukene aya nabo oca nsini; ebhema ugwayi.

src: "ukugqabhuka kwale nwebu yambethise isihluma sembewu xa umntu enengxaki yokukhulelwa ngaphandle kwesibeleko kungambulala kwaye kungunobangela ophambili wokusweleka koomama abakhulelweyo kwiinyanga ezintathu zokuqala bekhulelwe.
